[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde 'a bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D262}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_bud d+ha nA ma sa ha sra pany+tsa sha ta tsa tur tri pany+tsa da sha/_bod skad du/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_bam po dang po/_/
[\[1b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' dpal gyi rgyal po mi mtshungs pa'i spyan yon tan shin tu bzang po dpal gyi 'od 
[\[1b.3\]]me tog pad mo bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer sku gzugs rin chen dri mchog dam pas mchod pa gtsug tor smin mtshams mchog gis brgyan pa nyi zla grangs med pa bzhin du snang ba/_smon lam gyis rab tu 
[\[1b.4\]]brgyan pas sprul pa shin tu mnga' ba chos kyi dbyings las byung ba chags pa med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams nyi ma bzhin du 'bar ba rin chen zla ba me 
[\[1b.5\]]tog pad mo gser stug po lta bu'i sku rnam par snang bas thogs pa med pa'i spyan mang po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal pa chen por 'khor ba las mtshan tsam 'dzin pas ma lus par thar pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje'i 'od zer chos rgya mtsho'i 'od zer snyed 
[\[2a.2\]]sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo chos kyi dbyings phyogs kun tu gsal bar 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'od sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa mi mtshungs pa rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi grong khyer 'od mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' gyen du byung ba'i dpal 
[\[2a.4\]]gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i rgyal po la 
[\[2a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos sprin dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho ston pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'od zer ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gtsug kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]pa ye shes seng ge dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i nyi ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings grong khyer ye shes mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[2b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla 'od kun tu gsal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba ye shes kun tu gsal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho 
[\[2b.3\]]las byung ba'i myur ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad kyi mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer 'bar ba 'od kyi rgyal po la 
[\[2b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rtse mo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzhin sgrogs pa'i grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar mdzad pa'i dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par snang ba'i dpal ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' bzhin ma chags pa'i ye shes dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[2b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun tu spro ba 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi gdugs dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[2b.7\]]glog gi mar me dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa mtha' yas shin tu bral ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba rab tu grags pa gter gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos skyong dpal 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi gzhal med khang sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad kyi mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin chen kun tu 'bar ba'i dpal yon 
[\[3a.2\]]tan dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser mdangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo mdangs 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[3a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dri thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 
[\[3a.4\]]dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stong dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[3a.5\]]pa rin chen gser ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal mdangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[3a.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan khor yug ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun la snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la 
[\[3a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dpal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od du ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spel ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par rol 
[\[3b.2\]]pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dgon 
[\[3b.3\]]pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri gzer sprin dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog srung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs 
[\[3b.4\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bar mdzad pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 
[\[3b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 
[\[3b.6\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[3b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtogs 'dod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri za'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[4a.2\]]yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par bzhad cing 'dzum pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal snying po'i rgyal po la 
[\[4a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spros pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od zer snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[4a.4\]]pa rin chen pad mo la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgyan gsung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[4a.5\]]gshegs pa sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod sbyin mchog 'byung po'i gdon gyi rgyal po la phyag 
[\[4a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od rgyan gzer dbyangs dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gsal rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa'i shing rgyal po la 
[\[4a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar 'bigs pa'i zla dbyangs dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa yi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]thog mar sems bskyed cing yid la byed pa rnam par bsgrags pas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral zhing gyen du 'byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su skrag pa'i mun pa las gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing n+ya gro d+ha'i 
[\[4b.2\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' zhing mos pa rin chen snying po nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[4b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sngon po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 
[\[4b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshon cha gyen du byung ba ri 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla med 'dzum pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[4b.5\]]gshegs pa bzang mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[4b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan bde 'jom gyi 
[\[4b.7\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer 'byin dpal brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chu rnam par dag 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa nam mkha' rin chen gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od kyi dpal ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes skar mda' dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 
[\[5a.2\]]dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad mo shin tu brtan pa'i ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa mi snang bas bsgribs pa'i ling thog 'joms pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[5a.3\]]kun tu pad mo'i gdan la rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal 'od mdangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla 'od sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[5a.4\]]zla ba khyu mchog sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[5a.5\]]sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug nas gyen du byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i gtsug nas byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'jigs pa las 
[\[5a.6\]]byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pa las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[5a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtan dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[5b.2\]]sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgrogs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping ka'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal gyi 'od gsal ba rgyal po la phyag 
[\[5b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya gser ri gser mdangs 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan me tog mdangs skar ma 'od gsal dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun 
[\[5b.4\]]tu snang ba g.yul rnam par bcom pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rnam par rol pa'i shul rgyal mtshan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[5b.5\]]gshegs pa me zhi dri gsal dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can re ba'i gzugs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan shin tu grags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi ldog 'khor lo 
[\[5b.6\]]rin chen gnas na bzhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa grangs med pa la bzhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med mdangs 
[\[5b.7\]]bzang gser mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yan lag kun sgrogs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab mar me dpal 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen dka' thub ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos zab 'od kyi rgyal po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mar me dgyes kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[6a.2\]]nyi ma mar me dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i mar me sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sprin dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[6a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kun gzugs brnyan sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing rgyal rnam par spel ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ri'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[6a.4\]]shes 'od zer rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po shugs drag dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[6a.5\]]gshegs pa dbang po'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ta la'i rgyal po gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs 
[\[6a.6\]]rgyas rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ri'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer mdangs kyi dpal 
[\[6a.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo zla ba 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang la bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya'i snying po mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rab tu gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[6b.2\]]pa nam mkha' sprin gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyal po 'od dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mdangs kyi dpal 
[\[6b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' gzugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grong 
[\[6b.4\]]khyer snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[6b.5\]]gshegs pa yon tan ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mar me dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[6b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbyin pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la 
[\[6b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'byung bar gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[7a.2\]]chu'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sbyin pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i mar me'i dpal la 
[\[7a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i dpal la 
[\[7a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[7a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[7a.6\]]pa dge ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ku mu da'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[7a.7\]]gshegs pa yon tan rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mchog rnam par rol pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la dmar po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par thos pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog rang bzhin dpal la 
[\[7b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo bla med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog rang 
[\[7b.3\]]bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdangs kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[7b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dri gtso'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dben pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[7b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rang bzhin 
[\[7b.6\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mtho ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam 
[\[7b.7\]]pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas pad mo dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]gdon mi za ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun tu byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[8a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'thor ba'i rang bzhin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dpal 
[\[8a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i mchog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen nyid kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu bzang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[8a.4\]]mthu'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[8a.5\]]pa ye shes bla ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems thog mar bskyed cing phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[8a.6\]]rdo rje mi zad pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dra ba can rnam par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[8a.7\]]pa rin chen me tog dpal gyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i chos kyi dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[8b.2\]]pa chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgo ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser nor bu'i ri bo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos 
[\[8b.3\]]kyi skar mda' rin chen bla re dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i rgya mtsho dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od mchog dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nga ro'i dbyangs 
[\[8b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[8b.5\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum 'od kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[8b.6\]]gshegs pa sprin sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra 
[\[8b.7\]]dbang dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin dbyangs 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[9a.2\]]gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa mchog gi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i nga ro dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[9a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mu med dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher dga' ba dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[9a.4\]]mtshan nyid mi zad pa'i 'od zer kun tu sgo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos mang zhing shin tu 'byung bar sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan chos kyi 'khor lo dbyangs la 
[\[9a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sprul pa'i ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bod pa zhi ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[9a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa mi ldog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba nyid kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i dbyangs la phyag 
[\[9a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho chos kyi 'khor lo dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'bar ba rin chen 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[9b.2\]]gshegs pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su dag pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mthu chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyal po dpal la 
[\[9b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[9b.4\]]mi tshugs stobs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad mo rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[9b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[9b.6\]]'od 'phrog pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal mar me yon tan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[9b.7\]]kun tu dpal rnam par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgya byin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi mchog 
[\[10a.2\]]dbang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med stobs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byed zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[10a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs stobs kun tu snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mar me kun tu snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[10a.4\]]pa dbang po mchog rab blo gros dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sprul pa chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen 'od ye shes dpal gyi 
[\[10a.5\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 
[\[10a.6\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpal tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes rin 
[\[10a.7\]]chen 'od zer dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bsgrags par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos stobs dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]snying rje chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur rgya cher sprul pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la brtson pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[10b.2\]]rin chen 'od mar me rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzha na gyis mi tshugs dka' thub rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mar me'i 
[\[10b.3\]]rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[10b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug yon tan rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags par bsgrags pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[10b.5\]]gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer sgo'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i chos rgya mtsho rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[10b.6\]]gshegs pa me tog rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[10b.7\]]gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]pa 'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar gnas pa'i rgyal 
[\[11a.2\]]mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[11a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gtong ba'i sku'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[11a.4\]]bsgrags pa shin tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher grags pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi dpal rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[11a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi rtse mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med par rin chen sprul pa'i lha 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsgribs pa med pa'i chos nam mkha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[11a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid nyi ma'i 'khor lo kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yon 
[\[11a.7\]]tan gtsug tor ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i sku snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi seng ge pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum du snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[11b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos stobs 'od la phyag 
[\[11b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi sku'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[11b.4\]]pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gangs kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[11b.5\]]gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od la phyag 
[\[11b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog tsam pa ka dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od la 
[\[11b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag 
[\[12a.2\]]nyid kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 
[\[12a.3\]]gyi phreng ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'thor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa na bza' sprin lta bu mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 
[\[12a.4\]]stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'jig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'joms pa la 
[\[12a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzhin grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gyi gnas su 'dzegs 
[\[12a.6\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer zla ba sprin la phyag 
[\[12a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa ri bzhin sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi gtsug mdzod 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gshegs pa rdo rje snying po rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog dpal rgyal mtshan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu brtson pa skar mda' snang ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 
[\[12b.2\]]rnam par 'bar ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer zla ba mchog gi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rtse mo 'phro ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rtse mo rgyal mtshan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[12b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shes rab rnam par bsgrags pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos snang ba'i dpal gyi sprin 
[\[12b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad mo rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rin chen pad mo rgyas pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rin chen me tog dpal gyi sprin la phyag 
[\[12b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par grags pa'i dpal gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sgras brgyan pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od dri ma med pa nyi ma zer gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[12b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma pad mo'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sna tshogs sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyi rtse mo sprin mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[12b.7\]]pa yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shes rab 'od chos nam 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]mkha' mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgyas pa'i rtse mo mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spros pa'i rgya mtsho mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi nyi ma sprin 
[\[13a.2\]]gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro phyag rgya sgo'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[13a.3\]]gshegs pa rin chen rtse mo 'phro ba'i ri'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ri bo'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i mar me la phyag 'tshal 
[\[13a.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings ye shes mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs rgyal mtshan mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo sgrogs pa nam mkha'i sprin mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[13a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang 
[\[13a.6\]]'dra ba'i ye shes mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byed mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bar ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi mar me 
[\[13a.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer me tog mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ri rab mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me nyid la phyag 
[\[13b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med pa'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma bsgribs pa'i chos dbyings mar me la 
[\[13b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan gyis yongs su khyab pa'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa dri med nam mkha'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab mar me la phyag 
[\[13b.4\]]'tshal lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu snang ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal 
[\[13b.5\]]me tog gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dpal ri bo gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal ri rab gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri dpal gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal 
[\[13b.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi gnas la brtson par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo gyen du 'byung ba'i rtse mo'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[13b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum mtshan nyid snang ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang nam mkha' sgrogs pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbang du gyur pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i ri bo gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i ri bo gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[14a.2\]]ri bo mar me yon tan gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[14a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa chos kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[14a.4\]]gshegs pa gzi brjid nyid kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa myur ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[14a.5\]]gshegs pa rab tu dga' ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam sa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[14a.6\]]gshegs pa mnyam pa med pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu nges pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su dag pa'i mtshan gyis 
[\[14a.7\]]brgyan pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma pad mo 'byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog rab dri med gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam med bsod nams chen po'i sprin mi zad pa'i 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung mchog rab dam pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid bsod nams sprin las 'byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu bzhin grags pa zad mi shes pa'i 
[\[14b.2\]]bsod nams kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa gyen du 'byung ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bsod nams sprin dpal gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od dpal gyi gzi brjid la 
[\[14b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skar mda' 'bar ba'i dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po rnam par dag pa dpal 
[\[14b.4\]]gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshul zab pa dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad gzugs brnyan dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 
[\[14b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad mo dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i dpal gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[14b.6\]]chos dbyings yul gyi blo gros zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba kun gyi smon lam thams cad sprul pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spyan gzugs brnyan 'od kyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer sna 
[\[14b.7\]]tshogs 'bar ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam thams cad sprul pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par snang ba'i zla ba la phyag 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spyan gsal zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs blo gros zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par btsun pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i zla ba la 
[\[15a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dang ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dul ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[15a.3\]]gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par thar pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i zla ba la phyag 
[\[15a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin par 'gro ba'i 
[\[15a.5\]]zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i steng dri ma med pa'i ye shes zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rtag tu rnam par snang ba'i mchog rab zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs thams cad la dri ma med pa'i ye shes zla ba 
[\[15a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mthu la mi rdzi ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dgyes pa nam mkha'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rab tu rgyas pa zil gyis mi gnon pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[15a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa sku thams cad ye shes gzugs brnyan gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam yongs su rdzogs par sprul pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mdzod kun tu snang ba'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med ri'i 'od gsal ba 
[\[15b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang ma 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa 
[\[15b.3\]]'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[15b.4\]]gshegs pa 'od zer gyi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[15b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam 
[\[15b.6\]]bu'i gser 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma zil gyis gnon pa kun tu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[15b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]chos thams cad kyi tshul las 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od dam pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od gsal 
[\[16a.2\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya 'bar ba'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po nor bu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[16a.3\]]gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur rgyas par yon tan grags pa zad mi shes pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgya mtsho'i shugs yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od 
[\[16a.4\]]zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba thams cad rnam par dag pas myos 
[\[16a.5\]]pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po'i smon lam tshul 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gyen du 'byung ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[16a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa yi ge stong pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcu las 'dri ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[16a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dbang po bden pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spros pa'i 'od zer la phyag 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'dri ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa mtha' yas 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong las 'da' ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lan mi lon pa'i 'od 
[\[16b.2\]]zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu grol ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas 
[\[16b.3\]]me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mu med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgo la phyag 'tshal 
[\[16b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mang pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[16b.5\]]pa thams cad mngon du mkhyen pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab tu gtong ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi dbyings rnam par 
[\[16b.6\]]bstan pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[16b.7\]]shes kun tu bzang ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgo mo bzang pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes gsal ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal ri rab la 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ri rab bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[17a.2\]]ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[17a.3\]]gshegs pa ri rab chen po bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[17a.4\]]pa shin tu mtho ba'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo 'od zer ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[17a.5\]]mngon du 'phags pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog 
[\[17a.6\]]ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lan mi ldon pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs 
[\[17a.7\]]pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid dpal gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi ri bo la 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od zab mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mthu dpal brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa 
[\[17b.2\]]brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[17b.3\]]pa dpa' bo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog pad mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[17b.4\]]gshegs pa 'od brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya che ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od 
[\[17b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yangs pa'i 
[\[17b.6\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mo 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang po 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag 
[\[17b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug gi dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dpal me tog gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgo kun tu gsung ba rtse mo'i 'od la 
[\[18a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer ri rab rtse mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i chos kyi ri ye shes rtse mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thams cad kha dog sna tshogs nor bu gdugs kyi 'od la phyag 
[\[18a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpal gyi rgyal po'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtong bar grags par mdzad pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18a.4\]]pa zad mi shes pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams dpal snang ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mtshams su ye shes 'od dpal gyi blo gros 
[\[18a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams rjes su song ba'i chos kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i 
[\[18a.6\]]blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpal gyi rgyal po blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'dzin pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi thogs 
[\[18a.7\]]pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi dman pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgoms pa'i blo gros la phyag 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[18b.2\]]gshegs pa tshangs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po la 
[\[18b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal 
[\[18b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med kun tu gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos mngon du 
[\[18b.5\]]'phags pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[18b.6\]]gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher sprul pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[18b.7\]]gshegs pa zla 'od khams kyi dbang po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad mo dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[19a.2\]]zla ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyi snying po la 
[\[19a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'char ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang ba rin chen 
[\[19a.4\]]pad mo'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ye shes 'byung ba kun tu gzugs brnyan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od brgyar rab tu gsal ba'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od tshad med par 
[\[19a.5\]]sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin chen gzi brjid dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dbang nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od sna tshogs ri rab snying 
[\[19a.6\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mo kun tu snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[19a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[19b.2\]]gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[19b.3\]]gshegs pa rin chen yon tan mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen shin tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[19b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen shin tu skar mda' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer dpal gyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpal gyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[19b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang byed yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa kun la ma chags pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od 
[\[19b.6\]]dga' ba'i stobs kyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sprin 'byung dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[19b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug ma bral 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bar smra ba'i blo gros 'joms par rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don dam par rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'phar ba'i rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par 
[\[20a.2\]]'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba la 
[\[20a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mo rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol gnon pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 
[\[20a.4\]]lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa mchog gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[20a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po chen po'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sel gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya che ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[20a.6\]]pa drang srong gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[20a.7\]]gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro dbang po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]tshogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs chen po'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su 'dzin pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[20b.2\]]'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[20b.3\]]gshegs pa brjod du med par mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo mngon du 'phags 
[\[20b.4\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[20b.5\]]gshegs pa sman pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[20b.6\]]pa klu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gser dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la phyag 
[\[20b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gshegs pa dri dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin 
[\[21a.2\]]tu skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu skar ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par snang ba la phyag 
[\[21a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgol ba shin tu bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par 'gro ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu lha mtshams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[21a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yid bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[21a.5\]]shin tu yongs su dag pa'i yon tan rin chen rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sems bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med dri med ting nge 'dzin rnam par 
[\[21a.6\]]'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rin chen yon tan rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med gom pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyibs mang kun tu snang ba rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 
[\[21a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snyoms pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pa chos kyi rang bzhin mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs med chos mchog chos dbyings mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad 'byin pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[21b.2\]]gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad kyi 'od mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[21b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dkar po thams cad kyi 'byung 
[\[21b.4\]]gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[21b.5\]]gshegs pa byang chub yan lag me tog gi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu thob pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[21b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu nges pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dkyil 'khor gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[21b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgyes pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi pad mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa'i sku 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gdon mi za bar rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'phros pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[22a.2\]]gshegs pa tshangs pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthun pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[22a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rnga'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgra'i nga ro la 
[\[22a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad shin tu bsgrags pa'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas chos kyi dbyings kyi nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal 
[\[22a.5\]]med phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nor rtse mo'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtan pa'i 'od zer dra ba dbyibs kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar bsags pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[22a.6\]]gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun rdzob kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[22a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dang ba'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa za me tog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams sbyin la 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs mchog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[22b.2\]]pa tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtong ba sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[22b.3\]]gshegs pa dpal sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyas 
[\[22b.4\]]pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdan mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[22b.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[22b.6\]]gshegs pa blo bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[22b.7\]]pa blo zla ba lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo nam mkha' lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin tu mi tshugs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i stobs 'byung ba'i blo seng ge'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan gyis brgyan pa zla ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzugs brnyan 'od gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[23a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od zer snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od
