[\[23a.3\]]zer snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[23a.4\]]gshegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs par ston pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[23a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang tha mi dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa mngon 
[\[23a.6\]]du mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i 'od zer la 
[\[23a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas dbyangs zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[23b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po zhi ba la 
[\[23b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[23b.4\]]gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dri ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[23b.5\]]gshegs pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bsam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ye shes ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu ris la 
[\[23b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes ri bo 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i lte ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[23b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje pad mo bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo nyid kyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]yan lag bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje pad mo nyid kyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[24a.2\]]pa bla ma nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od dpal gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu snang bar 'phar ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa'i rdo rje mthu chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal 
[\[24a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' 'od gsal 'od kyi seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me 'bar ba'i ye shes seng ge la 
[\[24a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje chen po'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[24a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' dpal rnam 
[\[24a.6\]]par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang bsnyems rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzums pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[24a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar pad rmos rol pa shin tu rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gsal nam mkha' dbyangs rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyud las rnam par 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]'phar bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu zhi ba'i gzugs su bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[24b.2\]]pa yang dag par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi chung bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[24b.3\]]dpag tu med pa'i yon tan mang bas 'das pa'i rgyan lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yon tan dpal rgyan gzi brjid phung po lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i ri bo dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24b.4\]]ri bo dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyan gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[24b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[24b.6\]]gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags gtsang shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs grags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 
[\[24b.7\]]mdzes grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen rdo rje brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen brtson 'grus 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]gshegs pa mthu chen brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[25a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar ston par mngon du 'phags pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[25a.3\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa chen por 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[25a.4\]]pa yon tan 'bar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grol bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ta ma la'i lo ma tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri thams 
[\[25a.5\]]cad 'bar ba'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[25a.6\]]gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban lang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[25a.7\]]pa chos dbyings me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bar ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gtor ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]snang ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu thul ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par brgyan pa la

[\[25b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don thams 
[\[25b.4\]]cad gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gcig tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[25b.5\]]pa gdon mi za bar gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don du gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa

[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]thams cad rnam par bsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang du ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa

[\[26a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mchod pa la phyag

[\[26b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan pa'i sde 'joms dgra spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ci bzhin pa rjes su

[\[26b.5\]]las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snyems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kauN+Di n+ya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin

[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od shar bsil la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra'i dri bsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i tshul 'dzin sgra 'byin dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog mngon par

[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gshegs pa dga' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba skyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bskyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems rtse gcig tu thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[28a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ta ma la'i lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[28a.5\]]gshegs pa mun bsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags skyes po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[28a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]nye bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbu na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor dmigs pa'i
