[\[28b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs rnam par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde'i dgra rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[28b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa rnams 
[\[28b.5\]]rab tu sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis bsod nams mtha' med grangs med pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mang po 'di dag 'dzin 
[\[28b.6\]]tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_rjes su dran zhing bsgoms na/_de dag la mig nad med par 'gyur/_rna nad med/_sna nad med/_lce nad med/_lus nad med cing sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'byang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa byed 
[\[28b.7\]]pa mi 'byung /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/_phyogs thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur/_de dag gis de la rtag tu bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed par mdzad do/_/mngon 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]du 'am chung ngu na rmi lam du yang rung ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas par mngon du ston te/_ci nas myur du ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo mo so sor thob par mdzad do/_/nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[29a.2\]]kyi bstan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_rin po che'i pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'ong /_nam yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan par 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_spyan lnga dang /_sems can smin par bya ba 
[\[29a.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang mi 
[\[29a.4\]]'jigs pa dang /_so so kun tu rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa gzhan dag dang 
[\[29a.5\]]yang ldan par 'gyur te/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi yon tan dang /_grags pa phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin du de dag la yang yon tan du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de dag la yang phun sum tshogs pa ring por mi thogs par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[29a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar myur du mngon sum bar byang chub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[29a.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha re d+ha re d+harma d+hA tu pra tiSh+Thi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad tu mar me'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra dI pe pra dI pe dz+nyA na pra dI pe swA hA/_/
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_te dze te dze/_/dz+nyA na te dze/_/bud d+ha te dze/_/d+harma te dze/_/sang g+ha te dze swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra te pra te/_sarba pra te/_pa ri pU ra Ni bud d+ha sa mu dra 
[\[29b.2\]]dar sha Ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_k+Shi Ne k+Shi Ne/_sarba karma A ba ra NA ni/_bud d+ha sat+ye na/_d+harma sat+ye na/_sang g+ha sat+ye na swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[29b.3\]]tad+ya thA/_tsan+d+ra pra b+he/_sUr+ya pra b+he/_tsan dra sUr+ya sha ta swA hA/_sri ti ri ka pra b+he/_bi sho d+ha ya dz+nyA na tsak+Shu swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+harma byU he/_ga ga na byU he dz+nyA na byU he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal 
[\[29b.4\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dA ra dA ra/_dz+nyA na kA ya pa ri sho d+ha ni/_dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra Ni ta tha tA a ba bo d+ha ni shI g+h+ram swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi bu le/_go tsa re/_pU ra ya/_pU ra ya/_sarba A sha dz+nyA na a 
[\[29b.5\]]d+hi Sh+Thi te/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/_sarba bo d+hi satwa a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shugs rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_be ge be ge_/d+harma sa mu dra be ge_/ga ga na sa mu dra be ge_/pA ra mi tA be ge_/sarba A shA pi ra pU ra Ne be ge_/
[\[29b.6\]]bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_sangs rgyas 'di dag sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces gsungs te/_nam bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa na sems can gang gis nged kyi ming thos sam/_'dzin tam/_bklags na de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur 
[\[29b.7\]]cig_/mi khom pa brgyad las yongs su 'das shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon sum du dgongs te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar shog shig_/de nas shi 'phos nas yang lhar bcas pas yongs su 'dzin par shog shig_/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par shog shig_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan 'dzin pa de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par zung shig_/de ste byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mthong bar 'dod na des ci nus 
[\[30a.2\]]par mchod pa byas te 'bum du bzlas par bya'o/_/kun tu yang gtsang zhing byams pa'i sems su bya/_de ste kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod na yang des de bzhin mchod de nyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de ste yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mthong bar 'dod na/_de ltar 
[\[30a.3\]]mchod de sum 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/kun tu yang gtsang zhing byams pa'i sems su bcas la/_nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_khro ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mchog 'od gsal dpal gzi brjid snang ba la 
[\[30a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sUr+ye sUr+ye/_dz+nyA na sU r+ye swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po rnam pa du ma'i rgyal po dpal 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_te dza shi ri swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med par 
[\[30a.5\]]bsags pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa mu dra ye sa mu dra ye/_dz+nyA na sa mu dra ye swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshul thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i gzi brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gar+b+he gar+b+he/_/dz+nyA na gar+b+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[30a.6\]]pa gser bzang nam mkha' sgra mang gzi brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga ne ga ga ne/_ga ga na bi shud d+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_me ru me ru/_rat+na me ru swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 
[\[30a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gu Ne gu Ne/_gu Na sa mu dre swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ge thu ge thu/_dz+nyA na ge thu swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa mu dre sa mu dre/_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dz+nyA na sa mu dre swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+h+wa dze d+h+wa dze d+harma d+h+wa dze swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+hA ra Ni mu dre swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos stobs 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[30b.2\]]tad+ya thA/_pra b+he pra b+he/_d+harma pra b+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bud d+he bud d+he/_su bud d+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chos kyi 'od zer ri rab rtse mo snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_artsi artsi/_dz+nyA na artsi swA hA/_
[\[30b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_me g+ha me g+ha/_ma hA me g+ha swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma mar me dpal rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra dI pe pra dI pe/_dz+nyA na pra dI pe swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhing du sangs rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[30b.4\]]lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa me sa me/_sa ma s+thi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dru me dru me/_dz+nyA na dru me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gu Ne gu Ne/_gu Na me ru shi kha re swA hA/_
[\[30b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ni me ni me/_dz+nyA na ni me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi ri bi ri/_bai ro tsa na swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[30b.6\]]byU he byU he/_dz+nyA na byU he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ma sa ma sa mu dra bi kra ma Ni swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_te dzo te dzo/_dz+nyA na te dzo swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mgon 
[\[30b.7\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_in dre in dre/_in dra bi kra me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_b+ha dre b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kun 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra b+he pra b+he/_dz+nyA na pra b+he swA hA/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra badzra/_badzri ud ta re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs stobs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a sang ge a sang ge/_bud d+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings gzugs 
[\[31a.2\]]brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha rme d+ha rme/_d+harma d+ha re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu mar me 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_di ne di ne/_di na ka ra ra Ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_te dze te dze/_
[\[31a.3\]]ma hA te dze swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra te pra te/_pra ta pa ri pU ra Ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_k+Sha me k+Sha me/_dz+nyA na k+Sha me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 
[\[31a.4\]]'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra b+he pra b+he/_dz+nyA na maN+Da la pra b+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i rgya mtsho mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ra sa ra/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra shAn 
[\[31a.5\]]te pra shAn te/_u pa pra shAn te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi pu le bi pu le/_dz+nyA na bi pu le swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shugs kyi rtse mo rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ma sa ma/_sa ma 
[\[31a.6\]]s+thi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ma ra ma ra/_ma ra ti ka re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_g+hu me g+hu me/_g+hu me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[31a.7\]]lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_shi ra ye swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i cod pan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ku Te mu ku Te/_d+harma mu ku Te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya ba ti swA hA/_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_ma hA d+hu me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga ne ga ga ne/_ga ga na sa me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me la phyag 
[\[31b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sam b+ha ba sam b+ha ba/_bud d+ha sa twe na swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams dpal snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_u me u me/_u ma ba ti swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba grags par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_g+ho She 
[\[31b.3\]]g+ho She/_bud d+ha g+ho She swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ra sa ra/_sa ra shi be swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_te dze te dze/_te dza ba ti swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag 
[\[31b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shi be shi be/_pu shi be swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_k+Sha ye k+Sha ye/_karma k+Sha ye swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ru he ru he/_g+ho Sha ru he swA hA/_
[\[31b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_in dre in dre/_in dra ba ti swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gu Ni gu Na/_gu Na sa mu di te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams ri bo la phyag 
[\[31b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pU ra ya pU ra ya/_sarba ma nor thA nA thA swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa gsung zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sha me sha me/_sha ma ma ti swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra b+ha pra sa ra pra sa ra Ni swA hA/_
[\[31b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang ba bzhin dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ku mu ku mu/_ku mu de swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gar+b+he gar+b+he/_ta thA ga ta gar+b+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rigs pa'i dpal la 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sam b+ha ba sam b+ha ba pra Ni d+hA na sam b+ha ba swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po gtsug tor nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_de be de be/_de be na dra pU tsi te swa ha/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal 
[\[32a.2\]]lo/_/tad+ya thA/_kan tsa ne kan tsa ne/_kan tsa na sa tri she swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ra ta ne ra ta ne/_dz+nyA na rata ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+harma d+harma/_d+harma d+harma 
[\[32a.3\]]swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri te dze shi ri te dze/_shi ri swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dza be dza be/_dza ba ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal 
[\[32a.4\]]lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shAn te shAn te/_pra shA ma ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ki ri ki ri/_ke tu rA dza swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i mar me sprin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra sha ma ri pu pra sham 
[\[32a.5\]]ri pu shan to b+ha ba ri pu swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a ba b+hA se a ba b+hA se/_a ba b+hA sa ka ra Ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bshol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi bi bi ma le bi ma le te swA hA/_de 
[\[32a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_su ru su ru sU r+yA te dze swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dI pe dI pe/_d+harma pra ti swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[32a.7\]]tad+ya thA/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsi ri tsi swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_de be de be/_de ba pU dzi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgrags glog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_si me si me/_bud d+ha sing 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ha se ma swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan mang po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_me ru me ru/_bud d+ha me ru swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga na/_ga ta ya swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 
[\[32b.2\]]rigs pa mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sam b+ha be sam b+ha be/_sam b+ha ba byu he pu swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya mtsho dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gardza gardza ni swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings nga ro dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[32b.3\]]tad+ya thA/_d+hA re d+hA ra Ni ban d+he swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa bstsal ba'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ni me ni me/_dz+nyA na ni me swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha sgra dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_swa re swa re bud d+ha swa re swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu kun gyi 
[\[32b.4\]]gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ta ra ta ra/_bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te na swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sa mu dre sa mu dre/_d+harma d+hA tu sa mu dre swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[32b.5\]]sam b+ha be sam b+ha be/_sa ma b+ha ba tu/_bud d+ha ad+hi Sh+Thi te na swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_gu Ne gu Ne/_bud d+ha sam b+ha ba gu ne swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_
[\[32b.6\]]pra dI pra shi ri swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dzi na dzi na dzi na sU r+ya swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par mang ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bi pu le/_ga ga na bi pu le swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal 
[\[32b.7\]]mar me'i yon tan gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_pra dI pe pra dI pe/_shi ri te dza pra di pe swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sid d+he su sid d+he/_mo tsa ni mo k+Sha ni/_mu ga ti bi mu ga te/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]mAng ga l+ya/_hir N+ya gar b+he g+he rat+na gar b+he/_sarba ar+tha sa d+hA d+ha ni pa ra ma ra tha sA d+ha ni/_ma na se/_ma hA ma na se/_ad b+hu te/_a t+yad b+hu b+hu te/_bI ta b+ha ye/_su bar+Ne prah+ma g+ho She/_pra h+ma ad+hu She te/_sarba a r+the/_Shud a parA dzi te/_sarba tra a pra ti ha te/_tsa tu 
[\[33a.2\]]shiSh+Tha bud+d+ha ko T+wi b+ha Sh+wate/_namaH_sarba sid d+hi nA ma ta thA ga tA nA na swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs sngags zab mo 
[\[33a.3\]]brjod pa ni legs so/_/gang gis gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rgyas par yid la byed na/_rigs kyi bu pho de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[33a.4\]]gshegs pa dri med 'od gsal gyis ljags kyi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yog par mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag bdun cu po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 
[\[33a.5\]]'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ci nus su mchod par byed pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ji ltar bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od gsal la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[33a.6\]]kun tu gleng ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu gleng ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[33a.7\]]rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ste/_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na/_nang par sngar langs te ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pas ci nus 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]su mchod pa byas te/_'du 'dzi mang po spangs la nyin gsum dben mtshan gsum dben par de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang /_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dran par byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bden pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlabs pas na/_de'i da ltar gyi 
[\[33b.2\]]tshe 'di nyid la las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsan dre su tsan dre ma hA tsan dre/_tsan dra ki ri ni/_mi li mi li/_bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/_si li si li/_d+harma a d+hi Sh+Thi te/_ki li ki li saM g+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te 
[\[33b.3\]]swA hA/_rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa 'chang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nang par langs shing yid la byed na de bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par 'ong ngo /_/nam du yang byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 
[\[33b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/_sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/_shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/_sarba ka rma A ba ra Na bi shu d+d+he swA hA/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'chang zhing 
[\[33b.5\]]rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byas na de da ltar gyi tshe 'di nyid du las thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_mthar byang chub 
[\[33b.6\]]kyi dkyil 'khor la thug gi bar du de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mig yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_tsak+Shu tsak+Shu/_dz+nyA na tsak+Shu swA hA/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin na de lha dang 'jig rten du 
[\[33b.7\]]bcas pa'i mig lta bur 'gyur te/_bskal pa bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ni byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor du thug gi bar du mi zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang dri 'od gsal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ga dze ga dze/_ga dze in+de 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal rgyal po de'i mtshan brjod pa 'dzin na de'i lus las lo brgya phrag bcu gsum gyi 
[\[34a.2\]]bar du dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems nam du yang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe puSh+pe/_su puSh+pe swA hA/_de'i cho ga ni me tog ji lta bur bshams pa de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te/_de bzhin 
[\[34a.3\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten la gtor na/_de'i bsams pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'ong /_de bzhin gshegs pas 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+ha ra Ni ban+d+he swA hA/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[34a.4\]]mtshan dang /_gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di 'dzin na/_des bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams bab par 'ong /_sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te byin na ci snyed pa mi byams/_de bzhin du smon lam thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[34a.5\]]pa gcig tu mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba'i khyu mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar bas shin tu rnam par 'phar ba'i khyu mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 
[\[34a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i don la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam ma mkhar 'thun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[34a.7\]]grags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu 'gyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]ba spu ldang ba dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gsal ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i bal glang la phyag 'tshal 
[\[34b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan 
[\[34b.3\]]dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun rdzob phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la dmar po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'od dpal la phyag 
[\[34b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba las 'byung ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad skrag cing 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[34b.5\]]chos kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcus lhag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' 
[\[34b.6\]]yas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal 
[\[34b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sA la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[35a.2\]]gshegs pa rin chen sil snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar yongs su grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[35a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa blta dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra 'byin 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[35a.4\]]gshegs pa rin chen rtse mo mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa la 
[\[35a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan dbang po'i sprin phyug mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[35a.6\]]'od 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa mang du sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i mchog mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs 
[\[35a.7\]]rgyas 'od me tog tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i dpal kun tu grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can kun gyi sems kyi rgyun tu 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 
[\[35b.2\]]dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pha rol phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[35b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tha mi dad pa'i shing rta la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ud pa 
[\[35b.4\]]la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[35b.5\]]rin chen dpung mgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' 
[\[35b.6\]]yas pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sde mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa bzhud 
[\[35b.7\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]chen gdugs mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[36a.2\]]pa zla ba mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ka ling ka'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[36a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor brtan pa'i yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[36a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa med pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[36a.5\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mos la 
[\[36a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 
[\[36a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od mtha' yas dri'i rgyal po la 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bud med skyes par bsgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[36b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun gyi sems dad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[36b.3\]]mtshan ma med pa'i gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rab tu gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[36b.4\]]'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rtsol ba khyu mchog ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[36b.5\]]mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun yid 'joms zhing 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[36b.6\]]skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[36b.7\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsir 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dga' bar rtsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyor ba kun tu gcod pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sprul pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal 
[\[37a.2\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can snying po la phyag 
[\[37a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bral ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[37a.4\]]gshegs pa go cha tha mi dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog dpe med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[37a.5\]]gshegs pa shin tu brjid pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba las mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[37a.6\]]gshegs pa skyon med rnam par skye ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[37a.7\]]pa pad mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu 'thor ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od kun tu 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rab tu mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spros pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma bral ba'i rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum khyu 
[\[37b.2\]]mchog rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod sbyin khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[37b.3\]]rnga dbyangs khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu so sor bstan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[37b.4\]]sangs rgyas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin chen mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[37b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri dam pa khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[37b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[37b.7\]]pa tsan dan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa'i dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[38a.2\]]gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[38a.3\]]gshegs pa skar ma'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[38a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba'i bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sna tshogs kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog dang ldan pa la 
[\[38a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul dang bral ba rnam par grol ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung 
[\[38a.6\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yi ge'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[38a.7\]]gshegs pa stobs rnam par snyoms pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ngan pa rnams 'joms pa la phyag 
[\[38b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo las mngon du 
[\[38b.3\]]'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang phyis 'byung ba dang da ltar gyi dus su ma chags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[38b.4\]]gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyun mi 'chad pa la 
[\[38b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud las rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[38b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[38b.7\]]bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bskyod mi nus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gnas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa'i me tog pad mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[39a.2\]]gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri dam pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad mngon du stobs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba thams cad ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[39a.3\]]pa 'od rnam par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor shin tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas par brgyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[39a.4\]]gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu bzang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur 
[\[39a.5\]]ba'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mngon du 'phags pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du shes par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[39a.6\]]gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pa ri rab spo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i ri rab la phyag 
[\[39a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba'i rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bar chad med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtsegs pa la 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[39b.2\]]pa ye shes gsang ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[39b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin ston pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[39b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi thabs las byung ba'i 'od thogs pa med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su ston pa'i bdud 
[\[39b.5\]]thams cad 'dul ba'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang ldan pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[39b.6\]]rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog kun tu 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mchog tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[39b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bde bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i dri dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 
[\[40a.2\]]gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal 
[\[40a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[40a.4\]]gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs rnam par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od gsal bal phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[40a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[40a.6\]]me tog sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i 
[\[40a.7\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stsol zhing spyod pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba thams cad kyi khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa mtha' yas pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri dam pa'i dpal 
[\[40b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshig gis dgrol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i ri rab 
[\[40b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gog pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma dang bral ba'i zla ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i stobs 
[\[40b.4\]]kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa thams cad gtan du bsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[40b.5\]]'od zer rab tu gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'od kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med par 'phar ba la 
[\[40b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgya mtsho las mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i sgra dbyangs 
[\[40b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po la phyag 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul dang bral ba rnam par grol ba dus gsum por ma chags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[41a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[41a.3\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[41a.4\]]rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal 
[\[41a.5\]]ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog 
[\[41a.6\]]dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par 'phar ba'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[41a.7\]]pa dra ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog pad mo'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]yon tan dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu spros pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang por bsgoms pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug 
[\[41b.2\]]las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nges par mi mthun pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[41b.3\]]gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[41b.4\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gnas la 
[\[41b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dri rab tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[41b.6\]]ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[41b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shin tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mu med rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer la phyag 
[\[42a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzem pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i ba spu langs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[42a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi blo nges pa'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rgyan gyi dbyangs la phyag 
[\[42a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[42a.5\]]gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor shin tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[42a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i tshig rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i glang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i 
[\[42a.7\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]so sor shin tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor shin tu gnas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[42b.2\]]snang ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge la phyag 'tshal 
[\[42b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo rab tu brtan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas pa las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[42b.4\]]brtson 'grus las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom yongs su 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma bzang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[42b.5\]]gshegs pa 'od gsal bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[42b.6\]]gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phreng ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[42b.7\]]gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[43a.2\]]spu 'greng ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lan mi ldon pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[43a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rgyan gyi khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'od 'byung mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[43a.4\]]pa rin chen skar ma khyu mchog sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal 
[\[43a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gtor ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mdzes pa'i 'od zer 
[\[43a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi gom pa rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gom pa rnam par 'phar ba mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[43a.7\]]smon lam mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa tshad med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma nges pa'i 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyur ba'i smon lam mi skye ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rtsol ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal 
[\[43b.2\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa go cha grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan 
[\[43b.3\]]pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid kyi go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dul ba'i go cha la phyag 
[\[43b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzod gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku mtha' 
[\[43b.5\]]yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyi bo nas mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la 
[\[43b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs shing bag tsha ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[43b.7\]]yon tan mtha' yas rab tu gsal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgol ba thams cad shin tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi yul thams cad shin tu non pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pa'i me tog 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal la 
[\[44a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bdud rtsi me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la 
[\[44a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[44a.4\]]gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thams cad zlos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa 
[\[44a.5\]]mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzem pa med pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du spobs pa rtsol bar spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsung ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44a.6\]]pa dri'i ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[44a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa pad mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa go cha shin tu bgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gshegs pa go cha shin tu bgos pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'khrung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[44b.2\]]gser gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can las mngon du 'phags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams 
[\[44b.3\]]cad mi skyo bar zlog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar spyod pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun tu rab tu gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu 'thor 
[\[44b.4\]]bar 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig gis g.yogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[44b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sgyur ba'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu chags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44b.6\]]pa ye shes mtha' yas pa'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i go cha bgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[44b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal bar mdzad pa la phyag 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu sems can thams cad la spobs pa mi gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul dang bral ba'i rnam par 
[\[45a.2\]]'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gom pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[45a.3\]]'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kauN+Di n+ya la phyag 'tshal 
[\[45a.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ku mu da 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bkur ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[45a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba las byung ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[45a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i tshogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med par snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri dam pa'i ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[45a.7\]]gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med par spyod pa 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]cad kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba la dbang ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[45b.2\]]pa mi 'jigs pa'i pad mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun rdzob kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa la phyag 
[\[45b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i dbyangs 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs 
[\[45b.4\]]pa'i dri ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mar me mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sdud 
[\[45b.5\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel 
[\[45b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[45b.7\]]seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa me tog gi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon la phyag 
[\[46a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i skar mda' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba chen po la 
[\[46a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[46a.4\]]gshegs pa grol ba'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[46a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skrag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma mdzad la phyag 
[\[46a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phreng ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rab tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[46a.7\]]gshegs pa mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ma thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sra ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshugs dka' ba la phyag 
[\[46b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshugs dkor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ci yang mi grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[46b.3\]]gshegs pa 'khor dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par sbyor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par sbyor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtho bar mi sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dregs 
[\[46b.4\]]pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[46b.5\]]pa 'jigs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[46b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[46b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs ris ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i mche ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]so la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang skyong la phyag 
[\[47a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi 'pho med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[47a.3\]]pa seng ge rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[47a.4\]]gshegs pa mdzes pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs 
[\[47a.5\]]pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[47a.6\]]mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_bam po lnga pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thams 
[\[47a.7\]]cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba skar mda' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' chen po 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gshegs pa shugs drag 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par mi tshugs pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[48a.1\]]'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags stobs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su

[\[50a\]]

[\[50b\]]

[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]pa bde ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'khor gyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa byin la
