[\[51b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[51b.4\]]gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam 
[\[51b.5\]]par rol pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mun nag dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan gyi lha 
[\[51b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po mchog la phyag 
[\[51b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stis sna ya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]gshegs pa skag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rwa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rwa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon 
[\[52a.2\]]tan grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sku 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 
[\[52a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rno ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[52a.4\]]pa dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[52a.5\]]pa glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig pa byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs 
[\[52a.6\]]pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum du grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so [(]/[,)]
[\[52a.7\]]sor grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mi chung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dpe med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'jigs pa dang rnam par bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig 
[\[52b.2\]]rten 'od gsal bar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung shin tu zhim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi gtso 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mun nag yongs su spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.3\]]gshegs pa bral ba'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dpung mgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.4\]]gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyes pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'chang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid las skyes pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.5\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang bar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[52b.6\]]pa dpal brtsegs pa'i skar mda' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gtan la 'bebs par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[52b.7\]]gshegs pa re ba sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang por gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar zhing bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]rtogs pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor 'byed pa'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor 'byed pa'i phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[53a.2\]]pa mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[53a.3\]]gshegs pa rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ri bo la phyag 
[\[53a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu sgra 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[53a.5\]]gshegs pa phyag bya ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nor bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dpung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dpung 
[\[53a.6\]]dpal blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i glog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa so sor brgyan pa mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[53a.7\]]kun tu spyod pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]par spobs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mtha' yas pa

[\[53b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems kyi rgyud bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[53b.4\]]gshegs pa ri bo bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me tog rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa las rnam par rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[53b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rig par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ku mu ta la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[53b.6\]]gshegs pa mtha' yas par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gling la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen 
[\[53b.7\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa'i don ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don brtan pa'i shes rab 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo yongs su rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mi zhan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma 
[\[54a.2\]]dang rnam par bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzungs sngags 
[\[54a.3\]]kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu las rnam par grol ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od gsal 
[\[54a.4\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rab tu dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyis 
[\[54a.5\]]mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bu gcig bzhin dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mi tshugs pa la 
[\[54a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[54a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dus las mi yol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus bzhin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin la phyag

[\[54b.3\]]gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma dang 
[\[54b.4\]]bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma dang bral ba'i don ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[54b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od zer la phyag 'tshal 
[\[54b.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[54b.7\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsi ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog sred la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang dbang can la phyag 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khyil pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin

[\[55a.5\]]gshegs pa me tog mchog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po sbyin la 
[\[55a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[55a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku bzang pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan med ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[55b.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dben 
[\[55b.6\]]pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dpag pa la phyag 'tshal

[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin
