[\[56a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[56a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo sgrol ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug 
[\[56a.7\]]na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'gugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i lha'i gnas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[56b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thun bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sred la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'chi sred la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[56b.3\]]chen 'tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol pas 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar bzhud 
[\[56b.4\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[56b.5\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta spel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[56b.6\]]rin chen gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshim pa'i bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyan 
[\[56b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban glang mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung gtsang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa go cha sra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid kyi dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[57a.2\]]gshegs pa nor bu'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 
[\[57a.3\]]dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[57a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston ka ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma la phyag 'tshal 
[\[57a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[57a.6\]]gshegs pa dka' thub chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[57a.7\]]sa'i skye bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'thun bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo 
[\[57b.2\]]gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha'i blo gros dri ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med par grags pa la phyag 
[\[57b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i yan lag gi ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[57b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer drag po can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub mi dman pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[57b.5\]]pa tshe dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i lag pa la phyag 
[\[57b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[57b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtshungs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od phan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]bzhin mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs dan mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig 
[\[58a.2\]]rten dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shugs drag po bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[58a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gnas thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnas chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od 
[\[58a.4\]]gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal 
[\[58a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[58a.6\]]go cha sbyar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung tshig bden pa la phyag 
[\[58a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don rtogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[58b.2\]]gshegs pa shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gyi me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[58b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs 'jam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad 
[\[58b.4\]]mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsdu bar grub par gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag po sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[58b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[58b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[58b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs bzang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa go cha blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas pa'i blo 
[\[59a.3\]]gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shin tu 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu 
[\[59a.4\]]rtsa gsum pa/_bam po drug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan legs par sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bden pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don chud pa la phyag 
[\[59a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dzem pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzem pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[59a.6\]]nor bu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su shin tu chags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[59a.7\]]gshegs pa rin chen zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu chud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gzung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 
[\[59b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshugs par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[59b.3\]]gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpung bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[59b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa chu'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phar ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dal nas bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa btsan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[60a.2\]]me tog tsam pa ka'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi bajid mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dman pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gshegs 
[\[60a.3\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'gro ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'gro ba'i gtso la phyag 
[\[60a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bde ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nad sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul bzhin bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[60a.5\]]mos pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i yul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[60a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang phyug la 
[\[60a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzungs sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 
[\[60b.2\]]spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[60b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 
[\[60b.4\]]snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dper 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[60b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs 'byam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog sbyin 
[\[60b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bskyod mi nus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom sar bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan go cha la phyag 
[\[60b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'i zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[61a.2\]]pa shin tu mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba 
[\[61a.3\]]sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[61a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[61a.5\]]gshegs pa yon tan rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[61a.6\]]pa skyes bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[61a.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[61b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[61b.3\]]rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[61b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang po lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[61b.5\]]pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi yan lag dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bsil la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[61b.6\]]gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa rnam par sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 
[\[61b.7\]]ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par rtog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbang po tog pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyad pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[62a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrogs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dgyes 
[\[62a.3\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du shes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i dpal la phyag 
[\[62a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang zag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan 
[\[62a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[62a.6\]]pa gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mi dman pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i zhags pa la 
[\[62a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i lte ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs su gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gshegs pa zla ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar 
[\[62b.2\]]zhing bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo cher grags pa la 
[\[62b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma mkhan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[62b.4\]]tshul bzhin mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dam pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[62b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smrang 'dzin 
[\[62b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[62b.7\]]gshegs pa gzugs bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnas su 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[63a.2\]]rgyal bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[63a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 
[\[63a.4\]]mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi don sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[63a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan bzang la phyag 
[\[63a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub par dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba la phyag 
[\[63a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dbang po'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[63b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa btsud pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[63b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshim pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo zab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[63b.4\]]sman la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dbang po la phyag 
[\[63b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[63b.6\]]gshegs pa 'od pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[63b.7\]]bden pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang bskal pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[64a.2\]]gshegs pa bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[64a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gsung 'jam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor seng ge can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[64a.4\]]gshegs pa 'gag pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bos mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljongs kyi dbang po la phyag 
[\[64a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i ro stod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[64a.6\]]pa seng ge'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos bzhin bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 
[\[64a.7\]]sgul ba'i kha dog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa la 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spungs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bgegs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[64b.2\]]pa spyan bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mgu bar mdzad pa 
[\[64b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba khro bo la 
[\[64b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan 
[\[64b.5\]]rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[64b.6\]]spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[64b.7\]]sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[65a.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par sprul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[65a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od kyi rgyal po me 'od rab tu gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos dang me tog la dbang ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[65a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid nges par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[65a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' brtan dul ba zhi ba pha rol gyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla 'od skyabs gnas dam pa sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 
[\[65a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag mang 
[\[65a.7\]]du bya ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs sbyangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i shes rab la phyag 
[\[65b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[65b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha gir tha ya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha gir sa ya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa la phyag 
[\[65b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[65b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshim par 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[65b.6\]]phan par 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[65b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi rgyu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i snying 
[\[66a.2\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[66a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'bigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[66a.4\]]gshegs pa lha ma yin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[66a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dzum pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med mgu bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med pa'i mtha' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[66a.6\]]gshegs pa rgol ba'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i gzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 
[\[66a.7\]]bzhin gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge la phyag 'tshal 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos su 'dzud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul la phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa re 
[\[66b.2\]]ba'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zil gyis mi non pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[66b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha la phyag 
[\[66b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsngags pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[66b.5\]]gshegs pa mi 'khrul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 
[\[66b.6\]]zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yid 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[66b.7\]]gshegs pa ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi sdug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkar ba'i yang dkar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'dzin la phyag 'tshal 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[67a.2\]]pa dbyangs snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dkar por snang ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[67a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[67a.4\]]pa chos kyi dbang phyug ri'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yon tan stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[67a.5\]]pa dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mgu ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun mkhyen pa la phyag 
[\[67a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das par shin tu mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi dpyod par 
[\[67a.7\]]dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs btsun pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'i mchog tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyes 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang spyod byang chub blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rten dam pa la 
[\[67b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal 
[\[67b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[67b.4\]]dngos po ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi rten chen po la 
[\[67b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[67b.6\]]gshegs pa gsung mi nyams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams spel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brten pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[67b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rab tu shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i shing rta la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnga'i sprin sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mkhyen 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpung sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dam par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[68a.2\]]chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rnam par grol ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[68a.3\]]pa yon tan gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dang tha mi dad pa la phyag 
[\[68a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[68a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor spros pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab tu sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[68a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[68a.7\]]bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che bar bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin snyoms pa la phyag 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gog pa med pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[68b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin du myur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[68b.3\]]pa mkhyen pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid che 
[\[68b.4\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[68b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med la phyag 'tshal 
[\[68b.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[68b.7\]]gshegs pa bsod nams rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gangs dkar ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]thar pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis gtsug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi snang 
[\[69a.2\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' med brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[69a.3\]]gshegs pa gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol bzhin 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[69a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtsug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng 
[\[69a.5\]]ge'i 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sbyin med la phyag 
[\[69a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[69a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gshegs pa bde bar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par thar par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des pa'i rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul bzhin mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[69b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthos pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_/bam po bdun pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[69b.3\]]chen 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi dman pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma gu bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu ma ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[69b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dper 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phongs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[69b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i sred pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha mang pos bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[69b.6\]]gshegs pa phyag na pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa phun sum tshogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[69b.7\]]'khor bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thal pa'i gtso bo la 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bstod pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[70a.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i gtsug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[70a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gau ta mi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan pa'i thabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[70a.4\]]zla ba bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yan lag me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yang dag pa la 
[\[70a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzi brjid stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[70a.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gsung gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[70a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dang tha mi dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar par dgyes 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims mchog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub brtan pa la phyag 
[\[70b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye 
[\[70b.3\]]shes gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lung stsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri za ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[70b.4\]]gshegs pa rtag tu dus sbyin sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus su mi gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[70b.5\]]dbang po bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags pa'i bram ze la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gar yang mi 
[\[70b.6\]]bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog gis bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[70b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pas bstod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]pa rnam pa du ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[71a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[71a.3\]]gzi brjid mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar 
[\[71a.4\]]ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu spyad pa rnam par smin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu srid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 
[\[71a.5\]]dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rten dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gnon 
[\[71a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku bkra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[71a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod pa sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod pa las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gshegs pa dregs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor grol ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[71b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[71b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[71b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gsal 
[\[71b.5\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song 'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[71b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[71b.7\]]gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrul ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos phyag bya ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[72a.2\]]pa blo gros dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stor 
[\[72a.3\]]ba'i ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu zla ba bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[72a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa las 'das par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[72a.5\]]gshegs pa bde bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa mngon du dgyes pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[72a.6\]]spyod pa la mngon du byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ud pa la la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phreng ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa 
[\[72a.7\]]mtha' yas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dang 'dis mnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus can la 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung sgra chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[72b.2\]]gshegs pa rin chen dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'i shing rta la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'i 
[\[72b.3\]]phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me zer 'phro ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 
[\[72b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas pa gzi brjid phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par 'phar ba ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[72b.5\]]pa stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub spyad pa la phyag 
[\[72b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro byang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[72b.7\]]kho ra khor yug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog mchog dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mgo la phyag 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rin chen mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 
[\[73a.2\]]kyi 'gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[73a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa nor bu dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[73a.4\]]mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gsang 
[\[73a.5\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[73a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[73a.7\]]pa bsgoms pa'i me tog rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa rdzogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mnyam med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes so sor 'byed pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge mche ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol cing 'phar ba la phyag 
[\[73b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mar me'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rig dkar ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[73b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[73b.4\]]pa mi mnyam pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros brtags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i 
[\[73b.5\]]spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa myur bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[73b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde 'jam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rtse gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[73b.7\]]don du gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub shin tu spyad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'greng ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs rab tu spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa i ri lo ma'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[74a.2\]]pa mi'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyong ba'i ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog tsam pa rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74a.3\]]g.yang sa che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol po'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[74a.4\]]pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba sbyin par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[74a.5\]]gshegs pa grags pa che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lam grogs ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74a.6\]]mi khrel ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri shin tu bsrung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi mar me la phyag 'tshal 
[\[74a.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[74b.2\]]gshegs pa the tsom rnam par gtor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[74b.3\]]pa bdud rtsi'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[74b.4\]]pa 'phags pas gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud las rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par 
[\[74b.5\]]'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74b.6\]]dbyangs 'jam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid kyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[74b.7\]]blo brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs la phyag 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdig pa chen po kun tu gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[75a.2\]]gshegs pa snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i glal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom spong ba la 
[\[75a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang por snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[75a.4\]]gshegs pa dbang po dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[75a.5\]]gshegs pa rgyal ba'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog 
[\[75a.6\]]dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dri la 
[\[75a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phar bar sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang ba la 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[75b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[75b.3\]]dpyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dben pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang bar snang ba la 
[\[75b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me 
[\[75b.5\]]tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos rig par dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs sgra 'jam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge bar snang ba la phyag 
[\[75b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klog gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[75b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa nga ro 'jam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi rgyan 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na 
[\[76a.2\]]dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[76a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lha chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skag dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[76a.4\]]gshegs pa ri rab chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshon gyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par dgongs 
[\[76a.5\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu blo mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas pa la phyag 
[\[76a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[76a.7\]]gshegs pa zla ba 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don 'khrugs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]pa blo brtan pa'i don la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gus pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi rigs pa spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od shin tu 'jebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za 
[\[76b.2\]]bar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can 
[\[76b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[76b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo dgyes pa'i sde dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'phar ba ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[76b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs bzang ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[76b.6\]]pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub bro ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pun da ri ka'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od la phyag 
[\[76b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'gug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol cing bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan pa la

[\[77a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dam pa'i rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[77a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par rig pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[77a.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[77a.6\]]gshegs pa byang chub dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rnam par 'dzeg pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[77a.7\]]nyi zer sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen gyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med par dgyes pa la 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[77b.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mig tu mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[77b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bsam gyis 
[\[77b.4\]]mi khyab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs na dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa bla na med pa la phyag 
[\[77b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'jam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya bar bde ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[77b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyes pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo 
[\[77b.7\]]gdang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rnam par 'thor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer sna tshogs la 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zas mi gsol ba la phyag 'tshal
