[\[78a.2\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'phar ba ltar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snum pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[78a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gnyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsrung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i nor bu la phyag 
[\[78a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs par sbyor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[78a.5\]]gshegs pa don shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la 
[\[78a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'bigs pa'i pad mo spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od btsun pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mtha' yas pa la phyag 
[\[78a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'gug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs la 
[\[78b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[78b.3\]]pa rlung la dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla bas byin la 
[\[78b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgyes pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[78b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dpa' ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[78b.6\]]gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgongs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzi 
[\[78b.7\]]brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dpung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar mdzad pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shin tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[79a.2\]]gshegs pa dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[79a.3\]]gshegs pa 'chi med rab tu sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od phun sum tshogs 
[\[79a.4\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[79a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'phar ba'i bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lhar ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod 
[\[79a.6\]]nams dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang ba la phyag 
[\[79a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'gug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od la 
[\[79b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[79b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[79b.4\]]bcom par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan spyod 
[\[79b.5\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[79b.6\]]gshegs pa brtson 'grus brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan mtha' yas 
[\[79b.7\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mchod rten 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[80a.2\]]gshegs pa mchog gi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga med dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros khyad par can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong go cha la phyag 'tshal 
[\[80a.3\]]lo//_//sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/_bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba 
[\[80a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyan bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[80a.5\]]gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[80a.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa las su byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[80a.7\]]dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad du grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu mar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdza' bar gcugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs rnam par 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[80b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa blo skyon med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gling la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa 
[\[80b.3\]]zil gyis mi non pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[80b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 
[\[80b.5\]]'chi ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag por 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[80b.6\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[80b.7\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtse grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]tan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa'i grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdud pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[81a.2\]]rgyal bar nus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtse gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che rnam par 'phar 
[\[81a.3\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhin spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[81a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa bzhin sgrogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo 'khrul pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[81a.5\]]gshegs pa gti mug spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ba'i shing rta can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa 
[\[81a.6\]]rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar chags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub par 
[\[81a.7\]]bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don du dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsrung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 'gug 
[\[81b.2\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gsal ba la phyag 'tshal 
[\[81b.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung zhim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mkhyen par gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[81b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[81b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don shin tu brtags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[81b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[81b.7\]]pa dbyangs mnyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rin che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba la phyag 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ma grogs ded pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[82a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' la phyag 'tshal 
[\[82a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa sdud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar 
[\[82a.4\]]brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[82a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sas byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun ston pa 
[\[82a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyor bar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta phun sum can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[82a.7\]]gshegs pa dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos chud dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[82b.2\]]gshegs pa dpal bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal 
[\[82b.3\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[82b.4\]]gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs par mdzad pa la phyag 
[\[82b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung 
[\[82b.6\]]che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub 
[\[82b.7\]]tu 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung drag por dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[83a.2\]]pa seng ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[83a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang bar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des par bzhud pa 
[\[83a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[83a.5\]]pa seng ge bsgyings pa ltar dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlung dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dregs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[83a.6\]]gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs yid bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan 
[\[83a.7\]]mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gyis mchod pa la phyag 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab shin tu dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thos pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sde rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo bden pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 
[\[83b.2\]]rtsi'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klur 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[83b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa bden pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ud pa la'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 
[\[83b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[83b.5\]]pa mtha' yas spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khrel ba med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snang mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mdzes pa la phyag 
[\[83b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim par bsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dri bsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[83b.7\]]gshegs pa blo gros dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa rigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rab tu 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla mar dgyes pa la 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mang por dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don du dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar kun tu spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo spong ba la phyag 
[\[84a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa snyoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[84a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom las rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[84a.4\]]gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla re chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud par dgyes pa la 
[\[84a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[84a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston gyi nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[84a.7\]]shing rgyal me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'bebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[84b.2\]]gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 
[\[84b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gtsang mar dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rnam par bcom pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[84b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[84b.5\]]pa mi phan mi 'chi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa slon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i dpal la phyag 
[\[84b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[84b.7\]]gshegs pa dbyangs bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]mdangs thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bde ba la phyag 
[\[85a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[85a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub phun sum tshogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[85a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pas bstsags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[85a.5\]]gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyon dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs su 'gro bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[85a.6\]]nad med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bstsags pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 
[\[85a.7\]]ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par dgongs pa 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[85b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i spyod yul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[85b.3\]]pa yon tan kun tu khyab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[85b.4\]]'khrul pa med par sbyor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 
[\[85b.5\]]'chi bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi phan tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i me tog 
[\[85b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlabs srub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dpe med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[85b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs snyoms par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya cher nus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thos pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[86a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[86a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer snang ba mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[86a.4\]]gshegs pa dbang po dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan gyis thar pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[86a.5\]]gsal bar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mu rten gyen du byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 
[\[86a.6\]]stong gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khur bor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[86a.7\]]dbang du gyur pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]bdud rtsi'i gdang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa 
[\[86b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid 
[\[86b.3\]]phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa gdang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 
[\[86b.4\]]gnas par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mu rten bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[86b.5\]]pa nyi ma'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs pa'i rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i phyag brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyid 
[\[86b.6\]]pa'i grogs po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdug pa bden pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar dbang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[86b.7\]]rin chen gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od brtags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]gtsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi gzi brjid bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs gzhal du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[87a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87a.3\]]pa rnam par 'phar ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcings med re ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87a.4\]]pa snyoms par thub pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dar drag spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes myur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan du bsgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87a.5\]]pa thar pa bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba sdug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[87a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87a.7\]]pa tshul khrims dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'chi ba'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]pa mi tshugs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'chi ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyoms par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[87b.2\]]bsod nams kyi blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam pa mang por snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i so la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sgra la 
[\[87b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal ba la 
[\[87b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rol par bcas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me chen po la phyag 
[\[87b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa myos pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog la phyag 
[\[87b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshems yid du 'ong 
[\[87b.7\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yid mi 'chab pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin pa byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid la re ba rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[88a.2\]]pa 'od pa las rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bsreg pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med 
[\[88a.3\]]par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dam 
[\[88a.4\]]par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa cher dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[88a.5\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[88a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 'phar ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha ma yin 'bigs pa mi zad pa'i lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su rig par mdzad pa'i 
[\[88a.7\]]gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i skyid pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi ba med pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa med par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa dgra bcom pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan shin tu bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[88b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba ma yin pa 
[\[88b.3\]]bskyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog tsam pa ka'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[88b.4\]]gzi brjid thabs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba dga' bar 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal bar dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[88b.5\]]pa rab tu snang ba'i pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab tu zhim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa mi dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[88b.6\]]gyen du 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten gyi rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od snang 
[\[88b.7\]]ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs shin tu che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros btsan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ri dbang blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[89a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'char pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sgom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus skyed par 
[\[89a.3\]]dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul las rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo bsgoms par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung dgyes pa la 
[\[89a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyob 
[\[89a.5\]]pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul 'jig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[89a.6\]]gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rnam par zhi ba 
[\[89a.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbang po la phyag 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsir dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[89b.2\]]phun sum grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa mtha' yas pa la 
[\[89b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89b.4\]]pa tshim par mdzad pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos bzhin bzhud pa la 
[\[89b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan 'di thos nas ni/_/bag yod rim gro skyed cing 
[\[89b.6\]]rig par bya/_/phun sum 'di la ma dad spong na ni/_/ngan song sdug bsngal phyir yang myong nga re/_/rim bzhin tshul khrims la ni brten nas su/_/thos la dad cing rab tu dben par ldan/_/zab mo bzod pa yongs su bkang nas ni/_/des ni 'jig rten mgon po 'di kun mthong /_/las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin mi 
[\[89b.7\]]shes te/_/bskal pa bye bar sdig pa'i las byas pas/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan 'di 'dzin na ni/_/de kun byang nas sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]{D263}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya saM myaka tsAr+ya br-it+ta ga ga na war+Na bi na ya k+ShA n+ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs 
[\[90a.2\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das byed pa can na rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ri la drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas 
[\[90a.3\]]pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprul pa/_tshad med pa'i byams pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[90a.4\]]kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/_tshad med pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/_tshad med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas kun tu ngoms pa/_tshad med pa'i btang snyoms 
[\[90a.5\]]kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_chos kyi sprin dang /_lhag mthong dang /_rig pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyis ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/_bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las 
[\[90a.6\]]bsgral bar bya ba'i ye shes dang /_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir byams pa dang /_khong khro ba med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag pa/_chos kyis yang dag par 'jug pa/_ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/_'jig rten la mchog gi lam 
[\[90a.7\]]yang dag par ston pa/_/sems can rnam par rgyas shing dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sred pa'i chu brkam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa zla ba lta bu/_sems can thams cad kyi sems mtshungs par 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par ston pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod chos rin po ches yongs su bkang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir skye bo thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/_
[\[90b.2\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo'i rjes su zhugs pa/_mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/_bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i 
[\[90b.3\]]yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/_rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/_bag chags thams cad rjes su 'brel pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa/_tshad med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_
[\[90b.4\]]bzod pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgyings 
[\[90b.5\]]pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngur smrig seng ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[90b.6\]]sems dpa' ri rab mtshams zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[90b.7\]]sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu bo che zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang /_sngon du 'gro ba drang srong rta rlung dang /_drang srong stong phrag sum 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]cu dang /_lha bran brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la bka' stsal pa/_legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng 
[\[91a.2\]]ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/_nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[91a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa la rnam par kun tu bltas te/_pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so/_/de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/_
[\[91a.4\]]phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas btags pa ni ji lta bu lags/_de skad ces 
[\[91a.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bya ba dang /_de de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas btags pa ni ji tsam zhes dge slong khyod de skad 'dri'am/_bcom ldan 
[\[91a.6\]]'das de bzhin no/_/de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong 
[\[91a.7\]]'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/_snod kyi 'jig rten dang /_'du byed kyi 'jig rten no/_/dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni gang /_'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni gang zhe na/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams ji tsam pa ni snod ces 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bya'o/_/dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams yod de/_dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang nang gi sra ba'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni 'di lta ste/_rus pa dang /_sen mo dang /_so'i bar du ste/_'di dag ni nang gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams 
[\[91b.2\]]gang zhe na/_gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni 'di lta ste/_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baidUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_rdo dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_gram bu dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_shing dang /_rtswa dang /_sman dang /_
[\[91b.3\]]phyag dar dang /_'di dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/chu'i khams gang zhe na/_phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod/_nang gi chu'i khams kyang yod de/_de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/_lus 'di la chu dang /_chu'i khams kyi mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_rnag dang /_khrag 
[\[91b.4\]]dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dang /_glad rgyas dang /_mchil ma dang /[ (]rdul [,]rngul [)]dang /_ngar snabs dang /_snabs dang /_rgyungs pa dang /_rkang dang /_gcin yod pa kun tu len pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/_gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[91b.5\]]chu dang /_chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang /_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_dar ba dang /_bu ram dang /_shing gi ro dang /_chang dang /_rtsab mo dang /_bu ram chang dang /_me tog chang dang /_lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun du len pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so/_/de la nang gi me'i khams gang 
[\[91b.6\]]zhe na/_lus 'di la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dro ba nyid du ba dang /_gdungs pa dang /_rims dang /_yongs su tshig pa dang /_des zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni nang gi me'i khams 
[\[91b.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/_gang me'i gdung ba dang /_nyi ma'i gdung ba dang /_nor bu'i gdung ba dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_shing dang /_rtswa'i dro ba dang /_lci ba'i dro ba dang /_phyag dar gyi dro ba dang /_'di dag ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la nang gi rlung 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gi khams gang zhe na/_gang lus 'di la gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang /_thur du rgyu ba'i rlung dang /_ma zhu ba'i rlung dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang /_'di ni nang gi rlung rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/_gang phyi rol tu yang dag par rgyu ba'i 
[\[92a.2\]]rlung dang /_rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang /_gyen du rgyu ba dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba'i dmu rlung phyed pa mang po dang /_sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang /_phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya ste/_de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten 
[\[92a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/'di gang gi snod ce na/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i snod do/_/dge slong dag phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa'am/_dga' ba'am/_byams pa'am/_chags pa'am/_rgya che ba'am/_nga yir bya ba'am/_bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar 
[\[92a.4\]]bya'o zhes so sor bslab par bya'o/_/gang la la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i phyi dang nang gi'am/_che ba'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_bzang ba'am/_gang ring ba'am/_gang nye ba'am/_'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[92a.5\]]gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag ni bdag gi ma yin/_bdag kyang de'i ma yin/_de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du 
[\[92a.6\]]yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis shin tu brtan par byed do/_/shin tu yid la byas pa'i dge slong de sred pa dang /_rgud pa dang /_lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten no/_/dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang 
[\[92a.7\]]zhe na/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni 'du byed ces bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no/_/dge slong dag sems 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]can ji tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang /_ldan pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa'am/_/dga' ba'am/_byams pa'am/_chags 
[\[92b.2\]]pa'am/_rgya che ba'am/_nga yir bya ba'am/_bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor bslab par bya'o/_/gang cung zad 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'am/_phyi'i 'am/_nang gi'am/_che ba'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_bzang ba'am/_gang ring ba 
[\[92b.3\]]'am/_gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_bdag kyang de'i ma yin/_de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/gang la la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'am/_phyi'i 
[\[92b.4\]]'am/_nang gi'am/_che ba'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_bzang ba'am/_gang ring ba'am/_gang nye ba tshor ba dang /_gang la la 'du shes dang /_gang la la 'du byed dang /_gang cung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin/_bdag kyang de'i ma yin/_de bdag ma 
[\[92b.5\]]yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' phung 
[\[92b.6\]]po rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi phung po dang /_tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[92b.7\]]pa phung po lnga po de dag ni ji lta bu/_gzugs kyi phung po ni gang /_'dod pa'i khams mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]gam/_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_/lus dang yid kyi mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol 
[\[93a.2\]]ba ni gang /_ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang yid kyang mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[93a.3\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba'am/_'on te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol 
[\[93a.4\]]ba dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba'am/_ci 'das pa gzugs kyi phung po'am/_mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang lce 
[\[93a.5\]]dang /_lus dang /_yid nas mig gi bar du'am/_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/_'on te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig 
[\[93a.6\]]gam/_'on te da ltar byung ba gzugs kyi phung po'am/_mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/_'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar 
[\[93a.7\]]du'am/_'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs kyi phung po'am/_mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_de rna ba nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/_'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas byang 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/_mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/_mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[93b.2\]]phung po dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/_skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing ldang ba'ang ma yin/_phung po ni ngag gi lam dang /_dbyangs dang /_sgra dang brjod pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni 
[\[93b.3\]]skad cig ma ste/_dngos po dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o/_/dbyangs dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste mtshan ma med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o/_/
[\[93b.4\]]stong pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o/_/tshig med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o/_/mi khom pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o/_/rkyen med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni sbyor ba dang bral ba'o/_/dmigs pa med pa'o/_/chos 
[\[93b.5\]]thams cad ni lta ba dang bral ba'o/_/mtshan nyid dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o/_/bdag med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba'o/_/brjod du med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni yi ge dang bral ba'o/_/rab tu zhi ba'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[93b.6\]]ni chos nyid mi thob pa'o/_/mi snang ba thob pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni snang ba dang bral ba'o/_/shin tu yul med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni yul dang bral ba'o/_/shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni dbang po med pa'o/_/shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[93b.7\]]ni spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/gnyen po med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni sems med pa'o/_/chags pa dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phros pa'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'jungs pa med pa'o/_/spros pa dang bral ba'o/_/chos 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]thams cad ni shin tu bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/_/g.yo ba dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni shin tu sgrib pa med pa'o/_/rdul dang bral ba'o/_/shin tu bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o/_/stobs chung ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni 
[\[94a.2\]]rtsom pa dang bral ba'o/_/dngos po med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral ba'o/_/byed pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni las mi ston pa'o/_/tshor ba med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o/_/thos pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni dbyangs 
[\[94a.3\]]dang bral ba'o/_/gzung du med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis sdug pa'o/_/shes pa med pa'o/_chos thams cad ni tshor ba chags pa med pa'o/_/smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o/_/brag ca lta bu'o/_/chos thams 
[\[94a.4\]]cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o/_/gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad ni rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o/_/gzugs brnyan la brten pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni sprin mi dmigs pa'o/_/nam 
[\[94a.5\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan no/_/bstan du med pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'o/_/dngos po dang bral ba'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa nas/_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang /_mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /_mtshan nyid med 
[\[94a.6\]]pa'i bar du'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o/_/ngar sems pa med pa'o/_/rten med pa'o/_/brjod du med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad ni skad cig ma zad pa dang bral ba'o 
[\[94a.7\]]zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa spros pa med pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/'di la rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gi bzod pa bsgom pa na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo/_/bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa 
[\[94b.2\]]dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba ni 'di lta ste/_zas kyi char ram/_skom gyi char ram/_gos sam/_lhab lhub ba bam/_dri'am/_me tog gam/_rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[94b.3\]]kyi char yang rab tu 'ong ngo /_/gang sems can zas dang /_skom de yongs su zos pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba 'thob pa'i sems can de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_bdag med pa/_stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang /_tshul khrims thob bo/_
[\[94b.4\]]khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang /_khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong gi cha byad kyi rtswa dang /_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nye bar 
[\[94b.5\]]len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang /_shu ba dang /_zug rngu dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yid la byed do/_/mngon 
[\[94b.6\]]par shes pa lnga thob bo/_/tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i bar du yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol 
[\[94b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de bzhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyim pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang /_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad dbyangs med pa'o/_/bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o/_/
[\[95a.2\]]chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam mo/_/gnas yang dag par spong ba'o/_/yi ge med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/mi skye ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/ma 'gags pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni sngon gyi 
[\[95a.3\]]dam tshig mi gtong ba'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o/_/rkyen med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'o/_/gnas med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni rtsom pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag 
[\[95a.4\]]gir bya ba dang /_nga yir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni dben pa'o/_/'du 'dzi yang dag par gtong ba'o/_/bdag med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du'o/_/rab tu zhi ba'o/_/mi snang ba thob pa'o/_/mi gnas 
[\[95a.5\]]pa'o/_/shin tu yul med pa'o/_/shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o/_/shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o/_/gnyen po med pa'o/_kha zas med pa'o/_/shin tu 'thor ba med pa'o/_/'jungs pa med pa'o/_/shin tu bsam gtan byed pa'o/_/shin tu bsgribs pa med pa'o/_/shin tu 'ong ba 
[\[95a.6\]]med pa'o/_/nyam chung ba'o/_/dngos po med pa'o/_/byed pa med pa'o/_/tshor ba med pa'o/_/zag pa med pa'o/_/'dzin pa med pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa med pa'o/_/smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/brag ca lta bu'o/_/mig yor lta bu'o/_/chu zla lta bu'o/_/gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/nam 
[\[95a.7\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/_/dngos po med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang /_mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/ngar sems pa med pa'o/_/
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gzung du med pa'o/_/brjod du med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni skad cig ma'o/_/'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/chos thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/mnyam pa'i sems dang /_rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang /_
[\[95b.2\]]'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang /_'byung ba med pa'i sems dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /_chod pa med pa'i sems dang /_phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang /_rten med pa'i sems dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[95b.3\]]de bzhin du nye bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /_tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba thob pa de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag 
[\[95b.4\]]pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_bdag med pa/_stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang /_tshul khrims thob bo/_/khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang /_khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[95b.5\]]drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_rtswa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang /_shu ba dang /_zug rngu dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[95b.6\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yid la byed do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa sgom pa de ni ming mi dmigs sems can mi dmigs/_srog mi dmigs/_
[\[95b.7\]]gso ba mi dmigs/_gang zag mi dmigs/_gzugs mi dmigs/_tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/_mig mi dmigs/_rna ba'ang ma yin/_sna'ang ma yin/_lce'ang ma yin/_lus kyang mi dmigs/_yid kyang 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]mi dmigs so/_/gzugs mi dmigs/_sgra mi dmigs/_dri mi dmigs/_ro mi dmigs/_reg mi dmigs/_chos mi dmigs/_yid mi dmigs/_lus mi dmigs/_tshig mi dmigs/_sems mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid mi sogs pa/_
[\[96a.2\]]mtshan ma med pa/_thub pa/_khams gsum gtong ba med pa/_mngon par 'du mi byed pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma bsgoms pa/_ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so/_/ma byas pa/_bya ba med pa de sngon gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/_phyi ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med pa/_dbus 
[\[96a.3\]]kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa/_mi gnas pa/_mi dmigs pa/_yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa 'di bsgom pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[96a.4\]]dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya bas legs so zhes bya ba byas te/_byang chub sems 
[\[96a.5\]]dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang /_de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ci la bsams te rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du 
[\[96a.6\]]byed thams cad ston/_gal te gzugs bdag med pa/_mi snang ba/_kun nas ldang ba med pa/_yid la mi byed pa/_mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_rgyu ba med pa'am/_'on te 'di lta ci/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba'am/_gso ba'am/_
[\[96a.7\]]gang zag gam/_shed las skyes pa'am/_shed can nam/_byed pa po'am/_tshor ba po'am/_tshor ba gzhan nam/_skye ba'am/_yang dag par skye ba'am/_gang mi dga' ba dang /_mi 'byung ba med par mi 'gyur ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung /_snying rje chen po ni gang 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]na/_chos 'chad pa ni su zhig_/chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig_/bslab pa sdom pa ni gang na gnas/_gal te phung por mi 'gyur na de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na/_legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i 
[\[96b.2\]]las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du smin/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung /_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba rnams dang /_lha dang mi rnams dang /_gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang du byung /_
[\[96b.3\]]bdag ni stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong drug cu tsam stan las langs te dong nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs pa dang gnong bar gyur 
[\[96b.4\]]to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/don gyi dbang gang mthong na 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par ston/_
[\[96b.5\]]rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan dag las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa dang /_dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa dang /_'jungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa la 
[\[96b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa dang /_le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang /_gtam ngan pa'o zhes 'di ltar gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan pa/_
[\[96b.7\]]mtshams med par byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar bya'o/_/log par lta ba'i lus can rnams la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/_/brkam pa rnams la tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/_/nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_kha zas la 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]chags pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/_/ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/_/mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/_/'dod pa la spyod pa'i lhar 
[\[97a.2\]]skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/_/gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha dang dpal mi smra bar bya'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la 
[\[97a.3\]]gzugs la spyod pa'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/_/gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[97a.4\]]theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o/_/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i 
[\[97a.5\]]dngos po rnam pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[97a.6\]]gtam mi smra bar bya'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zab mo 'di mi smra bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po 
[\[97a.7\]]de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me la legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do/_/legs so legs so shes rab che/_/rnam par shes 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]pas mchog gcod pa/_/mtshan nyid thabs dang chos rnams kyi/_/dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes/_/'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa la/_/chos 'di brjod par mi byed do/_/nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi/_/
[\[97b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu/_/chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/_/tshul 'di kun du shes par 'gyur/_/nam mkha' ji ltar mtho med la/_/dma' ba med cing gzugs med pa/_/shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med/_/bskal 
[\[97b.3\]]pa grangs med pa dag gi/_/'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni/_/smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la/_/khyod kyi chos 'di thos pa dang /_/ji ltar rgyal ba des bstan pa'i/_/grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la/_/'jigs med pa 'di rab tu 
[\[97b.4\]]bstan/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing /_/yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa/_/skal ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni/_/chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan/_/nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang /_/rang rgyal dag gi mngon dga' la/_/chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/_/de nyid 'tshang rgyar 
[\[97b.5\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/mi shes pas ni spong ba dang /_/mos pa med par skyes pas na/_/bsod nams mang po 'byung med cing /_/ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro/_/ting 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni/_/gal te de lus sbyang byas te/_/byang chub lam la brtson bya'i phyir/_/la 
[\[97b.6\]]la thabs dang de bral ba/_/'khor dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang /_/sems kyis rtog par mi byed do/_/'chal pa'i shes rab snod min la/_/stong pa zhi ba smra bar byed/_/de yang myur du spangs pas na/_/mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag_/gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la/_/
[\[97b.7\]]myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song du/_/lha ma yin dang lus srul po/_/gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yang /_/yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o/_/mir gyur dka' byed thob pa dag_/gal te ji ltar thob na yang /_/smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni/_/'on 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]pa long ba zhar ba dang /_/rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba/_/skur pa 'debs shing mchod pa med/_/zas dang skom dang bral ba ste/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/_/pha dang ma la bkur sti med/_/nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod/_/sems can rnams la 
[\[98a.2\]]snying rje med/_/ngan 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni rab tu song ba yi/_/dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/_/yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba/_/ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro/_/lus dbang byas pa'i sems can 'di/_/gang gis bzod pa 'di bstan cing /_/thabs la mngon sum 
[\[98a.3\]]ma yin pa/_/des ni dge slong de song ngo /_/ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dag_/pha rol sems la lta ba yi/_/'jig rten la ni sgron 'dzin pa/_/sems can kun la sman par smra/_/thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa/_/thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la/_/ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[98a.4\]]'khor rnams la/_/de 'dra bar ni chos kyang shod/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams te/_nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag 
[\[98a.5\]]gis yongs su shes so/_/rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pa na/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 
[\[98a.6\]]'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing /_bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar 
[\[98a.7\]]mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la bab par shes/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa/_/ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin/_/grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad/_/rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston/_/
[\[98b.2\]]rgyal ba nyi ma grol la mar me mdzad/_/sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa/_/lam rnams rab bstan lam ni khyod ston pa/_/mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs/_/thugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin/_/
[\[98b.3\]]thub pa 'jig rten zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/_/tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston/_/snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzod pa/_/khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che/_/rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa/_/bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston/_/thub pa seng ge mu 
[\[98b.4\]]stegs 'jigs par mdzad/_/'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la ping ka'i skad/_/mu stegs can gyi 'khor [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnam 'jig pa/_/mar me'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod/_/sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/_/bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro mi mdzad/_/mthon 
[\[98b.5\]]po ma yin da ltar mtho min pa/_/yongs min gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/_/ye shes mchog gis nga yi nga rgyal gyi/_/rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor/_/des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa/_/lam gyi me yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams/_/khyod 
[\[98b.6\]]kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig_/klu lta bur ni chos kyi char gtong ba/_/des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste/_/yongs su smin la gzigs shing bzod 'di gsung /_/sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed/_/bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing /_/
[\[98b.7\]]gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur/_/de thob pa yi yon tan 'di mtha' yas/_/spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi/_/thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang /_/da ltar gyi yang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa/_/thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 
[\[99a\]]
