[\[99a.1\]]'di yang gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[99a.2\]]rgyas de dag gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so snyam mo/_/lha bran gyis gsol pa/_spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa 'di bstan nas ji lta bu'i spos kyi ngad 
[\[99a.3\]]ldang ba'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i 
[\[99a.4\]]bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang /_spyod lam dang /_mtshan ma dang /_dbyibs kun tu snang ste/_drang srong de yang rgan po dang /_rgas pa dang /_'khogs pa dang /_skra ring po'i ral pa 
[\[99a.5\]]'chang ba dang /_ag tsom ring po dang /_dbyug pa dang /_ril ba dang /_gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg chen po 'bar bar byed do/_/de las kyang 'od kyi phung bo kha dog sna tshogs dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /_kha dog brgya stong du ma dang /_kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs 
[\[99a.6\]]su dag pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i zhing stong pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang /_rin po che dang /_glog dang /_'od dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang 
[\[99a.7\]]ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lta ba yang mi mngon mi snang ngo /_/de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang /_brjod pa dang /_dbyangs dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_chung ngu na sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung gi sgra yang mi grag 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]go/_/de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang /_lus dang mtshan ma dang /_dbyibs kun tu snang ngo /_/yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[99b.2\]]pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/_rang rgyal ba'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni kun tu mi snang ngo /_/yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa yang mi 
[\[99b.3\]]mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der 'dug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zhing /_de byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gang yang 'dir 'dug 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang ba yang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[99b.4\]]mi mthong ngo /_/snang ba rgya chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes kau di n+ya la smras pa/_gnas brtan kau di n+ya bcom ldan 'das gang na kau di n+yas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[99b.5\]]mi shes so/_/mi mthong ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od srung chen po la smras pa/_sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang 
[\[99b.6\]]na zhes bya ba mi shes so/_/mi mthong ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig_/shA ri'i 
[\[99b.7\]]bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so/_/mi mthong ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po des maud gal ya na la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal ya na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig_/maud gal ya nas smras pa/_gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 
[\[100a.2\]]kyis rjes su shes kyi/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni mi mthong ngo /_/mi shes so/_/de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/_lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/_
[\[100a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/_gang na gnas/_spyod pa ni ci 'dra ci 'drar spyod/_khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos/_ma 'gags pas smras pa/_kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/_bcom 
[\[100a.4\]]ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/_gang du bzhud ces bya ba dag kyang mi shes so/_/mi mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi_/bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni de la 
[\[100a.5\]]'jug go/_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/_gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang /_de nas nyan thos chen po des byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[100a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis phung po bshad par byas pa de na dge slong drug cu tsam po stan las langs te dong bas/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig 
[\[100a.7\]]tu spyod do/_/bdag cag ni rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyam ste/_de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de/_bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/_gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa de bdag cag gi 
[\[100b.2\]]mkhan por bzung ngo zhes/_/bdag cag rnam par blta bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa/_'khogs pa/_gtugs pa rnams me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_sman dang /_zas dang /_
[\[100b.3\]]skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo /_/drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i 
[\[100b.4\]]rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig 
[\[100b.5\]]pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma 
[\[100b.6\]]yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dong ngo /_/'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul 
[\[100b.7\]]nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bstan pa'i phyir/_chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa la yang /_'jug par bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/_/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]lam des drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/_de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_nor mdog dang /_'jog po dang /_yid yod la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drug cu tsam lhan cig 
[\[101a.2\]]tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_byi ru dang /_a sma gar ba dang /_mu sa ra ga la ba la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu dang /_dngul 
[\[101a.3\]]gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu nas mu sa ra gal ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to/_/shing ta la'i phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa 
[\[101a.4\]]sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zhing dpag tshad bcu pa sbyangs so/_/lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas/_mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur 
[\[101a.5\]]sprul to/_/gser gyi shing rta la dngul gyi snying po 'phyang ba nas/_mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o/_/'og logs su bai dUr+ya bzang po nas/_gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o/_/sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu 
[\[101a.6\]]gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi phye ma bdal ba/_rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_a sho ka dang /_mu tsu 
[\[101a.7\]]kun da dang /_man 'dzu sha ka dang /_ba ta li dang /_pa ri sha ka dang /_g+han d+ha da nu pa ska ri dang /_su mar dang /_a mra dang /_'dzam bu dang /_mri na la dang /_mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to/_/sa bla na gnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]sbyong bar byed do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to/_/rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang /_do shal dang /_rgyan rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/'phrul dga'i 
[\[101b.2\]]lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu brtseg ma mngon par sprul to/_/khang bu brtseg ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis byas so/_/khang bu brtseg ma de la yang lha rdzas kyi do shal sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs 
[\[101b.3\]]dang /_rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to/_/khang bu brtseg ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rol mo dkrol ba dang /_glu'i sgra bsgrags pa des stong 
[\[101b.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par gyur to/_/klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab bo/_/dga' 
[\[101b.5\]]ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste/_lha rdzas kyi me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ba ri ya tra dang /_'dzo sha dang /_'dzo sha ka chen po dang /_ro tsa dang /_ro tsa ka chen po dang /_bal la dang /_bal la chen po dang /_
[\[101b.6\]]tsakra dang /_tsakra chen po'i 'od dri ma med pa/_'dab ma brgya pa/_'dab ma stong pa/_'dab ma brgya stong pa/_kun nas 'od/_kun nas dri/_kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/_rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba/_kha dog mtha' med pa/_bltar 'os pa mig gis mngon par dga' ba/_
[\[101b.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so/_/char pa'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo/_
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]klu'i glang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste/_mu tig sngon po'i char dang /_go shir sha'i snying po'i char la sogs te/_char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo/_/gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[102a.2\]]rten gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha'am/_lha'i dbang po'am/_klu 'am/_klu'i dbang po'am/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_
[\[102a.3\]]grul bum dang /_grul bum gyi dbang po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dang /_rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang 
[\[102a.4\]]brdung ba dang /_glu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pa'i zhal la rnam par lta ba'i phyir 'khod do/_/gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/_nam mkha' lding gi bu mo 
[\[102a.5\]]'am/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo'am/_mi'am ci'i bu mo'am lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba dang /_glu yongs su bzung ste/_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan 
[\[102a.6\]]dang /_shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis khad kyis rab tu phab bo/_/mi'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no/_/tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[102a.7\]]brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la stod cing spyan sngar 'khod do/_/brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing /_mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis stod cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par lta'o/_/klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang 
[\[102b.2\]]drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun tu reg pa/_mchog tu dri zhim pa/_mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo /_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong rgan 
[\[102b.3\]]por gyur nas gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/_/grul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad kyis gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs 
[\[102b.4\]]su 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi 'phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 
[\[102b.5\]]'bebs so/_/klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi 
[\[102b.6\]]cha byad kyis tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srog gi cha byad kyis rgyan gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon 
[\[102b.7\]]par rab tu 'bebs so/_/lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do/_/sa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do/_/bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]nam mkha' la 'phyen to/_/bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go/_/drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang /_drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 
[\[103a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man dA ra ba chen po blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba'i char rab tu 'byin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i 
[\[103a.3\]]zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par gyur to/_/lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/_/dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 
[\[103a.4\]]'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo /_/de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa lha bran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103a.5\]]la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/sems can mi srun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog_/mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzungs ngan 'dren mdzad cing /_/sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa/_/rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir 
[\[103a.6\]]gshegs gsol/_/sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing /_/'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis/_/bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol/_/'gro la phyin ci log bzhi rnam par grol/_/'khor 
[\[103a.7\]]bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur zhing /_/'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa/_/zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol/_/thub pa phung po lnga 'di rab ston pa/_/'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnam grol zhing /_/'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa/_/
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'gro ba lnga yi btson ra rnam par bkrol/_/dbang po drug 'dul gnas pa skyon med cing /_/sred lus drug la shin tu rnam grol shes/_/sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog_/spos kyi ngad ldan ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/rgyal ba mnyam bzhag rab tu dul ba'i 
[\[103b.2\]]thugs/_/shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog_/ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad/_/kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spyon/_/rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa/_/ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas/_/khyod ni mun pas bsgribs la ye shes 
[\[103b.3\]]ston/_/thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag_/'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing /_/mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa/_/mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs gas gsol/_/sbyin dang 'dul ba 
[\[103b.4\]]gtong zhing dul ba'i thugs/_/sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog_/sems can dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod/_/spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing /_/bar 'gar rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la 
[\[103b.5\]]bzhugs/_/dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa/_/thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston/_/bA rA Na sIr 'khor lo dam pa bskor/_/shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod cig gsungs/_/'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba/_/spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod 
[\[103b.6\]]pa gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang /_de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[103b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba'am/_gang sa la rgyu ba'am/_gang chu la rgyu ba de 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo /_/mig gi gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan 
[\[104a.2\]]pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_me'i brtul zhugs can dang /_zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang /_nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang /_'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang /_de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba 
[\[104a.3\]]nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa/_log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so/_/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yo ba 'di dang /_snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_
[\[104a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan sngar gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[104a.5\]]zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang ba de me tog man dA ra ba chen por kun tu gnas par 'dug par gyur to/_/'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang /_gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad 
[\[104a.6\]]drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/_de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der 
[\[104a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang /_lus dang /_dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang lus dang dbyibs kyis mthong ngo /_/
[\[104b.2\]]mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu/_ci'i rkyen gyis na gang me tog mer snang ba bai dUr+ya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/_theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par 
[\[104b.3\]]zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[104b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston 
[\[104b.5\]]par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to/_/
[\[104b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bzod pa 'di'i thog ma dang tha ma ji lta bu zhig bka' stsal pa/_bzod pa 'di ni mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o/_/de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/chu bo bzhi gang 
[\[104b.7\]]zhe na/_'dod pa'i chu bo dang /_lta ba'i chu bo dang /_srid pa'i chu bo dang /_ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par len du 'jug pa/_'jug par byed pa/_so sor dgod par byed pa'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas la 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]dad pa mi phyed pa/_sems can rnams yang dag par len du 'jug pa/_'jug par byed pa/_so sor dgod par byed pa'o/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo 
[\[105a.2\]]las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed 
[\[105a.3\]]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/chos la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas 
[\[105a.4\]]sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston par byed pa'o/_/sbyin pas sems can rnams tshe'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/don bya bas sems can 
[\[105a.5\]]rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/don 'thun pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[105a.6\]]pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la dbab par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes 
[\[105a.7\]]dpal dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs nas bskor 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]ba byas te 'khod do/_/skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das drang srong shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to/_/de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med 
[\[105b.2\]]pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_rnam par ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhags so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed 
[\[105b.3\]]las shin tu 'das te/_de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[105b.4\]]sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang /_lus dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo /_/sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 
[\[105b.5\]]chen po de la yongs su zhus pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/_de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos 
[\[105b.6\]]kyang ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par mthong ba dang /_ku mu da'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/_byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 
[\[105b.7\]]'das pa'i bar du ste/_de na rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang /_tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/_'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA gcig gi bye ma las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/_de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs 
[\[106a.2\]]pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/_yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[106a.3\]]'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/_de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang 
[\[106a.4\]]ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang /_bdud rtsi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 
[\[106a.5\]]'di kun tu rgyas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/_/mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni drang srong gi cha byad kyis ma 
[\[106a.6\]]gyur pa'o/_/rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas kyang mi mthong na/_sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de las 
[\[106a.7\]]bzhengs te/_thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang /_tshangs pa dbang po'i 'gros dang /_tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros dang /_gnya' shing du lta ba'i 'gros dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang /_dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang /_lha 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]dga' ba'i 'gros dang /_gnod sbyin dul ba'i 'gros dang /_lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang /_klu dul ba'i 'gros dang /_rgyal ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 'gros ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing sangs rgyas chen por rnam par 'phrul 
[\[106b.2\]]pa'i 'gros dang /_rgyan chen po'i 'gros dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'degs pa dang 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la byon to/_/dka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma dri tha dad pa 
[\[106b.3\]]med cing dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/_glang po'i rnam par lta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do/_/la la gang 'dir bstan dang ldan pa la/_/byang chub dam 
[\[106b.4\]]pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa/_/bdag gis yang dag spyad pa bstan pa'i phyir/_/de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ongs/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs med gang /_/da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing /_/chos la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa/_/bdag ni 
[\[106b.5\]]de dag thams cad 'ong na ston/_/kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag dang /_/sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing /_/thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa/_/de dag thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po/_/thabs la mkhas 
[\[106b.6\]]pas sems can rnams 'dul zhing /_/shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa/_/bzod nyan thos phyir de dag thams cad 'ong /_/gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur/_/'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med/_/chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa/_/rang bzhin rnam 
[\[106b.7\]]par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong /_/gang rnams thabs dang yang dag sbyor phyir zhugs/_/thams cad dngos la sems pa rten med cing /_/mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa/_/dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong /_/bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas/_/ji 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas pa/_/chos kyi 'khor lo la yang khyod myur 'jug_/srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed/_/phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang /_/'gro ba rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo skor/_/da dung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 
[\[107a.2\]]'dod pa/_/bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong /_/lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdag skor te/_/phyir mi ldog la sems can bye bkod pa/_/rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan rab thogs shing /_/bdag bdag zhing rnams su yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[107a.3\]]zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste/_/de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang /_
[\[107a.4\]]don dang /_tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song ngo /_/de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag gis blta 
[\[107a.5\]]ba'i sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba de ltar dga' ba/_de ltar mngon par dga' ba/_de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/_de ltar tshim pa/_de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/_don dang tshig dang /_yi ge 
[\[107a.6\]]brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang /_zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/_gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba la 
[\[107a.7\]]drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tshal te/_ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/_gal te snying rje dang 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rjes su 'gro'o/_/drang srong gi cha byad dang /_lus dang /_dbyibs kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na/_drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o/_/
[\[107b.2\]]de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med cing dpag tu med pa/_chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon 
[\[107b.3\]]par lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/_drang srong thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas bstod de 'khod do/_/la la smon lam gyi dbang dang /_la la ngan du spyod pa'i 
[\[107b.4\]]rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran pa so sor thob nas drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do/_/drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs su yang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[107b.5\]]rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing ji lta bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/_de nas de nyid kyi tshe na shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i 
[\[107b.6\]]lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs 
[\[107b.7\]]mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/_drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa der bdag bzod pa 'di bstan 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]snyam pa dang /_de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[108a.2\]]phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das de na 
[\[108a.3\]]bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang /_de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/_/de 
[\[108a.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra ba mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam 
[\[108a.5\]]pa dang /_de nas de nyid kyi tshe na byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_dper na tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya 
[\[108a.6\]]stong phrag drug cu lhags so/_/de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri la 
[\[108a.7\]]rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khang pa 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/_su yi byin gyis brlabs/_byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bas na chos kyi sgos chags pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir da dung mi sgrub kyi/_'di gnyis kyis 'khor 
[\[108b.2\]]ba 'khyil pa'i sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o/_/'di gnyis ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/_gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang med do/_/de 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/
[\[108b.3\]]'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o/_/gang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed can dang /_'gro 
[\[108b.4\]]ba dang /_'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med pa/_'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa'am/_ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang 'byung ba dang /_'gog par rnam par mi rtog cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa 
[\[108b.5\]]med pa dang /_tha dad par bya ba med pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang phung po skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang phung po yongs su 
[\[108b.6\]]shes shing skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa rlom sems thams cad bcom pa/_gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/'gul ba dang /_rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang tshor ba'i 
[\[108b.7\]]'gul ba med cing rlom sems med pa/_g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang /_tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang /_tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang /_tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]lam du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung bar 'gog par 'gro bar mi shes pa dang /_gzugs kyi phung po dang /_tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang /_mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid med pa 
[\[109a.2\]]dang /_mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang /_mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /_mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la nyan thos dang /_rang byang chub 'dod pa 
[\[109a.3\]]dang /_bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la brten par mi shes pa dang /_yi ge'i tshig gi lam 
[\[109a.4\]]thams cad ni gnas med pa/_yi ge med pa/_spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang /_mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang /_pha rol dang tshu rol tu 'du shes pa 'di ni gnyis 
[\[109a.5\]]pa'o/_rigs kyi bu gang dge ba mi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_mi zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshu rol ni zag pa'o/_/pha rol ni phyin ci log ste gang tshu rol 
[\[109a.6\]]dang pha rol la rtog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang bkrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang /_bkrol ba med pa dang /_ci la yang btags pa med pa dang /_btang ba med pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[109a.7\]]kyi bu gzhan yang gang phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am zhes rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang khams dang /_skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa med pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su bya 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]ba'ang med pa dang /_'du shes dang 'du shes med min thob pa'ang med pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang 
[\[109b.2\]]'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 
[\[109b.3\]]'das pa'i chos la snyems pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang la la 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la mi 'jug mi 'gro_/rnam par mi 'gro_/mi rgal zhing 'gro ba yang med/_rnam par 'gro ba med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs 
[\[109b.4\]]kyi bu gzhan yang gang la la ming dang gzugs las phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_ming dang gzugs bral ba la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lta ba kun tu 'gro zhing kun tu mi 'gro_/yongs 
[\[109b.5\]]su mya ngan las ma 'das pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang 'byung ba med pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas 
[\[109b.6\]]thams cad du myur du rab tu shes pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang /_rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang /_nga yir bya ba dang /_skye mched la chags pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gang la la bdag dang bral ba'i 
[\[109b.7\]]rnam par shes pa thob pa bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral ba/_skye mched nyams pa med pa/_bdag gir bya ba dang /_nga yir bya ba dang bral ba 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/gang la la rig pa dang /_rnam par grol bar rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]rigs kyi bu ma rig pa ni rgyu ba med cing bdag med pa'o/_/rig pa ni glog gi rang bzhin can no/_/rnam par grol ba yang nam mkha'o/_/nam mkha' yang mi rtog pa/_rtog par byed pa med pa/_spros pa med pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 
[\[110a.2\]]'jug pa'o/_/gang rnam par shes pa dang /_gzugs kun tu spyod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du stong ste/_nam mkha' yang 'jig pa med do/_/gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyu ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid 
[\[110a.3\]]do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa rab tu rgyu ba med pa ni nam mkha' ji lta bur mun pa med cing snang ba med pa rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa stong pa ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyang 
[\[110a.4\]]stong pa'o/_/de bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar stong ngo /_/nam mkha' ji lta bur 'dod chags med/_zhe sdang med/_gti mug med/_mi mtho mi dma'/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro_/de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[110a.5\]]dpa' ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la yang 'dod chags med/_zhe sdang med/_gti mug med/_mi mtho mi dma'/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[110a.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na/_byang chub 
[\[110a.7\]]sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]las bzhengs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong gi cha byad ji tsam pa mi snang bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyan te bzhugs so/_/de ltar de bzhin du gang gzhan la la dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad mi snang bar gyur te/_sngon gyi lus ji lta ba 
[\[110b.2\]]bzhin du 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bur bstan pa de bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sgo 'di bstan par bya ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni chos 
[\[110b.3\]]kyi sgo 'di la lus dpang du btsugs te/_de ltar khyod kyis tshad med pa'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_mi dang 
[\[110b.4\]]mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs byas so//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[110b.5\]]sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la chos bstan du gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i yon tan 'di dag gis bstod do/_/rgyal ba mi mnyam zhing [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag khyab pa/_/nyon mongs dgra zhi 'di la mngon par gnas/_/thub pa shin tu rnam grol 'dir 
[\[110b.6\]]zhugs shing /_/khyod kyis 'gro la bzod pa'i mchog 'di ston/_/rab tu zhi thugs brtul zhugs yongs su dag_/thub pa mchod sbyin bgyis pa bzod dge gsungs/_/'gro la bde sbyin drang srong shes rab 'chang /_/gti mug 'jig mdzad 'di la bdud rtsi char/_/'di la 
[\[110b.7\]]lha klu sems can mi mang po/_/shin tu gsal yid myur du zhing gang ba/_/'gro ba thams cad khyod zhal lta zhing 'dug_/nyon mongs yongs su spangs te dam chos gsungs/_/sngon chad rgyal ba khyod kyang kun spyod bstan/_/mig gnyis rkang pa lag pa lce byin zhing /_/pags 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa mgo khrag yan lag dam 'bru nor/_/glang rta bu grong shing rta rin chen rnam mang byin/_/zas skom mal dang bran pho bran mo byin/_/gnyen dang 'gro la sdug bsngal rtag thar byed/_/bsam pa rdzogs shing sems can dga' mdzad pa/_/khyod kyis mchod sbyin 
[\[111a.2\]]brgya byas sems can phyir/_/sangs rgyas mang la sngon chad dge mchod byas/_/byams sems rtag pas ther zug sbyin la dga'/_/brtul zhugs brtan pas ri rab ji bzhin 'bar/_/'gro la brtan phyir bzod pa 'di bstan gsol/_/ngan song gsum spangs sems can mtho 
[\[111a.3\]]ris khrid/_/khyod kyis bstan pa'i smon lam sngon rtag byas/_/'gro ba byang chub sdug bsngal zhi mchog rig_/rgyal ba sngon chad ci bzhin byang chub de thob bo/_/snying rje dpal chus sa rnams ma lus gang /_/nyon mongs dri gsum the tsom thams cad zhi/_/lam gang zhi bas 
[\[111a.4\]]byang chub thob ston pa/_/ji ltar chos rtogs 'di la khyod kyis dus/_/shin tu skom yid 'gro la chos char phob/_/bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms yang dag yon tan gsungs/_/lam gang zhi des 'gro ba byang chub reg_/zhing [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'di la sems can gang dag 'ongs/_/rga 
[\[111a.5\]]shi dag las rnam thar gang yod pa/_/thub pa chen po chos 'di gsung du gsol/_/nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa ston/_/de ni sgyu ma smig rgyu spros par 'gro/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes nas/_de nas bcom 
[\[111a.6\]]ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_bdag rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis khang pa brtsegs pa ji snyed pa de snyed du lus mngon par sprul nas khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na 'dug ste/_'khor 'di dag kyang yang dag 
[\[111a.7\]]par dga' zhing skyo bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od shin tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyis khang pa brtsegs pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang rang zhugs te bzhugs so/_/
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa tshad med pa 'di dag ni gang na rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa bdag khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa ni gang /_sangs 
[\[111b.2\]]rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis khang pa brtsegs par sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba ni gang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes 
[\[111b.3\]]bya ba'i tshig 'di ni smra ba med pa'o/_/ma rig pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spros pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu ci 'das pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ci ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/_smras pa/_
[\[111b.4\]]rigs kyi bu ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ci da ltar byung ba'i sems dang /_bsam pa'i gnas pa yod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu med do/_/smras pa/_gal te re zhig sems dang /_bsam pa'i gnas pa med na rnam par mi gnas pa'i dngos po la ji ltar byang chub thob/_smras 
[\[111b.5\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu ci dus gsum gyi chos thams cad spangs pas/_de'i tshe cis kyang chos khong du chud pa med dam/_smras pa/_rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa/_mi 'gro ba/_mi skye ba/_mi 'gog pa/_mi reg pa/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas la gnas pa med pa'o/_/
[\[111b.6\]]dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la byang chub 'gro ba med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba med cing snyems pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' 
[\[111b.7\]]la rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa'ang med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med cing snang ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mun pa med cing snang ba'ang med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]la gzugs med cing bstan du med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzugs med cing bstan du yang med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' ma skyes ma 'gags pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma skyes ma 'gags so/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la 
[\[112a.2\]]'gro ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'gro bar dmigs pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la gnas pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gnas pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la reg pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang reg pa med do/_/
[\[112a.3\]]ji ltar nam mkha' la lam du dmigs pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ci la'ang lam du dmigs pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med do/_/ji ltar 
[\[112a.4\]]nam mkha' la brjod du med cing yi ge med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang brjod du med cing yi ge med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la rtag pa med cing chad pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rtag pa med cing chad pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la 
[\[112a.5\]]lus med cing 'byung ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang lus med cing 'byung ba med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la gzung ba med cing gnas pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzung ba med cing gnas pa med do/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la rten 
[\[112a.6\]]pa med pa/_gnas pa med pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_rnam par rtog pa med pa/_'deg pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_'ong ba med pa/_rtsa ba med pa/_mtha' med pa/_'khrug pa med pa/_yongs su gdungs pa med pa/_brtags pa med pa/_
[\[112a.7\]]bkrol ba med pa/_mthong ba med pa/_rtog pa med pa/_mun pa med pa/_dngos po med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_sprul pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rten pa med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mi 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]skye bar bsgrags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gnyis su med pa'i cha shas so/_/chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sems can gyi khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 
[\[112b.2\]]'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rtogs pa dang kun tu rtog pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gnas dang /_rnam pa'i gnas dang /_rab kyi gnas su yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shes pa dang 
[\[112b.3\]]ma shes pa dang /_rab tu shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_nye bar shes pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mtshan ma med pa yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_nye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_rjes su mtshan nyid la yang dag 
[\[112b.4\]]par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni 'das pa med pa dang /_rnam par 'das pa dang /_'das pa dang /_rjes su 'das pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni blangs pa dang /_dor ba dang /_kun tu blang ba dang /_nye bar blang ba la 
[\[112b.5\]]yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni snang ba dang /_kun tu snang ba dang /_rjes su snang ba dang /_yang dag par snang ba med pa dang /_rab tu snang ba med pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa dang /_shin tu yang dag pa dang /_rjes 
[\[112b.6\]]su yang dag pa dang /_kun tu yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /_rab tu yang dag pa ma yin pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni kun tu smra ba dang /_rnam par smra ba dang /_shin tu smra ba dang /_rjes su smra ba dang /_rab tu smra ba dang /_nye bar smra ba la yang dag 
[\[112b.7\]]par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni kun tu rig pa dang /_rnam par rig pa dang mtshungs par rig pa dang rjes su rig pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni kun tu gzugs dang /_rnam par gzugs dang /_mtshungs par gzugs dang /_yang dag 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]par gzugs dang /_nye ba'i gzugs la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni kun tu spyod pa dang /_rnam par spyod pa dang /_mtshungs par spyod pa dang /_rjes su spyod pa dang /_nye bar spyod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[113a.2\]]ni kun tu brjod pa dang /_rnam par brjod pa dang /_rjes su brjod pa dang /_mtshungs par brjod pa dang /_nye bar brjod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni bgrang ba dang /_rnam par bgrang ba dang /_mtshungs par bgrang ba dang /_rjes su bgrang ba dang /_nye bar 
[\[113a.3\]]bgrang ba la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/byang chub ni kun tu yod pa dang /_rnam par yod pa dang /_rjes su yod pa dang /_nye bar yod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang /_rnam par spros pa dang /_spros pa dang bral ba dang /_rjes su spros pa dang /_nye 
[\[113a.4\]]bar spros pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar nam mkha'i khams la gzung du med pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu la la nam mkha' spros par bya ba dang /_tshad du bya ba dang /_rnam par 'gran par bya ba dang /_brgyan par bya ba 
[\[113a.5\]]dang /_ri mor bya bar nus sam/_rigs kyi bu mi nus so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin te/_nam mkha' cis kyang spros par mi nus pa ji lta ba de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin du cis kyang spros par mi nus so/_/
[\[113a.6\]]rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs par bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa ni gang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs pa ni gang /_zhes bya ba khyod ci'i phyir de skad smra/_de ltar spros par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa na/_
[\[113a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo so sor thob cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]cad kyang rgyas par gyur to/_/sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston pa bstan pa legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/_/de nas de nyid 
[\[113b.2\]]kyi tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer 'byung ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/_khang pa brtsegs pa gcig na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur nas/_
[\[113b.3\]]'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag ni gang nas 'ongs/_yang gang du 'gro_/
[\[113b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod da dung 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog gis smras pa/_rigs 
[\[113b.5\]]kyi bu 'di ltar 'ongs so zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi tshig go/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag med pa'i tshig go/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu glo bur gyi tshig dang /_rigs kyi bu bdag med pa'i tshig gis kyang rigs kyi bu nga yir bya 
[\[113b.6\]]ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba'i tshig go/_/skyes bu gang zag nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba la chags pas phyin ci log bzhi ste/_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa rnal 'byor gyi rjes su ldan pa dang /_mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa 
[\[113b.7\]]dang /_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes par rnal 'byor gyi rjes su ldan pa la zhugs pa'o/_/skyes bu gang zag sems phyin ci log la zhugs pas sgrib pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa la sred pa'i sgrib pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]dang /_le lo dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tsom gyi sgrib pa spangs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag tu 'gyur ba de mtshams med pa lnga yang dag par spyod do/_/mtshams med pa lnga ma spangs pa'i skye bu gang zag lha dang mi'i nang du 
[\[114a.2\]]'gro bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na nyan thos kyi byang chub lta ci smos/_gang la nyan thos kyi byang chub med pa de la rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lta yang ci smos/_gang la nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba ma spangs pa de la rtag pa dang /_chad pa yang 
[\[114a.3\]]spangs pa med do/_/gang gang zag chad par lta ba can du 'gyur ba de dge ba'i las dang /_dge ba la spyod pa'i mtshungs par spyod par lta ga la 'gyur/_gang yang rtag par lta ba can du 'gyur ba de thar ba la bsngos pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang /_dge ba la spyod par lta ga la 'gyur/_rtag 
[\[114a.4\]]par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag ni lha dang /_mi'i nang du skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_nyan thos dang /_rang byang chub lta ci smos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ga la mthong /_nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba lta bar song ba gnas pa 
[\[114a.5\]]med pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ma 'dres pa'i 'khor ji lta bur yang dag par 'ongs pa smra ba med pa de dang rigs kyi bu khyod kyang smra ba med par mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'du shes pa yid la mi bya ba 
[\[114a.6\]]'am/_gal te yid la mi bya na byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la byin len dang yo byad kyis ji ltar bsnyen bkur bya/_pha dang ma rnams rim gro'i gnas dang /_nad pa rnams la ji ltar bsnyen bkur bya/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu spros pa med pa ni 'di lta ste/_gnas dang /_
[\[114a.7\]]nye ba'i gnas dang /_rab kyi gnas dang /_gnas gzhan dang /_rim gro'i gnas dang /_kun tu 'gro ba dang /_lhag par 'gro ba dang /_nye bar 'gro ba dang /_rjes su 'gro ba dang /_gzhan du 'gro ba 'di'i tshig de dag thams cad ni spros pa med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rtog pa 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_rjes su rtog pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_rab tu rtog pa 'di dag gis 'khor ba 'dren no/_/gzhog go sgrub bo/_/me tog ni lha dang /_mir skye ba'o/_/'bras bu ni ngan song gsum du 'gro ba la yang dang yang du 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /_skad cig ma'i chos brgyad la 
[\[114b.2\]]yang dag par gzhol ba dang 'di dag ni nyes pa'o/_/gang spyod pa dang /_rnam par spyod pa dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_rjes su spyod pa 'di dag gi dngos po thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bzod pa spong ba'i phyir sgrub bo/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba 
[\[114b.3\]]la spyod pa de ci 'phags pa'i bzod pa 'khrug par 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang dge ba'i chos la nyung ngu 'dod cing sdig pa la mang du 'dod pa ni 'phags pa'i bzod pa la 'khrug pa'o/_/rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/'thor ba'o/_/gti mug pa'o/_/gang de dge ba'i chos yongs 
[\[114b.4\]]su spangs pa de 'dod pa'i rtog pa zhes smras so/_/gang 'dod pa'i rtog pa de kun tu spyod pa'i bzod pa la 'khrug pa dang 'jig pa'o/_/de bzod pa'i tshogs med pa 'di ni yongs su spong ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngag dang /_yid dang /_drug gi skye mched kyi sdom pa dang /_mngon par 'du 
[\[114b.5\]]mi byed pa dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_rtsol ba med pa dang /_rtog pa med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_sems dang yid kyis dmigs pa med pa ste/_/de ni 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs so/_/gang yang sems kyi rnam par las dang /_lus 
[\[114b.6\]]kyi rnam par las dang /_ngag gi rnam par las de thams cad 'phags pa'i bzod pa la gti mug dang /_yongs su spong ba'i phyir sgrub bo/_/gzhan yang chos kyi bya ba'am/_mi 'gul ba'am/_mtshan nyid dam/_rtog pa de 'phags pa'i bzod pa la gti mug dang yongs su spong ba'i phyir 
[\[114b.7\]]sgrub bo/_/gang yang lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi bya ba med pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_rtog pa med pa de 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs sgom pa'o/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi mtha'i rjes su zhugs shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dang ldan no/_/cung zad du nyon mongs pa 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]thams cad kyi mtha' dang /_chos thams cad kyi yang mtha'o/_/gang de ltar rab tu shes pa de bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/gang yi ge la 'khrug pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad thul ba dang /_brjod du med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang /_smra ba thams cad la 
[\[115a.2\]]chags pa med pa dang /_gang mi skye ba mi 'byung bar bsgrags pa'i chos rab tu shes pa de bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/gang chos kyi khams la gnas pa dang /_sems can gyi khams la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_chos kyi khams dang sems can gyi khams kyang mtshungs pa'i 
[\[115a.3\]]khams su bzung ste tha dad par mi byed pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi khams kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa de bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad dmigs pa med cing bdag dang gzhan med pa mi skye ba'i phyir snang ba med pa/_gzung du med pa kun nas ldang ba med pa/_lus med pa/_
[\[115a.4\]]bsgom pa med pa/_skye ba mi 'byung ba/_'chi 'pho med pa/_brten pa med pa/_g.yo ba med pa/_'gyur ba med pa/_yod par rtog pa dang /_med par rtog pa dang bral ba/_snod ma yin pa/_yongs su rtog pa med pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_rdul dang bral ba/_rigs spangs pa/_
[\[115a.5\]]rang bzhin yongs su dag pa/_dri ma med pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_sgro btags pa med pa/_kun nas langs pa med pa/_'khrug pa med pa'i chos thams cad med par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzod pa sgom mo/_/gang rkyen dang bral ba dang /_rab tu rgyu ba nye bar zhi ba dang /_lam 
[\[115a.6\]]ma rungs pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'jug pa med pa dang /_rings pa med pa dang /_yul thams cad la rnam par dmigs pa med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i lam las shin tu yang dag par 'das pa dang /_btags pa med pa dang /_bkrol ba med 
[\[115a.7\]]pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_sa bon med pa dang /_rtsa ba med pa dang /_yid brtan pa nye bar zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang /_yongs su gdungs pa med pa dang /_shin tu mthar thug pa dang /_yang srid pa kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /_mya 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]ngan las 'da' ba la mngon par dga' ba dang 'di 'dra bar yid la byas pas bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa dang /_yang dag par rtog pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_kun tu 'gro ba dang /_mngon par 'gro ba 
[\[115b.2\]]dang /_nye bar 'gro bar yid la byed pas bzod pa sgom par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag par 'dren pa'i tshig go/_/rigs kyi bu gang la 'dren pa med cing yang dag par 'dren pa med pa de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba yang med do/_/'gro ba med pa dang /_'ong 
[\[115b.3\]]ba med pa'i kun gzhi kun tu gzhom pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i bzod pa bsgom mo/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba las kyi mtshan nyid la dmigs pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir yang dag par sgrub ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i las kyi 
[\[115b.4\]]mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'di ni mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom pa zhes bya ba'o/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i smon lam mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'di ni bzod pa 'gog pa'i phyir yang dag par sgrub kyi 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di ni smon 
[\[115b.5\]]lam zad pa dang /_med pa dang /_zhi ba'i bzod pa sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa las gti mug pa yin gyi bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba dmigs pa med pa dang /_'gal ba'i mtshan nyid 'di 
[\[115b.6\]]ni bzod pa sgom pa zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba rnam par dmigs pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa la sgom pa ma yin gyi bzod pa la 'khrug pa yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba rnam par dmigs pa zad pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa 
[\[115b.7\]]zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa la 'jug pa yin gyi bzod pa sgom pa ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i kun gzhi nub pa dang zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i mtshan 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]nyid 'di ni bzod pa yongs su spangs pa yin gyi bzod pa sgom pa ni ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba rgyu zad pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dang /_rnam par zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba brda dang tha snyad kyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa 
[\[116a.2\]]ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba tha snyad rnam par zhi ba'i gnas 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa'i chu bor bying ba 'di ni bzod pa la gti mug pa yin gyi bzod pa sgom pa ni ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba 
[\[116a.3\]]sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang /_mi shes pa rab tu spangs te/_rgya chen po nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kun spyod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba 
[\[116a.4\]]sred pa'i 'du byed nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang /_rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa rnam par dmigs pa 
[\[116a.5\]]dang /_rnam par spyod pa nub pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba ming dang gzugs kun nas ldang ba'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'dul 
[\[116a.6\]]ba dang /_kun nas ldang zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba dbang po drug nye bar zhi zhing nub pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bo sgom pa gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin 
[\[116a.7\]]no/_'gro'o zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bor nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba tshor ba gsum gyi rgyun gcod pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba sred pa'i kun gzhi la 'jug pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]zhes bya ba sred pa gtong ba dang /_nub pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba nye bar len pa la 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba nye bar len pa sel ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong 
[\[116b.2\]]ngo zhes bya ba sgom pa mngon par 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba khong du chud pa chags pa'i lam 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang dang yang snying por 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa 
[\[116b.3\]]sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba skye ba zad pa 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang dang yang dga' bar 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba rga ba zad pa spang ba'i phyir bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs 
[\[116b.4\]]kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang dang yang shi ba'i chu'i chu bor ltung ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba shi ba'i chu bo las rgal ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[116b.5\]]ba dang /_'khrug par 'jug pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad skye ba dang /_rga 
[\[116b.6\]]shi dang 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /_phrad pa dang /_'bral ba'i sdug bsngal skye ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa ma yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad skye zhing phyin 
[\[116b.7\]]ci log bzhi kun nas ldang ba'i rang bzhin te/_dge ba thams cad sgom pa la gegs byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi phyin ci log gi gnyen po'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i tshig ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kun tu 'dren pa'o zhes smras 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]pa yin no/_/'gro'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi rjes su 'brel pa thams cad 'dren pa med pa'o zhes smras pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na brjod du med pa la g.yo ba med do/_/brjod pa thams cad la yang chags pa med do/_/yi ge'i chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[117a.2\]]'khrug pa med do/_/bzung ba med pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'du byed thams cad la dmigs pa'i rgyun chad pa dang /_yod par rtog pa dang /_med par rtog pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[117a.3\]]byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel bas 'di ston pa bstan pa na sngon du 'gro ba lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa sa dang nam mkha' 
[\[117a.4\]]khyab pa 'di la gnas pas mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu ji lta bur khyod kyang chos zab mo'i tshul gyi rjes su zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i kun nas yon tan rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gang gi phyir khyod 
[\[117a.5\]]kyis bdag cag la 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi char rab tu phab pa legs so legs so/_/de nyid kyi tshe na phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po lha rnams kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_dri 
[\[117a.6\]]dang /_byug pas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dun cing brtson no/_/de'i lus la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pas gtor bas rigs kyi bu yang de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis rin po che sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te 
[\[117a.7\]]phung po phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad stong zheng du dpag tshad bcu pa lha rdzas kyi gos kyis bting ba/_blta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mu stegs can gzhan dka' thub dang /_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]brtul zhugs dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam la brtson par byin gyis brlabs pa ji snyed pa dang /_gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing stong pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na mu stegs gzhan dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam la brtson pa byin 
[\[117b.2\]]gyis brlabs pa/_dka' thub ngan pa de dag thams cad kyis rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri yang dag par mthong ngo /_/la la dka' thub lnga pa dag nyi ma dang zla ba la phyag 'tshal bar yang dag par mthong ngo /_/la la chu 'dzin pa dang /_la la 'dam 'dzin pa dang /_chu dang 'dam 'dzin 
[\[117b.3\]]pa dang /_la la skra 'dzin pa dang /_ag tshom 'dzin pa dang /_skra dang ag tshom 'dzin pa dang /_la la rkang pa 'degs pa dang /_lag pa 'degs pa dang /_la la nags tshal gyi rtsa ba dang 'dab ma za ba dang /_tsher ma'i steng du nyal ba dang /_la la rus pa'i phye mas lus bskus pa dang /_mi'i 
[\[117b.4\]]mgo bo'i phreng ba dang /_mgo lag mthil na 'chang ba yang dag par mthong ngo /_/la la phyugs kyi brtul zhugs can dang /_khyi'i brtul zhugs can dang /_phag gi brtul zhugs can dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can dang /_bya'i brtul zhugs can dang /_me'i brtul zhugs 
[\[117b.5\]]can dang /_zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang /_nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang /_chu'i brtul zhugs can dang /_'dzeg pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /_dka' thub rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nad gsos/_de la sogs pa mu stegs can gzhan la la dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_
[\[117b.6\]]spyod pa dang /_spyod lam la brtson par byin gyis brlabs pa/_dka' thub ngan pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad de'i tshe na/_der seng ge'i khri yang dag par mthong ngo /_/seng ge'i khri de'i steng gi bar snang na rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bcu par byin gyis brlabs 
[\[117b.7\]]so/_/gdugs de la lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs su yang dag par mthong ngo /_/rgyan de dag las log pa'i tshig gi tha snyad sna tshogs byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]zhugs snyems pa'i lta ba dang /_'dod pa la bde ba skye ba'i lta ba byung ngo /_/'thab cing gcig la gcig 'tshog pa dang /_mgo gcod pa dang /_mig 'byin pa'i lta ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du lta ba spros pas lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi lta ba'i tshig gi tha snyad 
[\[118a.2\]]kyi dbyangs byung ngo /_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med grangs med pa dag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sgra de nyan to/_/seng ge'i khri la sems can tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs ngan pa sna tshogs sbyor ba'i rjes su 
[\[118a.3\]]ldan pa de dag kyang lta'o/_/kye ma kyi hud lta ba nyon mongs pa thob pa 'di dag rnyog pa lnga'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par mthong ba gang zhig ces de mchog tu skyo ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/bdag cag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o snyam ste/_de 
[\[118a.4\]]dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las 'gro bar 'dod kyang de dag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro bar mi shes nas/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag cag ni sangs 
[\[118a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'dod pa ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu lta ba stug pos bsgribs shing dog pa thob pas/_bdag cag kyang cung zad lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis 'phrul par 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag cag myur du 'gro bar 'dod 
[\[118a.6\]]do/_/bdag cag kyang phyogs thams cad mgo 'khor bar gyur nas/_yang bdag cag rang rang gi phyogs gang du 'gro ba mi shes na/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod bdag cag_/rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar nus pa nyams su longs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra 
[\[118a.7\]]rnam par 'grel bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa de dag la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci khyed cag theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag cag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]yang dag par zhugs nas yun ring ngo /_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 'dod pa rnams 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can dmyal bar skye ba la brtson pa ni gor ma chag_/de bzhin du byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs 
[\[118b.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing dang /_gnod sbyin dbul po dang /_mi dbul po dang /_gshed po dang /_de bzhin du lta ba tha dad par song zhing dogs pa rnyed pa'i mu stegs can gzhan la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis der skye ba blangs pa 'di ni byang chub sems
