[\[118b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi rtsal po che zhes smras so/_/ji lta bur gnas de dang de dag tu brtson 'grus brtan pa pha rol gnon pas nye bar phyin to/_/sems can rnams ni mi shes pa'i rtsa ba dang /_lhan cig tu 'grogs pa/_tshe'i dgon par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i zhi ba'i lam rab tu 
[\[118b.4\]]nyams pa'o/_/sems can rnams ni srog chags su gyur pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las la brtson pa'o/_/lta ba ngan pa rdzogs pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa med par lta ba dang /_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 
[\[118b.5\]]bdag gi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal la mos so/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gcig kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rab tu mos par nus pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la las kyi lam gcig gis kyang sa bon bskyed cing 
[\[118b.6\]]'dug pa dang /_legs par smra ba gcig gis kyang rna bar go bar nus pas sems can re re'i phyir yang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnam pa du ma sna tshogs su mngon par brtson no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha 
[\[118b.7\]]gnyis te/_byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gang gis bgos pa ni bdud bzhi 'dzin cing byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_sems can gyi go cha dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi go cha'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]can gyi go cha gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis mos shing pha rol gnon par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson zhing byams pa bsgoms pas phongs pa thams cad dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa 
[\[119a.2\]]dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad las dkar ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/snying rje chen pos lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las yongs su grol bar byed 
[\[119a.3\]]pa bdag gis kyang yang de bzhin du sems can nyon mongs pa'i skyabs su bslab par bya'o/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi ste/_sbyin pa dang /_ngag snyan pa dang /_don bya ba dang /_don 'thun pas sems can mgu bar bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can mgu bar byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[119a.4\]]zas dang /_skom nas mgo'i bar du sbyin pas gang sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gang sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni mtshan ma yongs su byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[119a.5\]]phyin pa'o/_/gang de ni dngos po la dmigs pa rab tu zhi ba 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang yul la mi bzod pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang dngos po yongs su btang ste/_dben par spyod pa'i phyir 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub 
[\[119a.6\]]sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang dngos po yongs su btang ste las thams cad la kun tu mi spyod pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang dngos po yongs su sbyin pa'i phyir bdag gi yid la mi sems shing dngos po de la dben 
[\[119a.7\]]par sems pa la rnam par smin par mi 'dod pas len pa dang /_sbyin pa gnyis ma byung ba rnam par mi rtog_/kun nas mi ldang /_dngos po med/_rnam par bsal ba med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/yang 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas dong tshe gcig byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma dang lhan cig pas 'di ltar slob ste/_lus med pa'i phyir longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa rnam par 
[\[119b.2\]]mi sgrub/_longs spyod chen po'i rgyur sbyin pa rnam par mi spong /_longs spyod chen po'i sbyin pa yang dag par mi shes te/_rang bzhin gyis stobs 'dzin pa 'di yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pas/_sbyin pa byin pa'i rgyun 
[\[119b.3\]]bcad pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pas sbyin pa'i rgyun bcad pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyis mtshan nyid la mi 'jug pa dang /_dran pa'i stobs mi skye mi 'gog pa la dmigs pas sbyin pa byin pa 'di yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[119b.4\]]pa'o/_/gang sbyin pa ni g.yeng ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_dran pa'i yul la yang dag par rgyas pa dang /_len pa dang dor ba med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi yul la mi khom par dmigs shing snyems pa med pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang yang sbyin pa de dmigs pa thams 
[\[119b.5\]]cad kun ldang ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ye shes dang /_rnam par spyod pas lam mi 'thun pa yongs su spangs pa'i ye shes dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la reg pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_dma' zhing rab tu nyams pa'i lam dang /_tshig pas gdungs pa rnams 
[\[119b.6\]]snying rje thams cad kyis yongs su bskyabs te zhi ba'i lam du bzhag pa dang /_dben par spyod pa la bdag bde ba skyed cing theg pa chen po yongs su bzung ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang sbyin pa de las thams cad la 
[\[119b.7\]]mtshan nyid mtshungs shing yul thams cad la ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas stong pa'i grong bzhin du rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad blo med cing dngos po med par rtog pa dang /_'dod chags thams cad rkyen la rag las shing bla na med pa dang /_rtog pa thams cad lus med cing mtshan nyid 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]skad cig du 'jig pa dang /_gnas thams cad yod pa ma yin zhing mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro_/kun nas mi ldang ba'i mtshan nyid du rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang sbyin pa de bdag la sems pa dang /_dben 
[\[120a.2\]]par sems pa dang /_rnam par smin pa 'dod par sems pa dang /_len pa rnam par rtog par sems pa de las 'dod pa'i khams kyi phung po la mi gnas pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang /_sa'i khams la len pa dang dor ba med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_
[\[120a.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams la blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyin pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams la nam mkha' kun nas ldang ba dang /_gzugs kyi rang bzhin la rnam par mi 
[\[120a.4\]]dmigs pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_chos la rang bzhin rnam par mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pa dang /_dran pa'i stobs kyis sbyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir mtshan ma rgyun mi gcad par 
[\[120a.5\]]sbyin pa byin pa dang /_sbyin pa de sgrol ba'i rnam par mi dmigs/_ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir 'dres pa med cing 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba'i sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes smras so/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa de bdag mi shes shing longs spyod thams 
[\[120a.6\]]cad gdon mi za bar 'grub pa bde ba thams cad skye ba la bzod pa 'dren pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyis sems can la mtha' thug pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad la blang ba dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_bsam gtan la 'dug pa med pa dang /_khams gsum 
[\[120a.7\]]la shes rab dang /_dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' dong tshe gcig sbyin pa byin te/_rnam pa de lta bu'i sems skyed pas yongs su bsngos pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir shin tu brtan par mos par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re bskyed par mi byed do/_/mu stegs can 'dul ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad la 'jug gi_/lta ba log par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin 
[\[120b.2\]]pa'i las thams cad dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i dge ba bcu'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/bdag gir bya ba'i lta ba thob pa de tshul khrims la nan tan du byed cing dka' thub dang brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[120b.3\]]dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/bdag sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs 
[\[120b.4\]]pas skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i brtson 'grus brtan pa pha rol gnon pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis der bsams bzhin du skye ba mtshungs par 'dzin to/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bzod pa thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[120b.5\]]skad cig ma'i 'du byed thams cad brtag_/par bya'o/_/yul gces pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[120b.6\]]smin par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon dang slob dpon ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug cing bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par 'du mi byed par brtags nas yul thams cad kyi bdud kyi lam spyod pas bdag tu lta bar 
[\[120b.7\]]byed do/_/sems can 'dul ba'i phyir shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byis pa'i yul la spyod pa thams cad la'ang bdag tu lta bar byed do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyi yul las shin tu 'das shing bsam gtan byed do/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]yul gyi lam spyod pa la yang dag par mthong ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad yongs su mgu bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i sems can gyi go cha dang /_
[\[121a.2\]]sems can yongs su smin pa'i rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can dbul po dbul ba las yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i 
[\[121a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/ji lta bur bsam pas sems can yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang /_yang na ni zang zing gi bsam pa'i sems can rnams zang zing gis yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_chos 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ji lta bur sems can rnams la gzugs dang 'thun par 
[\[121a.4\]]chos bstan pas/_yongs su mgu bar byed cing /_yongs su smin par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin pas zang zing gi sbyin pa yang sbyin pa'i len pa de dag la byams pa dang 'thun par 
[\[121a.5\]]sems bskyed par bya ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/rab tu dga' ba skye ba'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/snying rje ci bya'o cog byed pa la brtson pa dge ba'i sems skye ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms 
[\[121a.6\]]shing sdig pa mi byed pa dge ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang 'thun pa dang ldan pa sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/don la rton pa bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis 
[\[121a.7\]]de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/de yang sbyin pa byin pa'i len pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/la la len pa rnams la byang chub spyad pa spyod pa de dag skyo ba skyed par byed pa de nyid kyis de dag 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]yongs su smin par byed do/_/la la yang yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod pa'i rgyun bcad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[121b.2\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/la la yang phyir mi ldog pa rnams la ji lta bur skyes bu dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa'i gzungs thob pas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang 
[\[121b.3\]]ldan pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/la la yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams rgyun bcad cing nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs 
[\[121b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing du snying rje chen po skyed pa de lta bu'i chos ston cing rab tu ston pa de na smon lam byed do/_/de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_lta ba ngan pa dogs pa rnyog pa'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/_/thabs 
[\[121b.5\]]des sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sbyin pa'i dngos po rnams yang na ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'am/_yang na ni chos kyi sbyin pa'i thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed 
[\[121b.6\]]do//_//bam po bzhi pa/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de na gang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i mig gis lta ba dang /_tshig snyan pas dga' 
[\[121b.7\]]bar bya ba dang /_ngag 'jam pas slong ba po dang /_chos nyan pa rnams snyan pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can yongs su spyad pas sdig pa las phyir ldog par byed/_lta bar song ba thams cad las phyir ldog par byed do/_/bral ba bzhi'i sems can rnams bzhi la dgod par byed do/_/bzhi 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gang zhe na/_tshul khrims dang bral ba'i sems can rnams ngag snyan pa dang 'jam pas tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa dang /_sems can lta ba dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'god par byed pa dang /_sems can bsam pa dang bral ba rnams bsam pa yongs 
[\[122a.2\]]su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_sems can cho ga dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i cho ga la 'god par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de na sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos pos 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la ji ltar 'god par byed/_yang 
[\[122a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' bden pa tshig mi rtsub pa de'i drung du slong ba po nye bar phyin pa'i sems can de dag kyang bsam pa shin tu yongs su mgu bar byed do/_/de dag la mtshungs par ngag snyan pas gtam smra bar byed do/_/de dag kyang 'dul bar byed do/_/sems can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi 
[\[122a.4\]]lam dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ngag snyan pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par gzhog par byed/_'god par byed do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems can rnams tshul khrims la yang dag par gzhog par byed 'god par byed 'dzud par byed do/_/sems can le 
[\[122a.5\]]lo can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed/_'god par byed 'dzud par byed do/_/sems can bdag bde bar 'dod pa rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par gzhog par byed/_'god par byed/_'dzud par byed do/_/gzhan yang sems can le lo 
[\[122a.6\]]can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed do/_/ma dad pa rnams dad pa'i brtson 'grus la 'god par byed do/_/thos pa nyung ba rnams mang du thos pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mi 'grogs pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[122a.7\]]'grogs pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/gzhan yang sems can phar mi shes shing mar mi shes te ma gus pa rnams pha ma la gus shing nad pa la bsnyen bkur ba dang /_drang srong la sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed/_sems rtsub pa rnams byams pa la sbyor bar byed/_snying rje med pa'i sems 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]can rnams snying rje la sbyor bar byed/_sems dma' ba can rnams dga' ba la sbyor bar byed/_sems kyis chags pa rnams btang snyoms la sbyor bar byed/_sems can ngan song gsum du 'gro ba rnams tshul khrims la bkod pas lha'i bde ba skye ba la sbyor bar byed do/_/'dod pa 
[\[122b.2\]]la spyod pa'i sems can gyi nang na lhar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams bsam gtan la bkod pas gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bsam gtan bde ba la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can bsam gtan la chags pa rnams gzugs la 'jug pa snyoms par sbyor bar byed/_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[122b.3\]]khams su snyoms par 'jug pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can rnams mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can bdag tu 'du shes pa la mngon par chags pa rnams nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi 'jigs 
[\[122b.4\]]shing dbu ba dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_mda' dang /_ral gris 'phangs te gsod pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i sems can rnams la ston par byed do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed pa nas/_dgra bcom pa'i bar du 'god par byed do/_/gzhan yang sems can 
[\[122b.5\]]bstan pa ngan pa la rab tu mos shing sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ston par byed/_sangs rgyas la mi phyed par rab tu mos pa la rab tu gzhog par byed/_rab tu 'god par byed pa nas chos dang dge 
[\[122b.6\]]'dun gyi bar du'o/_/gang log pa la lta ba'i sems can log par ston cing phyi rol gyi mu stegs can gyi tshul khrims la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de dag skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la sbyor bar byed/_dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa dang /_rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[122b.7\]]'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed do/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims 'phags pa'i slob pa la sdom pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims te/_mu stegs can gzhan gyi tshul khrims kyis 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i sems can dag gang gis lha dang mir skye ba thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can la mngon par 'god par byed do/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la yang de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can 'jig rten pa'i tshul 
[\[123a.2\]]khrims la zhugs pa rnams 'phags pa'i slob pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la 'god par byed do/_/gang gis zag pa med pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed 
[\[123a.3\]]pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi yul pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thabs 
[\[123a.4\]]la mkhas pas sems can nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang zhe na/_sems can pha rol la gnod pa can gyi nang na byang chub 
[\[123a.5\]]sems dpa' thams cad la gnod pa med par gnas pa dang /_sems can ma byin par len pa can rnams kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi nor la mi rku ba'i sems kyis gnas pa nas pha rol gyi chung ma la mi g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba la mi slu ba'i bar du'o/_/sems can 
[\[123a.6\]]thams cad la phra ma mi zer ba nas ngag mi rtsub pa'i bar du ste/_tshig kyal pa zer ba spangs pa dang /_gnod sems 'dod pa spangs pa dang /_chags sems spangs pa dang /_sems kyi rnyog pa spang ba'i phyir gzhan gyi bstan pa spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi yon tan 
[\[123a.7\]]la gus par bya ba la mi zad par mos shing nyan par 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la mi zad par gus pa skyes pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba cung zad tsam la 'jigs par lta ba dang /_theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pas tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang /_ma rung ba skye ba la yang dag par gnas pa rnams skyo bas tshul khrims 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ma ral ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pas tshul khrims 'dres ma med pa dang /_chos dkar po 'phel bas mkhas pas mi dmod pa dang /_dran pas smra ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_dbang po drug srung ba dang /_'dod pa dang chags sems kyi 'dod pa rab 
[\[123b.2\]]tu spangs pas bsam pa bsngags pa'o/_/lha dang mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang thab mo'i 'du 'dzi can yongs su spangs pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sems can snying rje med pa'i nang na 'dug pa la byams pa spyod 
[\[123b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa'i sems dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang /_bdag 'khrul pa phyir 'byin pa dang /_gzhan 'khrul pa la ni rtsod cing 'dor ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa 
[\[123b.4\]]lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can mtha' med par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_le lo can dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[123b.5\]]lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa'i las dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs 
[\[123b.6\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i phung po nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi lta ba kun tu sbyor ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag gi mtshan ma dang /_'jig tshogs kyi mtshan ma dang /_mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_rab tu spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de dang de dag 
[\[123b.7\]]gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang sems can sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed pa de nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus dang tshul khrims kyi sems kyi go cha la brtson pa 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'di yang 'jig rten pa'i ngag snyan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po'o/_/gang gis go cha'i thabs la mkhas pas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu chen po'i rtsal gyis sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam 
[\[124a.2\]]pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dag yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu'i rtsal yod do/_/rigs 
[\[124a.3\]]kyi bu de'i tshe/_gzhung 'dis gang nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar de ltar rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed 
[\[124a.4\]]pa de snyed kyi ngag snyan pa'i ba spu'i dngos pos sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[124a.5\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos bcings pa dang /_bdag gi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis bcings pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na phyugs shing la btags pa ltar sdug bsngal myong bas na sems dang 
[\[124a.6\]]bsam pa la 'jigs pa'am/_skrag pa'am/_yongs su bsdigs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de chung ngu na sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po 'di sgom pa na de ltar bslab bo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di 
[\[124a.7\]]gang sems can 'di ming tsam zhig gam/_sems can 'di phyin ci log tsam zhig gam/_/gti mug pa tsam mam/_tha snyad tsam mam/_thog mar dag pa 'di sems can zhes bya ba'am/_yang dag pa ma yin par gti mug pa ma gtogs par shin tu mngon par mi sgrub pa dang /_'du byed sna 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]tshogs kyi phyin ci log kun nas ldang ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba na sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba myong ba dang /_'dus byas thams cad kyi dngos po gar mkhan gyi tshon 'dra ba dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_rang bzhin gyis smig rgyu lta bu dang /_'khor ba la chags pa rnams bde bar 
[\[124b.2\]]'dod cing mngon par 'du bya ba des sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang /_chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du mi shes pa na kun tu sbyor bas 'khrul pa dang /_myos pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba la 'khor lo stug po 
[\[124b.3\]]lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su 'khor ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis phyin ci log bzhi spangs te/_ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i lam la dgod par bya zhing yang dag pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis yongs su smin par bya ba zhig snyam pa dang /_de sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du rtog ste/_
[\[124b.4\]]sems can rnams la dmigs pa'ang med do/_/srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed can du dmigs pa'ang med do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po yang rnam par mi spong ngo /_/bstan pa la mos pas sems can 
[\[124b.5\]]rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/_thabs la mkhas pas 'god par byed/_dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab tu 'dug pa'i phyir spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'du 'dzi yongs su spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la lha dang 
[\[124b.6\]]mi mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_'du 'dzi spang ba'i phyir sems can de dag gi drung du nye bar phyin nas chos ston te/_bag la nyal ba spang ba'i phyir 'gro ba lnga la mngon par chags pa 
[\[124b.7\]]rjes su smon pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed do/_/nyes pa mang po'i lta ba dang /_nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba dang /_rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir dgon pa'i gnas dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag gi gan du gus 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims ston par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims 'di'o/_/gang dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i 'dod chags 'jig par byed do/_/
[\[125a.2\]]gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad 'jig par byed do/_/bag la nyal ba dang /_nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba thams cad 'jig par byed do/_/myur du chos zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i bzod pa 'thob bo/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[125a.3\]]tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sems can 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims can yang dang yang du sdug bsngal gyi zil gyis non cing 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa nga yir bya ba dang /_bdag gir bya ba la rten pa dag byang chub kyi lam rab tu mi shes so/_/de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po 
[\[125a.4\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyis sems can rnams dgos pa med pa ni gang na bdag gi gnas med cing sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed can gyi gnas med pa dang /_gzugs kyi gnas med pa dang /_tshor ba 
[\[125a.5\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /_sa'i khams kyi gnas med pa dang /_chu dang me dang /_rlung dang mig dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas shing rna ba dang /_sgra'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/_sna dang dri'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/_
[\[125a.6\]]lce dang /_ro'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/_lus dang /_reg bya'i mtshan ma la mi gnas/_yid dang chos kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/_nga yir bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma la mi gnas/_rtag pa dang /_chad pa'i mtshan ma la mi 
[\[125a.7\]]gnas/_'jig tshogs kyi lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba la mi gnas/_rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa dang /_rab tu rtog pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa la mi gnas/_mya ngan dang nye ba'i mya ngan dang rjes su mya ngan dang zad pa'i mya ngan dang gnyis pa'i mya ngan la 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]mi gnas/_stong pa nyid dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_khams gsum gyi rgyud la mi gnas/_mngon par 'du mi byed/_ma skyes/_ma byung /_ma byas/_mngon par ma byas pa la mi gnas/_dus gsum la mi gnas/_sems dang yid kyi mtshan nyid la mi gnas/_
[\[125b.2\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_tshig pa dang rjes su tshig pa dang /_skad cig du/_'jig pa'i mtha'i rdul la mi gnas/_mngon par mi shes pa dang /_'thun pa la mi gnas/_nyan thos kyi theg pa sdom pa la mi gnas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mi gnas/_mtshan ma la mi 
[\[125b.3\]]gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la snyems par mi gnas kyi sems dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par spyod pa nam mkha' bzhin du gnas shing yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par dpyod pa la mtshungs par gnas so/_/zhen pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_
[\[125b.4\]]chags pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_ye shes gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rnal 'byor gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rtog pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas 
[\[125b.5\]]pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_lam gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'dren pa gnyis su med pa rnam par dpyod pa ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob bo/_/thog ma med 
[\[125b.6\]]pa'i stong pa nyid rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab snang bas byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong bar byed do/_/'jig rten gyi chos kyis gos pa'ang med do/_/bdud kyi las kyis gos pa'ang med do/_/bag chags kyi rjes su 'brel ba'i nyon mongs pas gos 
[\[125b.7\]]pa'ang med do/_/phyogs bcur shes rab kyi snang bas ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi stobs skyes pas yul thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yongs su shes pa dang /_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i yul du'ang yang dag par mthong 
[\[126a.2\]]ngo /_/dben pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing 'du 'dzi thams cad la mngon par chags par yang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing 'du byed thams cad kyi yul 
[\[126a.3\]]du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/ma skyes pa'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing bdud bzhi'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing /_'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin par yang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi yul 
[\[126a.4\]]las yang dag par shin tu 'das par yang 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/ye shes kyi spyod yul du'ang 'gyur zhing byis pa'i yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i yul mngon du'ang 'gyur zhing nyan thos 
[\[126a.5\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod pa la yang dag par dga' bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad pa spyod do/_/yul thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i spyod yul la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed/_spyod par byed/_mtshan dang /_dpe byad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul 
[\[126a.6\]]la yang dag par gzhol ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson pas bdud bzhi'i yul la dbye bar 'jug pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la brtson par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[126a.7\]]cad kyi bstan pa'ang byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang 'jug par byed do/_/dmigs pa thams cad kyi dge ba spyod pa la sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par phye 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]mar byed do/_/spros pa thams cad rab tu ded par byed do/_/lta ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang 'god par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 
[\[126b.2\]]'grogs pa rnams kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa de lta bu'i don bya ba bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do/_/dgod par byed do/_/yon tan gyis 
[\[126b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan don bya ba la sems can rnams 'god par byed pa 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu chen po'i khur to/_/sems can gyi bsdu ba'o/_/sems can gyi tshogs so/_/sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/gang sems can shin tu dbul po las 
[\[126b.4\]]yongs su thar bar byed pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'god par byed pa'o/_/ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi don bya bas sems can 
[\[126b.5\]]yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i don 'thun pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i rtsal chen po gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa spyod pa na/_gang 
[\[126b.6\]]gi tshe bdag brtson par 'gyur ba yang na ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yang na ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 'gyur ba de dang der sems can rnams sbyor bar byed do/_/gal te yang 
[\[126b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pas zas sam skom nas/_yan lag gi dam pa mgo'i bar du gtong bar 'gyur ba de de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ston pa de la sbyor bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa spangs shing sems 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]can rnams la snying rje ba de de ltar srog gcod pa zlog par byed/_sems can thams cad la snying rje bar sbyor bar byed do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la 'god par byed pa nas/_yang dag par lta ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o/_/ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[127a.2\]]bdag bzod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bag la nyal ba spangs pa'i phyir bzod pa sgom par byed pa nas/_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed cing mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i bar du 'god par byed do/_/ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[127a.3\]]dpa' bdag brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i lus kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_dge ba'i ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las byin gyis brlabs pa nas dge ba'i rgyur 'du shes pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i rgyur 'dus byas 
[\[127a.4\]]rnams rnam par mi spong ba de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed do/_/ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba 'dul ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas te/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[127a.5\]]gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang bral ba'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas 'khyil ba dang /_ldog pa'i bsam gtan thob pa'i 
[\[127a.6\]]bar du de la sems can rnams de dang de dag gi yon tan la sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed do/_/ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa na thabs sna tshogs kyis shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do/_/ji ltar bdag mngon sum du 
[\[127a.7\]]'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams sbyor bar byed do/_/ji lta bur chos thams cad la ye shes thob cing pha rol ma yin pa'i rkyen mngon par shes pa de ltar sems can gyi rgyu'i phyir chos 'di dag 'byung ba 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te/_
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gang gi las kyis sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par nus pa de'i bar du sbyor ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chags pa yang med do/_/sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams rang sangs rgyas 
[\[127b.2\]]kyi theg pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can rnams ji lta bur phra ba'i chos la ye shes mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa zab mo la sbyor bar byed do/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i dran pa rnam par mi spong ba 'di yang 
[\[127b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' chos dang sems la dbang byed par rab tu shes shing skad cig mar 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la yang rtog pa dang /_sems can la snying rje chen po rnam par mi spong ba 'di yang 
[\[127b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid du dmigs pa yang med cing sems can rnams theg pa 
[\[127b.5\]]gsum la sbyor bar byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i rgyun ma bcad pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed bdag med pa dang 
[\[127b.6\]]ldan pas chos ston pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_sgra dang dbyangs la dmigs pa med pa dang /_las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sems can phyin ci log la yang dag par 'du ba med pa rnams 
[\[127b.7\]]la sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel pa ston pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis 'du byed par mi dmigs shing gtong bar yang mi dmigs pa dang /_len 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]pa dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang ma yin la/_sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sbyin pa byin par 'gyur la sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par yang ston par byed pa dang /_sbyin pa po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang byang 
[\[128a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can gyi lus spyod pa med pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_mi gtsang ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_sems brag ca lta 
[\[128a.3\]]bur brtag pa dang /_'du byed sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba rnam par mi spong ba dang /_sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi 'du byed la sbyor bar byed pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ston 
[\[128a.4\]]par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur bdag med cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshul khrims la rtog par byed pa dang /_spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu 
[\[128a.5\]]shes pa dang /_'di la sems can gyi btang snyoms su rab tu sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams dang phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa 'di ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims su slob pa dang lhag pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[128a.6\]]thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa bsgrubs pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed skad cig tu 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid du shes te/_'dus ma byas kyi gnas dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing sems can 
[\[128a.7\]]rnams la ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa'i rgyu dang /_'bras bu mtshungs par ston pa de la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang blang ba med pa dang 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]dor ba med pa'i 'du byed thams cad shes shing rgyu dang 'bras bur yang rtog pa dang /_chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gog par dmigs pa med pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bral bar rab tu mi shes pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_
[\[128b.2\]]snying rje chen po'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa dang /_phung po yongs su shes pa dang /_ye shes mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang /_rgyu'i 'bras bu ston par byed pa dang /_sems can le lo can rnams 
[\[128b.3\]]brtson 'grus la dmigs pa'i sdug bsngal 'dzin pa la sbyor ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtag 
[\[128b.4\]]par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_rmyong ba med pa dang /_byas pa med pa dang /_bya ba med pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /_skad cig tu zad pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /_
[\[128b.5\]]sems can rnams la yang phung po la rten pa'i bsam gtan tshangs par spyod pa mngon par shes pa thob pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu ston pa dang /_bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa spang bar byos shig ces de ltar las gzhan ma yin pas sems can rnams bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed pa 
[\[128b.6\]]dang /_thob pa chen po thob par byos shig ces bsam gtan la sems sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin pa'i mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang /_chags 
[\[128b.7\]]pa dang /_khong khro ba gnyi ga dang bral bas thams cad btang snyoms thob pa dang /_nan tan dang /_bdag tu shes pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi dbang po la yid kyi 'du byed rnams rtog par mi byed/_rnam par rtog par mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba yongs su 'grub pa rab tu mi spong ba dang /_shes rab sgom pa la brtson pas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra las rab tu thar bar ston pa dang /_sems can rnams thos pa dang bsam gtan la brtson zhing tshol ba bsgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa 
[\[129a.2\]]dang /_yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par khong du chud pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams chos de dang de dag la yang dag par gzhog par byed sbyor bar byed/_'god par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems 
[\[129a.3\]]dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin pa don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba'i 
[\[129a.4\]]dngos po'o/_/gzhan yang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song gsum dang /_ngan song du spyod pa'i nyes pa dang /_sems can nyon mongs pa dang /_tshe dang lta ba dang /_bskal pa'i rnyog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las 
[\[129a.5\]]smon lam gyi rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs la mngon par mi 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon lam mi byed do/_/yang nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis byang chub kyi 
[\[129a.6\]]spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa skyed par byed do/_/
[\[129a.7\]]theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god par byed do/_/de yang 'dir de tsam gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/'dir yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o/_/byang chub thob pa na yang sems can mtshams med pa byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du yongs su smin par 'gro zhing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa nyon mongs pa'i lta ba thams cad las 
[\[129b.2\]]yongs su thar bar byed pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen pos yongs su smin pa'i go cha'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' la las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can gyi go cha rnam pa 
[\[129b.3\]]de lta bus sems can yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin pa'o/_/yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[129b.4\]]po'i mdo/_le'u gsum pa'o//_//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[129b.5\]]chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bar 'ga' ji zhig tu skyes pa na sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par byed/_dge ba'i 
[\[129b.6\]]chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed/_nyon mongs pa dang /_lta ba'i bag chags thams cad las sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /_sems can re re'i don gyi phyir bskal pa'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa nas/_sems can de 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol ba 
[\[129b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas gcig gi thad du phul ba nas/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi thad kyi bar du phul lo/_/gang gi tshe sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par 'gyur ba de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba byas pa dang /_rnam par rol pa mngon par 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]shes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro/_/de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur to/_/de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[130a.2\]]yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar rtogs so/_/de na yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po yang ci 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de na yang rigs kyi bu de'i shin tu sred pa dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu des yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[130a.3\]]la yongs su zhus pa/_las cis na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bas bral ba med par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas 
[\[130a.4\]]'dres pa med pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'dres pa med pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs thams cad kyis 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro/_/yang nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi skye ba ci tsam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[130a.5\]]'tshang mi rgya'o/_/byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya che zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang rang 
[\[130a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rigs kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/_las gang dang gang spyod pa dang /_nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ba de yang rigs kyi bu/_tshe 
[\[130a.7\]]rabs su yon tan dang spyod pa'i nan tan la brtson par 'gyur ba nas/_der skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro/_/gang na rigs 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par spangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra bar byed kyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam 
[\[130b.2\]]ni ma yin no/_/sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang /_yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/gang dag la chos ston 
[\[130b.3\]]pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar bya ba'i phyir ston gyi yongs su ma dag par ma yin no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi yongs su ma dag par ni 
[\[130b.4\]]bsngags par mi byed do/_/sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang 'grogs shing sten pa dang /_sdom pa la dgod pa dang /_yon sbyong ba bsngags par byed kyi yongs su ma dag pa ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[130b.5\]]dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis sngon rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/gang 
[\[130b.6\]]yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med grangs med par da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[130b.7\]]pa de dag thams cad kyis sngon nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'dir yang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gyur to/_/mngon par shes pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]su dag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshad bzung ba dang brtags pa der phyin chad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas/_der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[131a.2\]]kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad kyis rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thams cad kyi thog mar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa 
[\[131a.3\]]bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bo/_/gang gi tshe sems bskyed pas mngon par shes pa thob pa ni sa rab nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang yang phyogs 
[\[131a.4\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag da ltar chos kyi sgra sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang bral zhing chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_gang yang chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob pas dga' ba dang 
[\[131a.5\]]bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang da ltar khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags pa khyed cag thams cad kyi sngon thams cad kyi thog mar nyon 
[\[131a.6\]]mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/thams cad kyi thog mar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par byas pa de la yang mngon par shes pa gang gis phyis phyogs 
[\[131a.7\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kun tu shes shing rtogs pa der phyis skye ba mngon par shes pa'i smon lam byas pas de dag de nyid kyi nan tan gyis zhugs pas 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bsam pa ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas gzhan 'phel ba'i phyir yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa 'di ni mi 'dod do/_/nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa dang /_/lta ba dog par thob pa 'di 
[\[131b.2\]]dag dmod cing 'di la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'i/_sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtar mkhan mkhas pa la la mchog tu dri mi zhim pa dang ldan pa'i sman gyi yo byad kyis mi zhar ba dang long ba rnams kyi 
[\[131b.3\]]mig gi nad cung zad tsam rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/zhi bar shes nas de dag gcig la gcig smras pa/_bdag cag gis gzugs kyi snang ba la lta bar brtsams te/_bdag cag sgron mar gyur pa'i sman pa'i khyim 'di nas byung la 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas phyir 'ong ba yang med pa mang 
[\[131b.4\]]po de dag kyang gang sman pa'i khyim de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta bur nad 'di rab tu zhi ba med pa de dag mig gi nad yun ring por gnas pa bltas nas yang 'ong ngo /_/de dag kyang sman pa'i khyim der gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag yun mi ring bas kyang nad thams cad grol 
[\[131b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gang la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_lta ba ngan pas rtag tu gtse ba'i sems can rnams de la la la dge 
[\[131b.6\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ji ltar yon tan khong du chud pa de ltar rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de las 'byol bar 'dod do/_/gang yang de las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rnam par spyod pa de nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs 
[\[131b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing du gdon mi za bar 'gro bar 'dod do/_/de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las shin tu 'das pas yun ring por sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snga dro'i dus gcig 
[\[132a.2\]]gis kyang tshul khrims bsrungs so/_/tshul khrims bsgoms so sbyin pa byin no/_/bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do/_/brtson 'grus brtsams so/_/bzod pa bsgoms so/_/shes rab kyi yon tan brtsams so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bskal pa brgya stong du'ang pha 
[\[132a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pas spyad pa spyod pa yang ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang yang nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa bon bskyed do/_/yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas 
[\[132a.4\]]kyi zhing der 'gro zhing 'dir de tsam gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas so/_/gang de lta bu'i ye shes snang ba thob pa de thams cad yul smra ba rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 
[\[132a.5\]]gyi chos rnams las 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing lta ba snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi spyod pa brjod du med pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/sems can lus ma rungs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lhan 
[\[132a.6\]]cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba yang med/_sems can lus nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams ci 'dra bar mthong ba la sems kyi nad ci phan du rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i sems kyi sman gyi yo byad rab tu ston par byed do/_/gang gi nyon mongs pas 
[\[132a.7\]]sems can ngan du spyod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag bdag gis spangs te/_sems can de la snying rje chen po skyed do/_/nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa'i phyir brtson pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/ji ltar nyon mongs pa las yongs su thar bar bya zhes 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'dod chags spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa la rab tu sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/zhe sdang spyod pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gti mug spyod pa rnams rten cing 'brel par sbyor ba dang /_skal ba dang bcas par spyod pa rnams dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_
[\[132b.2\]]'dod chags snrel zhir spyod pa rnams byams pa dang /_mi dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_zhe sdang snrel zhir spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa dang /_byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gti mug snrel zhir spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_lta ba 
[\[132b.3\]]ngan pa thob pa rnams stong pa nyid rab tu thob pa dang /_rkyen stobs can rnams la rjes su srung ba dang ldan pa rab tu sbyor ba dang /_rab tu gzung du med cing dngos po med pa dang /_sgrog pa med par shes pa rnams zab mo rnam par zhi bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_spros par shes pa rnams 
[\[132b.4\]]lhag mthong spros pa'i gtam rab tu sbyor bas zhi bar byed do/_/nges par 'dod pa rnams rim gyis smra ba dang /_tshig zad pa rnams bsdu ba rab tu sbyor zhing zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du rab tu sbyor ba dang /_lhag mthong la gus pa can rnams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 
[\[132b.5\]]rab tu sbyor ba dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams cung zad med pa'i skye mched la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gus pa can 
[\[132b.6\]]rnams mtshan ma med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_smon lam la gus pa can rnams smon pa med par smra ba rab tu sbyor ba dang /_tshul khrims la gus pa can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_thos pa la nga rgyal can rnams sred pa thams cad 'byung 
[\[132b.7\]]ba med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_dgon pa pa la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan can la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams tshad med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_phung po la rtag par 'du shes pa rnams 'byung ba dang zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_khams 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]la bdag gir bya ba yongs su spangs pa rnams smig rgyu bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_skye mched yongs su spangs pa rnams lbu ba'i phung por rab tu sbyor ba dang /_'dod pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams chu shing gi snying po med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gzugs kyi 
[\[133a.2\]]khams yongs su spangs pa rnams 'du byed mi rtag par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_bsam gtan la dga' ba dang bde ba yongs su spangs pa rnams chos thams cad la 
[\[133a.3\]]bdag med par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba zhi bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su spangs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu sbyor bas lta ba de dag rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/yid du 'ong 
[\[133a.4\]]ba'i skye bo yongs su spangs pa rnams mi mdzes par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gzugs la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams ro sngon por rab tu sbyor ba dang /_sgra la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams brag ca 'byung ba dang zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_dri la chags pa yongs su 
[\[133a.5\]]spangs pa rnams rlung du rtog par rab tu sbyor ba dang /_ro la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams mi mdzes pa sna tshogs rab tu sbyor ba dang /_reg pa la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams mi gtsang ba'i yan lag sum cu rtsa drug rab tu sbyor ba dang /_snying rje med pa rnams byams par rab tu 
[\[133a.6\]]sbyor ba dang /_gtong ba med pa rnams sbyin pa chen po lnga rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams kha ton du rab tu sbyor ba dang /_'dul ba rnams 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'dul ba rnams rim gyis sems rtse gcig tu 'dus par 
[\[133a.7\]]rab tu sbyor ba dang /_'du byed thams cad kyis mngon par spros pa rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sbyor bas nyon mongs pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro//_//bam po lnga pa/_gzhan yang sems can lha dang mir skye bar bsam pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i las 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do/_/nyan thos kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan par yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la rten cing 'brel par smra ba yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can theg pa 
[\[133b.2\]]chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug sbyor bar byed do/_/thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sems sbyor bar byed do/_/sems can pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams snying rje chen 
[\[133b.3\]]po la yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do/_/ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[133b.4\]]dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed pa de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse'o/_/ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshogs mngon par 'dod pa 
[\[133b.5\]]de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse ba de la skye bar 'dod pa ji snyed pa der skye'o/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs par rnam par mi spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag pa 'dod pa yang med pa der skye bar 'dod pa de ci tsam pa der skye'o/_/yang nyon mongs 
[\[133b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi 'dod pa de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o/_/rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can lta ba dog pa rnyed pa dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur 
[\[133b.7\]]pa 'debs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams rgyun gcod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med grangs med pa rnams 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed kyang gang byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed mi nus so/_/
[\[134a.2\]]yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs rab tu sbyor ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_gal te sems can gcig 
[\[134a.3\]]gi zhe sdang spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa dang /_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi skal ba dang bcas par spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de bzhin 
[\[134a.4\]]du thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zhi bar byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can gcig gi skal ba dang bcas par spyod pa nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen po byed do/_/gang sems 
[\[134a.5\]]can gcig gi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de yang sems can gcig gi dgos pas brtson 'grus brtan pa la mos shing pha rol gnon pa na thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu sbyor ba dang /_pha rol gnon 
[\[134a.6\]]pas gzir ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal chen po 'di la ltos shig_/ji ltar sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi nas gling gcig gi sems can yongs su tshang ba re re'i dgos pas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i 
[\[134a.7\]]mtshan nyid stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed cing gling gnyis pa dang gling bzhi pa nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing du bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can re re'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang po spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis 'jug pa de ltar sems can gcig gi mos pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes shing bri ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_'phel 
[\[134b.2\]]ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_sems 
[\[134b.3\]]can gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_stong pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_dben pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa nas de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du rab tu shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can re re'i chags pa'i mtshan nyid sna 
[\[134b.4\]]tshogs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes pas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems can nyon mongs pa dam pos bcings pa las yongs su thar bar nus so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[134b.5\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can yongs su smin par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la snying rje chen po rgyun mi gcod cing yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa 'di yang byang chub 
[\[134b.6\]]sems dpa'i rtsal chen po'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang gA sum cu'i bye ma snyed mi skye ba'i 
[\[134b.7\]]chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyis dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas mgrin gcig tu 'di ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/chu bo 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gang rnams blta dka' chu bos khyer/_/nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal yul las shes/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho las ni mthar phyin med/_/lam gyis bdag cag kyang ni rnam par gnas/_/sems can gang rnams nyon mongs gtum pas gdungs/_/nyon mongs sangs 
[\[135a.2\]]rgyas zhing du rtag rnam myos/_/ngan song 'gro bar rtag tu sdug bsngal bsags/_/'chad mkhan dam pa'i don gyi theg pa ston/_/bdag cag nyon mongs sems can rnams dgos pas/_/sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam byed 'gyur ba/_/nyon mongs zhing du bdag cag spyad pa spyod/_/
[\[135a.3\]]sems can nyon mongs dam bcings grol bar byed/_/gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dregs/_/gti mug lam stor sdig pa rab byed pa/_/sdig pa thams cad las ni bdag cag zlog_/'khor ba'i dgon pa 'jigs las rab tu sgrol/_/gang dmyal byol song [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten 
[\[135a.4\]]du/_/rtag tu 'dod med sdug bsngal myong ba dag_/bdag cag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol byed/_/nyon mongs sangs rgyas zhing du byang chub spyod/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par khyab pa'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam 
[\[135a.5\]]pa legs par spobs shing mchog tu rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus brtan pa la brtson pa pha rol gnon pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan pa legs so legs so/_/gang chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skyes bu dam pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi 
[\[135a.6\]]spyod pa bor te rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyod pa la brtson no/_/sems can mtshams med par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_lus tshig pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i 
[\[135a.7\]]phyir snying rje chen po bskyed do/_/nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston to/_/lus med pa phung po spong ba'i mtha' ston to/_/tshig tsam gyis skyes bu de dag brtson par 'gyur ba de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]chen po byed na de dag gi brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon pa 'di la brtson pa lta ci smos te/_ji ltar tshig gis dam bcas pa de ltar dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba 
[\[135b.2\]]byin te skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar smra ba'i tshig tsam gyis rtsom par 'gyur ba de de bzhin te/_de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na de'i shes pas nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 
[\[135b.3\]]rnam pa de lta bu'i de dag gi rtsal chen po bya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_mtshams med par byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du rnam pa de lta bu'i brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/ji 
[\[135b.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa shes rab kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di brjod ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa 
[\[135b.5\]]chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos so/_/lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char yang rab tu phab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo yang rab tu dkrol to/_/lha dang /_dri za dang /_mi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[135b.6\]]dpa' chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed po de dag la mchog tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson no/_/ji snyed ye shes mdzod 'di bstan du gsol/_/ye shes phyir yang ston pa 'di nyid ston/_/mkhyen pa khyed kyi gang gi slob ston pa/_/thub pa shes pa'i smra ba 'di la 'jug_/mkhyen 
[\[135b.7\]]pa can gyi zhing mang bye ba la/_/thob pa'i ye shes ston pa 'di la 'jug_/bdag ni ye shes 'brog sa myur gnas shing /_/tshul 'di la yang ye shes lam rab ston/_/ji ltar byang chub spyod phyir shes 'gyur ba/_/rgyal ba ye shes rgyal mtshan 'di la 'jug_/ji ltar nam mkha' 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dri med stong pa'i chos/_/bdag dang 'thun pa'i gtam dag bstan du gsol/_/ston mkhan mi yi gtso bo 'di la mchog_/mchog tu yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa ston/_/stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs dgra zil gnon/_/rtag pa dang ni chad pa thal bar byas/_/dpa' dang 
[\[136a.2\]]rtul phod gang zag dam pa mchog_/srid pa zhi ba gang zag dam pa mchog_/sred pa zhi zhing zhi gnas rab tu ston/_/rgyal ba rab tu zhi ba 'di la 'jug_/rgyal ba stong pa nyid zhi rab bstan gsol/_/rgyal ba stong pa nyid 'di la yang 'jug_/kha dog dung dang kha ba 'dra ba yi/_/zhi ba 
[\[136a.3\]]mdzes pa'i stong pa nyid bstan gsol/_/nyan thos kyi ni 'di la tshogs rnams spangs/_/ston gyi nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/_/gtso bo dag gis shin tu gsal shing mdzes/_/'dir ni lam zhi stong pa nyid bstan gsol/_/brgya byin tshangs pa'i skad ltar sgra dbyangs snyan/_/
[\[136a.4\]]sems can dma' la thugs brtse chen po yis/_/thub pa 'di ni stong pa nyid la 'jug_/mya ngan dang bral 'gro ba 'di la tshim/_/dma' ba spyod pa rtag tu byin brlabs pas/_/shes rab mang gzigs stong pa nyid zhi gsungs/_/sdig pa bcom zhing nyes tshogs dri ma med/_/
[\[136a.5\]]'di ni 'gro la theg pa ngan pa spangs/_/dge ba'i mtshan nyid spyod yul rab nyams pas/_/kye ma'o da ltar stong pa nyid zhi gsungs/_/rma bya ngang pa ne tso ske ka dbyangs/_/nyams pa'i phyogs cha can gyi sgra rnams 'jig_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas 
[\[136a.6\]]lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI kas mngon par gtor to/_/'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/le'u bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[136a.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa na mi bzhugs pa de tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi slad du lha rdzas kyi gser dang /_lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya sngon po'i skas mngon par sprul te/_skas de 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dag gi ngos gnyis la bram ze'i byis pa tshe lo sum cu pa lta bu tshangs dbyangs dang ldan pa gser gyi dbyig pa dang gdugs 'dzin pa/_tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul to/_/de nas bram ze'i byis pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[136b.2\]]logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/khyod ni rab nyon mongs la sngon thugs bskyed/_/nyon mongs theg la byang chub phan pa'i rgyu/_/nyon mongs zhi phyir rgyal ba bsnyen kyang bkur/_/nyon mongs 
[\[136b.3\]]thabs mdzad rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol/_/nyon mongs spyod pa thams cad khyod kyis spangs/_/sems can nyon mongs la ni rtag tu gnyen/_/khyod ni nyon mongs las las 'gro ba bzlog_/nyon mongs rgal ba'i rgyus ni rtag tu myos/_/nyon mongs ma rungs khyod kyis rab 
[\[136b.4\]]tu zhi/_/bdag gi blos ni nyon mongs dra ba bcad/_/'gro ba rtag tu nyon mongs chu las sgrol/_/nyon mongs sun 'byin rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol/_/nyon mongs zhing du byang chub dam par reg_/ye shes sgron 'chang 'gro ba shes nyams pa'i/_/sems can thams 
[\[136b.5\]]cad la ni thar ston pa/_/nyon mongs snyon smongs zhi phyir 'dir gshegs gsol/_/ye shes 'od zer gyis ni rnam thar ston/_/khyod thugs brtse bas 'gro ba shes nyams khyab/_/ye shes kyis ni 'gro la mig ldan pas/_/rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma 'dir gshegs gsol/_/
[\[136b.6\]]mkhyen pas lha dang mi mang thar bar mdzad/_/khyod kyi ye shes srog dang gang zag med/_/thub pa ye shes dpa' ba 'di la 'jug_/nyon mongs pa la sbyin mdzod dran pa gsungs/_/nyi ma zla ba mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan/_/rgyal ba sems can thal mo sbyar la gsungs/_/thub 
[\[136b.7\]]pa byang chub mchog phyir bstan du gsol/_/'phags pa thub pa 'di la 'jug pa gsungs/_/rgyal ba byang chub rgyu can mdzes gzigs pa/_/phyogs bzhi 'dir ni yang dag lhags mang la/_/stong pa nyid dang bzod spyod shes gyur gsungs/_/rgyal ba dpa' gtong 'di la shin tu 'dug 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bram ze'i byis pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan 'di smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_de nas drang srong thub pa gdan de las bzhengs pa dang /_de nyid kyi tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po 'di lan 
[\[137a.2\]]drug tu g.yos so/_/lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi a ga ru dang /_ta ga ra dang /_dus dang 'thun pa'i 
[\[137a.3\]]tsan dan gyi char mngon par phab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi gos dang /_rgyan dang yid bzhin gyi gos dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig gi se mo do dang rin po che'i char mngon par phab bo/_/lha rdzas kyi rol mo rdung ba mngon par dkrol to/_/dbyangs kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces 
[\[137a.4\]]gsol to/_/bdag cag sngon ma bstan pa'i chos mnyan par bgyi'o/_/bdud kyi yul las yang dag par shin du 'da' bar bgyi'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i yul gzhom par bgyi'o/_/ye shes kyi yul khong du chud par bgyi'o/_/zab mo stong pa nyid kyi lam khong du chud par bgyi'o 
[\[137a.5\]]zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa de dag la 'dzegs te/_seng ge'i khri bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs nas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pas dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor kun cang mi smra bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te sems 
[\[137a.6\]]rtse gcig tu drang srong thub pa la lta bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa ma lus par sa dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sems can ji snyed 'dir ni kun lhags pa/_/
[\[137a.7\]]byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su chos tshol na/_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa rab bstan gyis/_/de dag thams cad rtse gcig sems su nyon/_/sems can la la gti mug sred pas bsgribs/_/phung po dag la'ang lta ba rnam mi spong /_/gang dag da dung byang chub mchog spyod brtson/_/yang 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]yang 'di la yon tan cung zad spyod/_/dbang po drug la stong pa mi lta ste/_/mtshan ma med pa'i 'dzin pa bdag la zung /_/byang chub phyir ni cung zad brtson spyod kyi/_/shes rab yon tan thams cad spyod pa med/_/ji ltar me 'dod khyim gyi nang du ni/_/btsal bas kyang ni me dag rnyed ma 
[\[137b.2\]]gyur/_/de ltar sems can la la byang chub 'dod/_/stong ma bsgoms par shes rab thob pa med/_/de bas gang dag byang chub sdug 'dod pa/_/phung po khams dang skye mched mtshan ma dag_/rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur thams cad ltos/_/'di ni byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam/_/de nas 
[\[137b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das te nga yir bya ba dang /_
[\[137b.4\]]bdag gir bya ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i bag la nyal ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_ma rig par lta ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dres pa med pa dang /_sems can gyi go cha dang /_sems sgyu ma lta bu dang /_tshor ba du ba dang /_rdul dang /_
[\[137b.5\]]nam mkha' dang /_sprin lta bur rab tu shes so/_/mtshan ma dang mtshan nyid thams cad nam mkha' spros pa lta bur rab tu shes so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/las yongs su zad cing sems can nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[137b.6\]]bskyed pa dang ma bskyed pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par thal ba med par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa seng ge lta bu 
[\[137b.7\]]dang /_rgya mtsho chen po lta bu chos chen po'i char gyi chu bo rab tu gtong ba dang /_'khrul ba med pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /_bstod pa dang rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'di bsgoms pa nas lus dpang du btsugs pa'i bar 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]du 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la bzod pa 'di rnam pa gnyis te/_yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa dang /_nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de la yang dag par spyod 
[\[138a.2\]]pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa lnga ste/_rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe 
[\[138a.3\]]na/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa brgyad de/_byang chub sems dpas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa brtags pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o/_/gzugs zhes bya ba ni nad do/_/'dod chags zhes bya ba ni rnam 
[\[138a.4\]]par 'jig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do/_/gang rnam par 'jig pa'i rang bzhin de ni mi rtag pa'o/_/de'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid yongs su chad pa'o/_/phyi dang nang gi rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyun bcad pa'o/_/nam mkha' ji ltar thams cad dang ldan
