[\[197a.2\]]bas gdungs pa'i sems can rnams dang /_sman dang /_lo ma dang /_nags tshal dang /_shing gel pa rnams tshim par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu nam mkha' la 'brug bsgrags pa de bzhin du shin tu zab mo'i smon lam 'dis 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa 'di dag la gzhog par byed do/_/
[\[197a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mi bzad par brtson pa'i smon lam gyis rnam pa de lta bu'i smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas gzi brjid du bskal pa'i 'od chen por 'gyur ro/_/de na yang rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su skye zhing /_de 
[\[197a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ma lus pa'i gnas dbang phyug gi 
[\[197a.5\]]rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po de la yan lag lngas zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ma thag tu bdag gi spyi bo sa la reg pa tsam gyis na/_de na de nyid kyi tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i sa chu zla bzhin du rab tu g.yos so/_/
[\[197a.6\]]lha dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa 'dis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa chos chen po/_snying rje chen po can/_brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_brtson pa dang mthu chen po shin tu dka' ba'i smon lam btab pa 
[\[197a.7\]]legs so legs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyod de na yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar bdag nyi ma re re zhing yang bcom ldan 'das de la me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod pa'i gnas su byas par gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar khyod zla ba gsum pa de dag las shin tu 'das nas rgyal po'i longs spyod dang /_kun tu spyod pa thams cad spangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po de'i spyan sngar srog chags 
[\[197b.2\]]stong phrag bcu dang thabs cig tu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas/_yang dag par dad pas rab tu byung ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rab tu byung ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yul gzhan du rgyu zhing gshegs pa'i bar du de nas bdag kyang grong rdal gzhan du bsod 
[\[197b.3\]]snyoms kyi phyir phyin te/_grong rdal der mchod sbyin chen po so sor gnas par gyur to/_/de la yang srog chags mang po gsad par bya bar 'dod pa de la gal te bdag sems can 'di dag gsod pa las yongs su ma thar na/_bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[197b.4\]]tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya zhing rga shi'i chu bo las sems can yongs su smin par mi nus so zhes snying rje chen po skyes te/_der nye bar phyin nas dris pa/_kye gang gi phyir mchod sbyin 'di bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_yul 'dir char mi 'bab par 'gyur zhing /_mu ge yang 'byung 
[\[197b.5\]]ba dang /_'dir sems can mang po nad kyis gos pa dang /_long ba dang /_zhar bar 'gyur ba dang /_nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang /_rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang /_blon po dang /_grong dang /_ljongs dang /_mi'i mchog gcig la gcig 'khrug pa rnam pa de lta bu'i ltas ngan pa de dag 
[\[197b.6\]]med par bya ba dang /_nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_kun 'dus par bya ba'i phyir mchod sbyin 'di bya'o/_/de nas de dag la bdag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sems can 'di dag gsod pa las yongs su thar bar nus kyis mchod sbyin gyi ra ba 'dir ma gsod 
[\[197b.7\]]cig_/bdag gis khyod la mu ge dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_nad dang /_nang gi 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su zhi bar bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_dge sbyong mgo reg nus sam zhes pa dang /_bdag gis sems can de dag la mchod sbyin gyi ra ba mi snang bar byas 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]so/_/de la yang bdag gis smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das mad par gsungs pas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan pa de lta bu'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/
[\[198a.2\]]gal te mchod sbyin 'di'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pas bdag bsad de/_bdag gis lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung bu ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin yul yongs su skyong ba la lus 'di dbul bar bya zhing bdag gi khrag shin tu rgya che ba mdangs can byung bar 
[\[198a.3\]]gyur nas yul yongs su skyong ba de dag kyang khrag 'di la yongs su 'thung bar gyur cig_/yongs su 'thungs pas yul skyong ba re re la yang yul 'dir de tsam gyi ltas ngan rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/de tsam gyis bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nad med pas thab mo dang /_
[\[198a.4\]]bcing ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_rtsod pa la 'jug pa'i gnyen por phun sum tshogs par gyur cig_/sems can re re zhing yang 'dir de tsam gyi bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur cig_/sems can rnams kyi yul 'dir de tsam gyi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_ngag 
[\[198a.5\]]gi gnas ngan len dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len med par gyur cig_/yul ji tsam pa 'dir sems can thams cad de tsam gyi mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur cig_/gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe 
[\[198a.6\]]sems can 'di thams cad rga shi las yongs su thar par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu ji tsam par gyur pa de tsam gyi bskal pa chen po'i gling bzhi pa re re la mchod sbyin gyi ra bar mchod sbyin gyi phyir bdag bsad la/_gang mi dag mchod sbyin gyi ra ba'i phyir gsad par 
[\[198a.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_gang byol song gi skye gnas can thams cad kyi phyir bdag mchod sbyin gyi ra ba de dag tu gsad par byos shig_/de nas yul 'dir bdag gi lus mi snang bar gyur cig_/yul de na gsod pa dang /_nad dang /_mu ge dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_'khrug pa gnyis dang /_
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]shin tu grang ba dang /_shin tu dro ba dang /_dug dang /_byad stems dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char dang /_dus ma yin pa'i sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_phye ma leb gsod pa dang /_sdom pa med pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba dang /_chos 
[\[198b.2\]]ma yin pa la chags pa dang /_slu ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gi dngos po rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams gcig la gcig dga' ba'i sems dang /_
[\[198b.3\]]'jam pa'i sems dang /_las su rung ba'i sems dang /_gzung du med pa'i sems dang /_sa dang mtshungs pa bral ba med pa'i sems dang /_sbyin pa'i sems su gyur cig_/de na sems can rnams 'byung ba'i sems dang /_tshul khrims kyi sems dang /_zhi gnas kyi 
[\[198b.4\]]sems dang /_brtson 'grus kyi sems dang /_bzod pa'i sems dang /_bsam gtan gyi sems dang /_shes rab kyi bsgom pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems su gyur cig_/gang la bdag mchod sbyin gyi phyir gsad par bya ba nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang rnyog pa 
[\[198b.5\]]lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du rtsal chen po bya ba'i bar du bdag gi sngon gyi ltas de dag byung bar gyur cig_/nam mkha' las char 'bab par gyur cig ces bdag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe na bdag gi lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung bu las 'o ma 
[\[198b.6\]]zag cing nam mkha' las char kyang rab tu 'bab bo/_/de na yang mchod sbyin can des mi gsad par bcom ldan 'das la 'dir dpang du gsol te/_yul de na thams cad kyang dpal phun sum tshogs pa bde ba'i yo byad dang 'thun par gyur to/_/nad dang /_thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_
[\[198b.7\]]char mi 'bab pa mi snang bar byas te/_gang bdag mir gyur pas chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin gyi ra ba la mchod sbyin byas pa bcom ldan 'das dpang du gsol lo/_/bal glang gi gzugs kyis chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin byas pa nas rta'i gzugs dang /_g.yag gi 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gzugs dang /_glang gi gzugs dang /_phag gi gzugs dang /_spyang ki'i gzugs dang /_phyugs kyi gzugs dang /_bse'i gzugs dang /_ma he'i gzugs dang /_wa'i gzugs bsdus pas bdag byol song gi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la skye 
[\[199a.2\]]gnas re re thob pas chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor la mchod sbyin byas so/_/phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed du rnam pa de lta bu'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can rnams bde bas tshim par byas pa 
[\[199a.3\]]rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal chen po byas so//_//bam po bcu gcig pa ste tha ma/_yang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ngan pa'i dus kyi tshe nad pa la la zhig gi don du ra'i gtsang sha 'tshal bar gyur la/_yul de na ra ma mchis na de la bdag gis smon lam 'di 
[\[199a.4\]]lta bu btab ste/_gal te bdag bla na med pa'i shes rab chen po ma thob kyi bar du bdag gi smon lam 'di grub par gyur cig_/bdag shing chen po 'di la 'dzegs te/_bdag mchongs nas rdzus te rar skyes la/_lhas mi rnams la bsgo ba 'di ni nad pa rnams kyi sman du gyur pa yin 
[\[199a.5\]]gyis sems can de dag gis sha zo shig dang /_de dag gi nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bdag 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su gyur pa der sems can rnams sha za bar ma gyur cig_/de na nad kyis reg pa rnams la sman du ma gyur pa'i dngos po med par gyur 
[\[199a.6\]]cig_/yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pas phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur cig_/bdag da ltar ra'i gzugs kyis nad pa rnams bsnyen bkur byed pa de bzhin du ji srid du yun ring por 
[\[199a.7\]]'khor ba na sems can rnams nad kyis reg par gyur pa la sha dang /_khrag dang /_'o ma dang /_mar gyis sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi yun ring por sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du byol song gi skye gnas su gyur cig_/bdag shing de las 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'dzegs nas bdag mchongs te/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos la/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_a ga ru dang /_ta ka ra dang /_dus 
[\[199b.2\]]dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char rab tu phab nas bdag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug la 'di skad ces smras te/_skyes bu dam pa sems can no cog gis bdag ma gsad cig dang /_bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can nad pa rnams nad thams cad las 
[\[199b.3\]]yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/char mi 'bab cing mu ge 'byung ba thams cad dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar las kyang thar bar bya ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag shing de 
[\[199b.4\]]las mchongs pa lha rnams kyis bdag nam mkha' bar snang las bzung ste/_de na bdag gis sems can rnams la bslabs nas sems can rnams chos la sbyor bar byas so/_/de na bdag gis sems can khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po lnga mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 
[\[199b.5\]]byas so/_/bdag gi tshig gis lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar la btsud cing so sor bkod do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de lta bu lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[199b.6\]]chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyangs la legs sa zhes bya ba byin nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smon lam de lta bur gyur te/_spyad par dka' ba spyod pa'i seng ge'i sgra de lta bu bsgrags pa ni legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ji ltar sdon gang ga zhes bya ba nyi ma la dga' bar gyur pa de ngas 
[\[199b.7\]]bskul nas thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur tam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon lan 'ga' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ma mchis so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag thog ma byang 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]chub sems dpar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i thad du mchis te/_de'i tshe da ltar ji skad du brjod pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[200a.2\]]bu khyod gal te sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na smon lam de lta bu sus bslabs/_gsol pa/_de na bdag dben pa zhig tu mchis te/_dog sa la mchis nas smon lam zhig gdab par sems pa de na bdag gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang pos 
[\[200a.3\]]smon lam de dag bsgo ba dang /_des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar smon lam btab bo/_/de na bdag sems can rnams la snying rje skyes te 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs so/_/de phyis rjes su dpag pa des mchod sbyin smra ba bdag yongs su btang ba bgyis te/_smon lam de lta bu 
[\[200a.4\]]btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci khyod lta bar song ba de dag tu zhugs sam/_gsol pa/_ma lags so/_su zhig gi mthus/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das smon lam gyi khyad par gyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[200a.5\]]de de bzhin te/_smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su dgrol gyi/_gzhan gang gi mthus kyang sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyir lung bstan pa 'di su zhig gi 
[\[200a.6\]]dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du yin nam/_'on te dus gsum gyi bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa tshor ba'i skye mched drug po 'di dag gi yin nam/_'on te tshor ba med pa yin nam/_byang chub 
[\[200a.7\]]kyi phyir lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di su zhig gi yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_bdag lung bstan par gsol ba'am bdag lung ston pa'am/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de ma mchis so/_/de ci'i 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]slad du zhe na/_ji ltar nam mkha' 'di rdzas ma mchis/_dngos po ma mchis/_rang bzhin ma mchis/_cung zad kyang ma mchis/_yi ge ma mchis/_thob pa ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang rdzas ma mchis shing dngos po ma mchis pa nas/_brjod du 
[\[200b.2\]]ma mchis shing ma skyes pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi gzugs 'byung ba ma mchis te lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma skyes pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi mig 'byung ba ma mchis shing lta ba'i 
[\[200b.3\]]mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi bar dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma mchis sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis pa'i tshor ba yang ma skyes pa nas lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus 
[\[200b.4\]]gsum gyi gzugs kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos nyid la skye ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_'jig pa mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi dbyings la yang gnas par mi dmigs te/_ming dang gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/brdar btags pa tsam du yang gzugs kyi 
[\[200b.5\]]mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus gsum gyi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang brdar btags pa tsam du yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan 
[\[200b.6\]]nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus gsum gyi mig gi yang dag pa'i mtha' nas brda tsam du btags pa'i mig gi mtshan nyid nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba yang ma mchis/_sdug 
[\[200b.7\]]bsngal yang ma mchis pa'i bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid kyi skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gog pa mi dmigs so/_/yid dang chos kyi khams kyang mi 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dmigs so/_/bdag gis ni yid rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni brag ca lta bu ste/_nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang 
[\[201a.2\]]ma bzung ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_rmi lam lta bu/_chu zla lta bu ste/_nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[201a.3\]]dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin spangs pa'i mtshan nyid bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/_/de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing yongs su gzung du ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang 
[\[201a.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_rab tu stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma 
[\[201a.5\]]dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mi 'gyur ba stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med 
[\[201a.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag bzung ba de ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni rnam grangs 'dis kyang de skad brjod par 
[\[201a.7\]]bgyi ste/_'di lta ste/_de ni ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'di lta ste/_bdag la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/lung bstan to snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ni lung bstan pa yang 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong /_brjod pa dang lung bstan pa dang 'khor ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_rnal 'byor ma lags pa dang /_lam dang /_lam ma lags pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste/_
[\[201b.2\]]dper na de bzhin nyid kyi lam ma mchis shing phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid kyi lam yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de bzhin du gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 
[\[201b.3\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi lam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di'i skabs dang go skabs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gang gzugs kyi lung 
[\[201b.4\]]bstan pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /_mig nas yid kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa dang /_gang byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_kun tu rgyu shin tu rnam par 
[\[201b.5\]]phye ba'i sas kyang de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/_yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/sems can gzhan mu stegs can nga rgyal bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[201b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[201b.7\]]'das sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin des sems can gyi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi sgra brjod pa'i tshig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin des skye gnas dang sgra dbyangs kyi tshig brjod pa 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]thams cad tshim par byed do/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang smras pa nyon cig_/grogs po dag nyon cig_/grogs po dag lha dang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lam gang gis nyan thos kyi theg pa rnyed de sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur 
[\[202a.2\]]ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnyed pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par 'gyur ba bde ba dang zhi ba'i lam ston cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra dbyangs brjod pa de phyogs bcu kun tu skad dang tshig gcig brjod pas yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa 
[\[202a.3\]]stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi brjod pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa des sems can thams cad rang rang gi tshig khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed sgra dbyangs kyis 
[\[202a.4\]]rgyas par byed do/_/chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa de'i sems can ngan par song ba rnams kyi rna lam du yang grag go/_/de nas sems can de dag rang rang gi tshig kun tu shes nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar yid du 'ong ba 'di 
[\[202a.5\]]ltar snyan pa/_'di ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di su'i tshig bdag cag la zhi ba dang bde ba'i lam ston pa'i sems can gyi snying po 'di su zhig_/lam gang bstan pas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob/_nyan thos kyis ni ci 'dra ba zhig_/rang 
[\[202a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyisa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyisa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig_/lam gang thob na bdag cag lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad byang zhing sdug bsngal thams cad byang ste/_lus kyi g.yeng ba thams cad srab par gyur/_de bas na 
[\[202a.7\]]bdag cag gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan par bya snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag bcu po 'di dag ni dge ba'i las kyi lam ste/_des lha dang mir skye ba rab tu 'thob/_sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba nyan thos kyi theg pa yang 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]'thob/_sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i las kyi lam des sems can thams cad kyi mchog dam pa khyad par can phul/_byams pa chen po/_snying rje chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[202b.2\]]thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang zhe na/_dge ba'i las kyi lam gang dang ldan na sems can rnams myur du lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob 
[\[202b.3\]]par 'gyur ba ste/_de la grogs po dag lha dang mi rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam la brtson par bya'o/_/sbyin pa sbyin no/_/tshul khrims srung ngo /_/'du shes bcu bsgom par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par bam par 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[202b.4\]]gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par rnags par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang /_'bus gang bar 'du shes 
[\[202b.5\]]pa dang /_rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang /_keng rus su 'du shes pa dang /_rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang /_'chi bar 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/_/gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i 
[\[202b.6\]]bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa thob ste/_mir gyur pa thob nas kyang yang gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes bcu gnyis bsgom par bya ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[202b.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_zhi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs rgyu ba rjes su dran 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]pa dang /_lhag mthong rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes 'di bsgom par bya'o/_/gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su thob cing mir gyur pa thob nas kyang sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi'i ror 'gron bya bar bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[203a.2\]]drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/drug gang zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra skad 
[\[203a.3\]]dang /_dbyangs brjod pas sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'di lta ste/_da ltar gyi bzhin du bde ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag rnams ni gor ma chag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i spobs 
[\[203a.4\]]pa mthong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_ting nge 'dzin des phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam 
[\[203a.5\]]pa stong par gyur pa'i rnyog pa lnga'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed du sprul pa'i phyir sems can tshangs pa la mos pa de dag gi mdun du ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su so sor gnas shing chos ston to/_/la la dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 
[\[203a.6\]]len du 'dzud la 'jug par byed cing so sor 'god do/_/sems can la la dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/_/la la dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la'o/_/la la dag ni dge ba'i las kyi lam la sbyor bas lha dang mi rnams kyi phyir ro/_/gang dbang phyug la mos pa 
[\[203a.7\]]nas/_glang po la glang po'i gzugs kyi bar dang /_rta la rta'i gzugs dang /_yi dwags la yi dwags kyi gzugs dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa la sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste chos ston to/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]sems can la la dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nas lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang sbyor te/_sems can gang dag der sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bskyed pa de dag ni de bas kyang brtan par byas so/_/sems can gang dag sngon 
[\[203b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni der bskyed do/_/sems can gang dad pa'i rgyu des ngan song gsum po de dag las shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer 
[\[203b.3\]]yang tshad med grangs med pa'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun to/_/la la dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob bo/_/la la dag ni de lta bu'i bzod pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[203b.4\]]'dzin dang /_gzungs rab tu thob ste/_bzod pa dang /_gzungs ji snyed thob pa'i stobs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gan du lhags so/_/gang rkyen la 'jug pa'i theg pa la sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun 
[\[203b.5\]]pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA'i grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dag las kha cig ni gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing skyong la/_sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong ngo /_/kha cig ni 
[\[203b.6\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/_/de bzhin du gang nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang /_de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA grangs 
[\[203b.7\]]med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang /_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par gnas pa lha dang mi'i lam thob par gyur pa chu klung gang gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]brgya stong smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes so/_/la la dag ni smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho skyong zhing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[204a.2\]]dag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/_chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu skyes nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_kun tu spyod pa dang /_bde ba'i yo byad sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu grangs med dpag tu med pa 
[\[204a.3\]]byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/_de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'jig rten dag na mkhas pa gang /_/blo dang ldan zhing 'jigs med pa/_/byang chub tu ni sems bsngos shing /_/bya bar dka' ba rnams kyang spyod/_/
[\[204a.4\]]pha yi dngos po rnam par ston/_/sems can sdug bsngal smin par byed/_/bdud bzhi dag kyang 'dul bar byed/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba thob/_/sbyin pa sdom pa sdom pa yis/_/sems can rnams la las ston cing /_/theg pa gsum la sbyor ba yis/_/de dag thar pa'i skal ba 
[\[204a.5\]]thob/_/gang dag ngan 'gro gsum gnas pa/_/sdug bsngal gnod las thar byed cing /_/de dag sems ni dang byas nas/_/lha dang mir ni rab tu khrid/_/dge ba'i chos la rab sbyor zhing /_/gang dang gang la mos pa dag_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/_/de dag 
[\[204a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'thun par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/_
[\[204a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gnyis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gyur pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu 'khrol/_me tog gi char yang rab tu bab/_a ga ru dang /_ta ga ra dang /_dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan dang /_sbrul gyi snying po tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char dag kyang rab tu phab/_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_yid 
[\[204b.2\]]bzhin gyi na bza' dang /_dar gyi lda ldi'i phreng ba dang /_gser gyi lcag pod dang /_mu tig gi se mo do dang /_dpung rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings kyang brgyan to/_/klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson pas mu tig gi se mo do rnam 
[\[204b.3\]]pa sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu'i char kyang rab tu phab bo/_/byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang /_kun tu bzang po la sogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[204b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba slad ma dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de skad ma zer cig_/ma 
[\[204b.5\]]'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i dus kyi bar dag tu gang dag rigs bzhi'i 'khor mi dad pa dag 'byung ste/_spyod pa ngan pa/_tshul khrims ngan pa/_gzhogs slong byed pa/_thos pa nyung ba/_ser sna can/_spyod pa ma rungs pa/_sdig pa'i lta bar gnas pa/_rtag pa dang chad pa la lta ba phal 
[\[204b.6\]]cher 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/_rgyu dang 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod pa/_gcig la gcig ngan du sems shing bdag stong pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dang ldan pa dag 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po yang chos dang ldan pa mi 'byung ste/_'dod 
[\[204b.7\]]pa yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skabs tshol ba/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim na gnas pa mchod par 'os pa dag la brnyas pa shin tu byed cing mchod pa'i 'os ma yin pa la dad de/_gzhogs slong can/_g.yo sgyu can/_tshul khrims ngan pa can/_thos 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa nyung ba bsod nams chung ba/_snying rje chung ba/_yid mi gzhungs pa/_log par zhugs pa'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la rgyal po gus par byed cing zhe sa byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed cing kun tu 'dzin to/_/de dag kyang nyin dang mtshan 
[\[205a.2\]]du bde ba 'dor zhing 'phral gang du rgyal po'i dgos pa ma rungs pa dag spyod de/_rgyal po yang 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba mang ba 'byung ste/_rgyal po'i skyon de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro'o/_/byang chub 
[\[205a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni dgon pa dang /_nags tshal gyi gnas su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_chog shes pa dang /_btang snyoms la gnas so/_/gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te/_yul gyi phan pa dang /_dgos pa 
[\[205a.4\]]thams cad yal bar 'dor ro/_/yul de yang 'khor gnyis kyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i nyes pas de na sems can rnams nad mang bar 'gyur te/_tshogs dang bral ba/_dran pa nyams pa/_chos ma yin pa tshol ba/_myur du rga ba/_myur du 'khogs pa/_myur du 'chi 
[\[205a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu 'di lta bu'i yul 'khrug par 'gyur na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su la yongs su gtang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu ri mor bya bar mi 'os pa 'chal pa'i shes rab can/_brlang ba/_brkam pa/_nor la 
[\[205a.6\]]dga'i chos la mi dga' ba tshig la dad kyi dgos pa la ma yin pa/_mi sems pa/_gzhogs slong can/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]che zhing gzhan 'drid par sems pa dag 'byung ngo /_/gang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim na gnas pa/_mkhas pa chos 'dod pa/_chos smra ba de dag la ri 
[\[205a.7\]]mor mi byed/_mi lta'i/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba'i tshig la dga' zhing brnyas pa/_chos ma yin pa'i tshig thos na bya bar sems pa 'byung ngo /_/gang bsod nams chung ba dang /_shes rab chung ba dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa can dang /_gzhogs slong can dang /_brlang ba dang /_bdag stod 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]pa dang /_gzhan smod pa dang /_lta ba ma rungs pa dang /_'phral gang du sems kyi lus dang ngag mi sdom pa dang /_chos 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang /_sdig pa la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim na gnas pa de dag kyang ri mor bya ba ma yin 
[\[205b.2\]]pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i zham ring ba la nor gyi phung pos rjes su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/nor gyi stobs de dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i stobs des ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams la yang mchod cing rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/ri mor bya ba ma yin 
[\[205b.3\]]pa'i rgyal ba'i zham ring ba'i tshig nyan cing byed de mchod pa nas rgyal po la mchod par gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i bar gyi nyes pas chos kyi phyogs tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/chos ma yin pa'i phyogs bslang bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems 
[\[205b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar la bsam gtan byed par 'gyur na ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su zhig la gtad par bya/_gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshe na khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/_bdag 
[\[205b.5\]]brtson par sems shing de dag mi dad pa dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa dang /_shes rab 'chal cing khyim dang /_rigs dang /_gnas dang /_yul dang /_rnyed pas chos la ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/_/gcig la gcig gnod par sems pa dang /_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skabs 
[\[205b.6\]]tshol ba dang /_gzhan las rnyed cing rim gro byas na yid dga' ba dang /_yul dam pa rnyed pa'i dge slong rnams la dmod pa dang /_gzhan gyi gnas dang /_grong khyer dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang /_so sor 
[\[205b.7\]]rtog pa zhi ba dang bde ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang /_zas dang /_skom gyi ro la brkam pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la brtson pa 'byung ngo /_/khyim na gnas pa rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_/chos 'dod pa rnams la brnyas pa shin tu byed pas chos smra ba'i dge 'dun 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rnams gtsug lag khang gi gnas spangs te/_dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan dag na btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 
[\[206a.2\]]du dong ngo /_/la la dag ni dgon par btang snyoms kyi bar la gnas so/_/gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang btang snyoms la gnas so/_/yul der mu ge dang /_nad dang /_thab mo yang 'byung ngo /_/der sems can rnams gcig la gcig 'ching zhing gsod de/_de 
[\[206a.3\]]dag gcig la gcig 'jigs pas log par lta ba gzhan la skyabs su 'gro na/_ngas 'di lta bu'i zab mo chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi bzod pa 'di su zhig la yongs su gtad par bya/_de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_
[\[206a.4\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin mthu chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di bdag cag gi sug par gtad du gsol/_pho brang 'khor gang dang yul gang na zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di 
[\[206a.5\]]rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der bdag cag 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge 'byung ba dang /_dgung char mi 'bab pa dang /_bro nad dang /_gzhan gyi 'khor bzlog pa la spro bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba dang /_chos 'tshal ba dang /_chos dgod pa'i gang zag rnams 
[\[206a.6\]]bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_zham ring ba dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs na gnas pa rnams chos dang ldan pa la sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag legs so legs so/_/spobs pa bzang ngo /_/brtson pa bzang ngo /_/'jigs pa med pa/_
[\[206a.7\]]khro ba mi snyan pa/_brnyas ma shin byed pa/_bkres pa/_skom pa/_dbyug pas 'tshog pa/_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rlung gis gdungs kyang dam pa'i chos kyi mig gnas kyi bar du yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_'or gyi grong dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chos kyi 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]mig 'di la brtson par bya ba dang /_zab mo chos thams cad kyi sgo'i gzhi dang /_bzod pa 'di rab tu bstan pa dang /_bzod pa 'di la sems can yang rab tu sbyor ba dang /_gang bzod pa 'di bsgom pa dang klog pa dang /_gzhan la'ang lung 'bog pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_gang yang nyan pa dang /_
[\[206b.2\]]'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa de dag la spro bar bya ba dang /_chos dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed pa sgrub par khyed las su dag spro bar 'gyur/_de'i tshe byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[206b.3\]]su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams sbyar bar bgyi ba'i bar dang /_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam la 'drir stsal ba de dag bdag cag 
[\[206b.4\]]chos dang ldan pa la sbyor ba bgyi bar spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu chen po'i byed pa bya ba dang /_ji ltar rigs kyi bu khyed yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di thob pa ni legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu ji 
[\[206b.5\]]tsam du bzod pa 'di'i stobs dang /_brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin cing brtson pa la dmigs pa de tsam du stobs dang brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la brtson par dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_gling bzhi pa thams cad dang /_yul dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[206b.6\]]rdal dang /_ljongs thams cad du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byos shig_/rgyal po la ma g.yo bar byos shig_/blon po dang /_zham ring ba rnams kyang yal bar ma gtang shig_/rigs kyi bu gang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du da ltar nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'phel bar 'gyur gyi bar du 
[\[206b.7\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo bar spro zhing sdig pa 'dod pa log par lta ba'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa dang /_rab tu dgod pa dang /_nyes pa mang ba'i shas che ba'i sems can rnams khyim gyi gnas nas phyung ste/_zhi ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing sbyor ba dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bslab pa'i gnas la rab tu 'god pa dang /_nyes pa mang pos nyen la/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid sdom pa'i tshul can gyi sems can rnams bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa la sbyor zhing so sor 'god pa dang dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan la 
[\[207a.2\]]mngon par dga' la sems can yang de la sbyor zhing de dag phan pa la sbyor ba dang /_ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la sbyor ba nas/_'chal pa'i shes rab can sdig pa'i bas mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/_lta ba'i thibs po la gnas pa rnams 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi stobs la sbyor zhing so sor 'god de/_
[\[207a.3\]]sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis non pa rnams yongs su thar bar byed pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang bar 'phel lo/_/'di la gang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus nyin mtshan bdun du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyo ba bzod 
[\[207a.4\]]cing bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed cing chung ngu na bzod pa 'di yang dag par len du 'dzud de/_sems can rnams la ston cing tshig tu 'don pa dang /_glegs bam la 'drir 'jug pa ni bsod nams rab tu mang du 'phel te/_yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[207a.5\]]dag tu byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa chu klung gang gA bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed du mi 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can chen po 
[\[207a.6\]]de dag ni dgos pa chen po la brtson pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can chen po de dag ni brtson 'grus che ba/_shes rab kyis brgyan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni rab tu myur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/gang nyon 
[\[207a.7\]]mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas/_glegs bam la 'drir 'jug pa'i bar du sbyor zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]byed pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bsngags pa de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[207b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa grangs ma mchis 
[\[207b.3\]]pa dag tu mchis te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par brtsams te/_da ltar nas ma mchis pa'i dus kyi bar du nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba thams cad btang ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mchi bar sdom pa 
[\[207b.4\]]blangs pa las da ni bdag cag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sdom pa blangs te ma mchis pa'i dus na/_slar zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par mi bgyid do/_/smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag cag rnams yongs su ma dag pa nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[207b.5\]]zhing du spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma mchis pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag brtson 'grus chen po la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' gang de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba'i sems can thams 
[\[207b.6\]]cad yongs su smin par byed pa legs so legs so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing pha rol tu phyin pa chen po spyad de mngon par shes pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po la gzhan la rag ma lus shing ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[207b.7\]]gang yongs su ma dag cing nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su nyams pa'i sems can rnams dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na ci nas kyang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu yul gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i 
[\[208a.2\]]mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad pa'i yul der yon tan gyi khyad par dang /_dpal phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rgyal po yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rgyal po nad med par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa nyung 
[\[208a.3\]]zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_rdul dang bral zhing rgol ba dang dgra med par 'gyur ba dang /_stobs dang rtsal thags thogs med cing dga' ba mang la chos 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar klu dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_gnod 
[\[208a.4\]]sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis rab tu srung bar 'gyur te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag dang de la de ltar mnyam pa med do/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags te/_yul gang 
[\[208a.5\]]du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o/_/bro nad zhi bar bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o/_/dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye 
[\[208a.6\]]bar bstan par bgyi'o/_/stobs dang rtsal thags thogs ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag legs so legs so/_/khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su long shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'os dang 
[\[208a.7\]]ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdag cag mdangs dang /_stobs dang /_gzi brjid dang /_'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der rgyal 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]po'i zha 'bring ba dang /_blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang /_legs pa bzhi 'byung ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul der rgyal po'i zha 'bring ba dang /_blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_gus pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal po yang byams par 'gyur 
[\[208b.2\]]ba dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod de/_phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher grags 
[\[208b.3\]]shing tshe ring ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste/_yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni rgyal po'i zha 'bring ba dang /_blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags par 'gyur ba ni de dag go/_/gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der 
[\[208b.4\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul der dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang /_ri la 
[\[208b.5\]]mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang /_sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la gnas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_khron pa dang /_chu mig 
[\[208b.6\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_las kyi mtha' grub par 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 
[\[208b.7\]]'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul de'i bud med phrag dog dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang /_bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gzhan yang bud med gang bzod pa 'di nyan pa de la dad pa rnyed cing chos smra ba la 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]phan par zer ba de ni bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin te/_snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud med thob par mi 'gyur te/_gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba dag na gzhan gyi 'khor dang /_nang gi 'khor 
[\[209a.2\]]gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/char mi 'bab pa dang /_mu ge 'byung ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char dang /_grang dro dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu smyung dang /_sbrang ma dang /_byi ba dang /_'gro ba khro bo dang /_sbrul khro bo dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /_ro bro ba med pa dang /_
[\[209a.3\]]rtsub pa dang /_sre mo dang /_mi bde bar reg pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang /_lcags sgrog dang /_shing sgrog dang /_dbyig pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par zer ba dang /_rdeg pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_nad kyi gnod pa yul de na med par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[209a.4\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dag gis kyang yul de shin tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag yul gang du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di 'chad cing ston par 'gyur ba'i yul der gnod pa bcu po de dag gi yul thams cad mi gtse bar 
[\[209a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su thob par byed pa'o/_/bzod pa 'di'i ming 'ba' 
[\[209a.6\]]zhig gang gi rna lam du thos pa yang snying po byang chub kyi bar du gang zag de mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis bzod pa bsgom pa 'di thog thag nyan pa ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[209a.7\]]mthu che ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' bar byed pa/_rgyun du byed pa/_phyir mi ldog par byed pa/_rnam par rtsen par byed pa/_'jug par byed pa/_gzugs zhi bar byed pa/_yongs su smin par byed pa/_'bral bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]'da' bar byed pa'o/_/bzod pa 'di de ltar bstan pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul 
[\[209b.2\]]nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di sems can rnams la bshad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par dgod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag da gang gi dus la bab par sems na'o/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas 
[\[209b.3\]]'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog ban du 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_gnas dang /_
[\[209b.4\]]grong dang grong khyer dang /_ljongs gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu me tog ban du 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin du gnyi ga byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang 
[\[209b.5\]]chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang /_gling bzhi pa gang dang /_yul dang grong khyer dang /_grong dang ljongs dang /_'or gyi grong dag tu rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba de dag tu bzod pa 'di sgom pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_ston pa dang 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang dran pa dang spyod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209b.6\]]bzod pa 'di gang na spyod pa der me tog ban du 'di spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu 
[\[209b.7\]]dga' ste mngon par bstod do//_//yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]{D264}]@##/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[210a.2\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgyad khri dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sum khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_sgrib pa thams cad dang 
[\[210a.3\]]yongs su bral ba/_gzi brjid dang dpal gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i don thabs kyis bskul ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba lhun gyis grub pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bkod pa/_
[\[210a.4\]]chos kyi sde snod srung zhing skyob pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i mdo gzungs su 'dzin cing seng ge'i sgras phyogs bcur chos kyi 'brug sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_de dag gi yon tan gyi go 'phang ni ri rab dang 'dra la/_shes rab zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/_bdud kyi sde dpung dang bcas par btul ba/_
[\[210a.5\]]mu stegs thams cad sdud cing sems rnam par byang ba la 'jog pa/_mthu stobs dang ldan pas rnam par grol ba la thogs pa med pa/_mnyam pa nyid la bde bar gnas pa/_dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzung ba/_bstan pa la mos shing blo gros dang ldan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_
[\[210a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pas chos thams cad kyi don dang mi ldan pa med pa/_skye bo rnams kyi yid bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/_yod pa dang med pa shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa/_mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[210a.7\]]la bzhugs te spyan lngas sems can rnams kyi dbang po rtogs pa/_gzi brjid dang dpal dpag tu med pa skye bo mang po rnams bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis sems su sbyangs te mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan cing mchog dang ldan par byed pa/_sems nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]gzugs dang kha dog yongs su btang ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid la mkhas pa/_rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sems can gang nas gang du 'khor bar shes pa/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pas mnyam pa med pa la bsnyen pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po nas bskyed pas sangs 
[\[210b.2\]]rgyas kyi dbang phyug thob pa/_ye shes dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa/_bzang 'gro'i sgo ni phye/_ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgo ni bkag ste/_sems can kun la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms par bstan pa'i phyir lam rgyud lngar skye zhing lus 
[\[210b.3\]]ston par byed pa/_sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu zhing 'khor ba la gnas te/_nad gso ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas nad kyi rkyen bzhin du sman byin nas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed pa/_gang gis thos kyang ma grol ba med pa de lta bu'i yon tan 
[\[210b.4\]]tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa la mchod pa myong ba/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shin tu rig pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa yun du gnas par shes pa/_rtag par yang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod par bshad pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[210b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi g.yo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' klu shing ljon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /_
[\[210b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi bla dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mdzod dang /_byang chub 
[\[210b.7\]]sems dpa' rtag 'grus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid la dad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thub med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang /_mthu 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]stobs dang ldan pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs te grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 
[\[211a.2\]]lha dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'khod de/_lha'i rin po che'i me tog gi char phab nas rol mo sil snyan yang grangs med dpag tu med pa sgra rang 'byin pa byas te/_lha tshangs pas sam b+ha ra'i spos kyi bdug pa dri zhim pos bdugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin phung phyogs 
[\[211a.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams kun tu khyab par gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_phyogs bcu'i chos thams cad dang /_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la kun tu mchod yon gsol bar gyur to/_/de ltar lha rnams kyis 
[\[211a.4\]]mchod pa phul ba yang theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i lam tshol ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba de dag dang thabs cig tu shing sA la chen po ga la ba de logs su gshegs nas dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 
[\[211a.5\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba'i khar/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad sdud cing skyob par dgongs te/_gsung dbyangs chen po phyung nas sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par so so'i skad bzhin du sems can thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_deng ni de 
[\[211a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can la thugs brtse bar dgongs so/_/sems can la srung zhing skyob par dgongs so/_/sems can sdud cing gzhes par dgongs so/_/sems can la snyoms par gzigs pa ni dper na bu gcig 
[\[211a.7\]]la lta ba dang 'dra bar rten med pa la rten bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni bral bar bya'o/_/bde ba med pa ni bde bar bya'o/_/ma grol ba ni rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/longs spyod med pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o/_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]the tsom dang ma bral ba ni the tsom dang bral bar bya'o/_/'gyod tshangs ma byas pa ni 'gyod pa tshangs par bya'o/_/mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de'i tshe de'i dus na lam gyi g.yas g.yon du sa gzhi mnyam pa thang bzang po yongs su dag pa/_bkra shis kyi sa 
[\[211b.2\]]chu zheng du mnyam par dpag tshad stong phrag bcu bcu yod pa de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas mod la der gzhes te/_dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gnas 'di ni chos bshad pa'i sar 'os so zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong kun dga' bos bcom ldan 
[\[211b.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon rtag tu ri dang /_tshal dang /_chab gtsang ma 'bab pa dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_me tog dag mchis pa la dgyes na deng 'dir ni chab 'bab pa yang ma mchis/_shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/_grong 
[\[211b.4\]]khyim dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_mi phal yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das 'dir ci la dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad ces gsungs/_phal shul ring po nas mchi ba/_bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams srog kyang mi 'tsho ste/_zas mchis 
[\[211b.5\]]na ni srog mchis/_srog mchis na ni lus mchis/_lus mchis na ni chos lam yang mchis so/_/zas ma mchis na srog ma mchis/_srog ma mchis na lus ma mchis/_lus ma mchis na chos lam yang ma mchis pa lags nad 'di'i nang du 'di lta bu'i yid la bab pa gang 
[\[211b.6\]]yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'dir chos bshad ces gsungs/_de nas shes rab chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bus sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo la smras pa/_sngar chos kyi phyir zhu ba'i rigs kyi gzhan ni bsam mi dgos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni stobs 
[\[211b.7\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhir ma zad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa dang /_cis kyang mi bsnyengs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang /_gzi brjid dang /_rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa mnga' ste/_gang rten med pa de'i ni rten du mdzad/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar mdzad/_nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mdzad/_bde ba med pa ni bde ba la reg par mdzad/_ma grol ba ni rnam par grol bar mdzad/_longs spyod dang mi ldan pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par mdzad/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni 
[\[212a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang 'byung med pa'i mya ngan bya ci dgos/_bdag dran pa sngon dra ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas phal mang po la chos bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[212a.3\]]khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha dang /_klu la sogs pa'i phal mang po khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe na zas dag mi snang nas/_bdag gis de'i tshe na phal mang po 'di rnams kyi zas ji ltar 'byor 
[\[212a.4\]]snyam bsams pa las dri ma med par grags pas bdag la smras pa/_nyan thos shes rab dman pa yang dag pa'i chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi thog ma nas zas dang /_gos dang /_khri stan la sogs pa sgyu ma'i rdzas la ci'i phyir rnam par rtog ces dra ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas de 
[\[212a.5\]]skad smras pa'i tshe lha dang /_mi rnams ni chos lam thob bdag ni skyengs te khyod da ltar smras pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo blo gros kyi mchog sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bden te/_theg pa chen po bsam pa'i rigs kyi lus bde ba'i 
[\[212a.6\]]phyir bsam pa ni ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin tu zhugs nas byin gyi rlabs kyi mod las der gser gyi me tog gcig 'bus nas byung ste/_de'i 'phang du dpag tshad khri phrag bzhi bcu yod la/_des stong khams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas bai dUr+ya'i dra bas kyang 
[\[212a.7\]]gser gyi me tog khyab par g.yogs te/_me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrus kyi rdzing bu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba/_de'i ngos bzhir me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po la 'di lta ste/_me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dang /_pun da rI ka la sogs pa rnam pa 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]mang po dpag tu med pas rin po che'i rdzing rnam par brgyan pa byung nas/_gang la la zhig gis gser gyi me tog dang /_rin po che'i rdzing bu mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob na nang du zhugs te khrus byas pa lta ci smos/_gal te zhugs te khrus byas pa ni rnam par dag pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[212b.2\]]la bzod pa thob bo/_/gser gyi me tog de'i 'og tu seng ge'i khri rin po che las byas pa/_'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa byung ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i khri de la bzhugs nas sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dang /_yan lag kun nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang 
[\[212b.3\]]gser gyi me tog gi kha dog dang 'thun par phyogs bzhir byung bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ri lung dang /_yul sa kun kyang mnyam par gyur nas thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/_sme btsogs pa yang med la sems can dmyal 
[\[212b.4\]]ba yang zhi nas yi dwags kyang rnam par grol te/_log spyod dang dam pa'i chos la smod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /_dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyur nas tha dad pa med do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od zer de gzigs 
[\[212b.5\]]nas so so nas tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes pas bstod nas legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'di ni sngon gyi 'od zer dang mi 'dra ste/_sngon chad kyi 'od ni shar phyogs su sngar shar na/_deng gi 'od ni phyogs bzhi nas 
[\[212b.6\]]dus gcig tu phyogs bcur khyab par shar ba las bltas na 'od des ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te/_mya ngan las bzla bar mngon no zhes gsungs so/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[212b.7\]]chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'od zer chen po gtong ba ni gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos bstan cing sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gyi cha na/_khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/_sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phul nas the tsom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi rnam grangs nyan cing gsol ba'i rigs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can yongs kyis ngan cing khro la rdzun sgyu can te/_theg pa gcig la ma dad pas 
[\[213a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byams pa chen pos thabs sna tshogs kyis theg pa gsum du phye ste/_srid pa gsum las rnam par grol bar byed do/_/theg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dag pa 
[\[213a.3\]]yongs su dkar ba ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong du yang mthong bar mi 'gyur/_chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do cog kyang thos par mi 'gyur/_'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus par mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdan khri dang /_gser gyi 
[\[213a.4\]]me tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la/_sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tsom dag zhu na khyed rnams kyang bsod nams thob la/_skye bo kun la phan pa dang /_bde bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs 
[\[213a.5\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/_so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/_thabs cig tu dong ste/_byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te/_me tog rin po che mchog tu bzang po'i char 
[\[213a.6\]]phab nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang /_ngag gcig dang /_sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[213a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag the tsom 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]yod na de kun dris shig dang /_ngas khyed rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig las mi bshad na/_'dir 
[\[213b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyis 
[\[213b.3\]]nyon cig rigs kyi bu rnams dper na mi gcig la ming gsum yod pa lta bu ste/_chung ngu'i tshe na ni byis pa zhes bya/_lo nyi shu yan chad la ni skyes bu zhes bya/_lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa ni rgan po zhes bya'o/_/nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/_sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni theg 
[\[213b.4\]]pa chung ngur bstan/_sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni theg pa 'bring po bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam chen po la zhugs pa la ni theg pa chen po bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig_/mdor mtha' gnyis med pa dang phyogs gcig tu 'thun te/_
[\[213b.5\]]shes pa'i sgo tha dad kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o/_/mdo ni theg pa gcig ste/_thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'du la/_theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/de bas na theg pa gsum yang 
[\[213b.6\]]theg pa gcig go zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/dge slong brgyad brgyas ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob/_lha nyi khris ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob/_mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni mod la bla na med pa yang 
[\[213b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]mthu dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na 
[\[214a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ri dang /_nags dang /_tshal dang /_shing drung dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_dgon pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas 
[\[214a.3\]]khang dang /_chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba dang /_khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas nang na 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur ro/_/sngon de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems 
[\[214a.4\]]can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/_gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes te/_rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do/_/gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di thos te/_dga' ba skyes nas dad 
[\[214a.5\]]pa dang gus pa'i sems kyis yi ger 'bri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_klog gam/_kha ton tu byas sam/_blangs sam/_'chang ngam/_phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni tshe 'di 
[\[214a.6\]]nyid la bde ba thob ste/_sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi 'phos na yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis sngon du lam drangs te/_bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang /_
[\[214a.7\]]gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/_/mdo sde 'di blangs te/_gzungs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te/_de bas na de dag ni bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go/_/rgyu dang rkyen des na mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rnams gnas gcig tu skye zhing mi 'bral bar smon to/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[214b.2\]]po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dbyangs can dang /_'phrog ma mo dang /_ri'i lha dang /_shing gi lha dang /_klung gi lha dang /_mtsho'i lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_chu'i lha dang /_me'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa 
[\[214b.3\]]dag rang rang gi stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing gus pas phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di la rtag tu 
[\[214b.4\]]bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o/_/mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu mdun du bdar te yongs su dag par bgyi'o/_/mdo sde 'di mchod rten du'am gnas khang du'am/_khyim pa'i khyim du'am/_dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/_gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug 
[\[214b.5\]]pa mi gtsang bas mdo sde 'di bzung ngam/_ma gus par bklags sam/_kha ton du bgyis na bdag cag gis gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/_/de gang du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_glo bur du gnod pa 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[214b.6\]]tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /_tshe 'phos na yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par bgyis te/_sug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam/_khrus bgyis te bdug spos kyis bdug cing bklags sam/_kha ton du bgyis sam/_'chang ngam 
[\[214b.7\]]'dzin tam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_rjes su dran nam sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/gang zag de nyal na yang de'i mdun du mchis te/_ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/yang 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gcig tu na dgra ma rungs pa dang /_gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/_/de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de ste 'gron du mchi na bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu phyin 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/phyogs bzhir gang 
[\[215a.2\]]du mchi na yang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun tu dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na yang lhar skye bar bgyi'o/_/rgyu de dang rkyen des ni sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stong bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_
[\[215a.3\]]lha ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/_mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur na mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur/_gal te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kha ton du byed par 
[\[215a.4\]]'dod na khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te/_khang pa dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_tsan dan dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo 
[\[215a.5\]]btsugs nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo sde 'di bklags te/_sems mi g.yeng ba dang /_dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_rtog pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_bsam pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_bstan cing bslab pa mi g.yeng bar nyin 
[\[215a.6\]]mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa'am/_kha ton tu 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyis/_de 
[\[215a.7\]]la the tsom mam yid gnyis su ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa'o/_/'di ni bsrung zhing skyob pa ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/_/'di ni mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o/_/'di ni don dam pa'i snying po 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo/_/thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/drug po gang zhe na/_sa chen po dang /_chu chen po dang /_me chen po dang /_rlung chen po dang /_nyi ma chen po dang /_nam 
[\[215b.2\]]mkha' chen po'o/_/mdo sde 'di ni sa chen po dang 'dra ste/_gtsang sme dang /_bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do/_/mdo sde 'di ni chu chen po dang 'dra ste/_sme btsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do/_/mdo sde 'di ni me chen po dang 'dra ste/_nyon mongs pa dang /_btsog pa dang /_ljan ljin 
[\[215b.3\]]thams cad tshig par byed do/_/mdo sde 'di ni rlung chen po dang 'dra ste/_sme btsog thams cad bus par byed do/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ste/_mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do/_/mdo sde 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/_bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do/_/de lta bu'i 
[\[215b.4\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni dpe zla med de/_yar byang chub sems dpa' dang /_bar du nyan thos dang /_mar 'jig tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shong ba med do/_/de bas na khyed rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung ste/_chongs shig_/kun tu spel bar 
[\[215b.5\]]gyis shig_/dad cing gus par byos shig dang /_khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o/_/khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te/_'chang na rgyun du nga yang mthong la/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[215b.6\]]thams cad mthong ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad ces bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos 
[\[215b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/_shin tu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang /_ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/_/khyod kyis dris pa de yang sems can dpag tu med 
[\[216a.2\]]pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag dran pa sngon yun ring po 'das pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chen gtsug phud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan cig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo zhes 
[\[216a.3\]]thos te/_de las yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab skams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa gdugs kyis gdungs te 'gum du nye ba las/_dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong 
[\[216a.4\]]nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang /_snying rje skyes te/_chab dang kha zas stsal kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni gson grang na/_tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma thag tu dus las 'das te/_
[\[216a.5\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so zhes gda' na deng bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang /_dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang bde ba dang /_
[\[216a.6\]]dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams dang /_rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/_sdom pa'i rtsa ba nyams pa dang /_nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad 
[\[216a.7\]]du bshad par smon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshad na bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/_'di ltar chu thams cad 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]kyi thigs pa ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/_/ri rab thams cad ni srang grangs su bgrang du rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/_/nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug par shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
