[\[216b.2\]]mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/_/ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan gyis gang gis rna bar lan gcig thos na gang zag de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang mos pa dang gus par byas te/_yi ger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 
[\[216b.3\]]'tshal na bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur/_bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang zag de dus zad na yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur/_nga yang mthong la dus ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa bzang po'i 
[\[216b.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed rnams tshul bzhin du gos tshags bcos la/_lus mi g.yeng ba dang /_sems mi g.yeng ba dang /_dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang /_rtog pa mi g.yeng bar byos la chos thos par 
[\[216b.5\]]'dod na sems rtse gcig tu bsdus shig_/bcom ldan 'das mar me ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[216b.6\]]rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sdud cing 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brjod dpag 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpe zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mu med chos 
[\[216b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam khyab dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs la gnas pa'i stobs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten gsum gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'ching ba kun 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten kun las 'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ting nge 'dzin rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha' ltar dmigs 
[\[217a.2\]]su med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud bzhi'i tshogs 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bu gcig pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe rabs 'chi 'phos gar 'byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu mthong zhing sangs 
[\[217a.3\]]rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin par gyur cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig tshogs can kun la sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro/_/kye 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag par mnyan cing sems thag pa nas mchod pa phul 
[\[217a.4\]]cig_/ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/_/sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon/_/sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yang /_/rnam grol mtshan nyid bskyed par bya/_/dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag la/_/ngas ni dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang /_/des kyang chud par mi nus te/_/sa bon tshig 
[\[217a.5\]]rnams rang bzhin dong /_/grung brtan 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur/_/theg pa chung ngu bsal nas su/_/theg chen nyi tshe yod par 'gyur/_/theg pa gnyis po bsal nas su/_theg pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur/_/dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag gis/_/sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[217a.6\]]grangs med mchod myong bas/_/gdod des sangs rgyas mtshan thos so/_/len cing 'dzin par byed pa ni/_/phyogs tsam rnam par grol ba ste/_/rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas/_/da yang nga yi chos 'di la/_/sangs rgyas spyad pa kun spyad de/_/sangs rgyas mtshan la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/mdo 'di 
[\[217a.7\]]blang zhing klog 'chang na/_/bdud kyi las dang bral bar 'gyur/_/rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med dang /_/log spyod rnams kyi sdig kyang 'byang /_/ma 'ongs dus na gang zag de/_/'phags pa'i lam yang nges par 'grub/_/gang zhig dad pa ma skyes na/_/ngan song gsum du ltung yang dag_/dad skyes 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal na/_/tshad med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bas rtse gcig phyag 'tshal zhing /_/sdig pa dpag med byang bar smon/_/de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/_yang dag par mnyan nas lus dang sems rtse gcig tu bsdus 
[\[217b.2\]]te/_g.yel zhing 'gyur ba med par yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te sems thag pa nas mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrags pa las/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla mar me gsal nyi khri la phyag 
[\[217b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rgyal bu bcu drug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[217b.4\]]sangs rgyas sprin dbang mar me rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byin sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dge bar bsams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sku sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla gsal gyi dpal la phyag 
[\[217b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas pad ma dag pa rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam dag brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas klu btsun rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal po ye 
[\[217b.6\]]shes pa dam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shing sA la rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma dpal gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od mi 
[\[217b.7\]]g.yo 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spos tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri legs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab lha'i thor tshugs can la phyag 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chags med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[218a.2\]]sangs rgyas klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sa mi g.yo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya'i me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi kha dog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser 
[\[218a.3\]]mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas pad ma rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal 
[\[218a.4\]]lo/_/sangs rgyas blo rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbyangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma sgyu ma dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yid skyo spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218a.5\]]rin po che 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gtsug dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'dzugs phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od sgrib la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla bai dUr+ya'i 
[\[218a.6\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bla med bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rab mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218a.7\]]me tog mdog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chu zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tshom mun sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sdug bsngal bsgral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mos pa dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sngon legs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]lo/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bzhad sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas klu'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnas la 
[\[218b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zla 
[\[218b.3\]]med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od 'bar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218b.4\]]shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od rgyun mi 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od bsam dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od brjod med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gser btso 
[\[218b.5\]]ma'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ring du brtag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbyangs dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zil dngar gyi ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas klu'i rgyal ba la phyag 
[\[218b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dpal mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jam dpal ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 
[\[218b.7\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog bla med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas klu rje dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbang phyug 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu gtsang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spos ta ma ra ba ra tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spos tsan dan 
[\[219a.2\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog brtsegs rab tu dga' ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la 
[\[219a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tu dgra ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas brtson 'grus che btsan la phyag 
[\[219a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dpa' brtul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byams pa'i snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi phug rnam par 
[\[219a.5\]]bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bzang legs gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas legs par sad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[219a.6\]]sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i bla re stong pa nyid du brtags pa'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag 
[\[219a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rin chen me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sku kun tu mngon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sangs rgyas bdud kyi rgyal po rnams tshar gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byams pa'i shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od 
[\[219b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dge dben zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gdugs rin po che'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtso bo'i 
[\[219b.3\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyi ba dan mchog tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[219b.4\]]'od snang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser 'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mchog dbyangs dam 
[\[219b.5\]]pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ba dan 'od rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shes rab kyi na bza'i rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i 
[\[219b.6\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog su ma na'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog ud pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas stobs btsan dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shes rab kyi stobs 
[\[219b.7\]]kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rab tu dga' 'khrug med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs dpag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]shes rab kyi ri dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thar pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas blun mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[220a.2\]]sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig_/sangs rgyas bcu/_sangs rgyas brgya/_sangs rgyas stong /_sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar 
[\[220a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig_/'bum phrag bcu/_'bum phrag brgya/_'bum phrag stong /_'bum phrag khri/_bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/gal te gang zag la las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[220a.4\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/_de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis sangs rgyas 'das pa'i mtshan/_/de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/_/sems nyid thob cing sdig kyang 
[\[220a.5\]]'byang /_/mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/_/phyin chad mi byed sdom par nus/_/dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/_/theg chen tshul khrims ldan pa ste/_/de phyir de ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/_/rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te/_/theg chen chos la dmod pa dang /_/
[\[220a.6\]]log spyod phyogs su lta ba'o/_/gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag na/_/log spyod ces su mi bya ste/_/sangs rgyas dpag med rtag tu mthong /_/sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang /_/mtshams med lngar bcas gang byas pa/_/rnam dag sems kyis 'gyod nus na/_/de ni tshul bzhin gnas pa 
[\[220a.7\]]yin/_/de yang gus par phyag 'tshal phyir/_/mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing /_/theg chen tshul khrims thob pas na/_/de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bzod pa thob bo/_/nyan thos brgyad brgyas ni theg pa chen po'i sems shes tsam skyes so/_/dge slong lnga stong ni dgra bcom par grub bo/_/lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[220b.2\]]sangs rgyas gsal rgyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i phye dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spos brtsegs la phyag 
[\[220b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyi ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bde gnas rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[220b.4\]]sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[220b.5\]]rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dka' thub seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mi 'gyur la 
[\[220b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin 
[\[220b.7\]]chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tsan dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tsan dan 'dab ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[221a.2\]]rgyas yid mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thub zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zil mngar rnga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[221a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan dang ldan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng ge'i sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[221a.4\]]sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dge dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[221a.5\]]gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bla med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 
[\[221a.6\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gzugs 'thor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bro mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la 
[\[221a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shes rab ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas drin dpal kun tu 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[221b.2\]]sangs rgyas yid sgra snyan sred la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas seng ge'i mtshan ma 
[\[221b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[221b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ta ma ra bar tsan dan gyi spos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 
[\[221b.5\]]gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig_/sangs rgyas bcu/_sangs rgyas brgya/_sangs rgyas stong /_sangs rgyas khri la gus par phyag 'tshal na 
[\[221b.6\]]bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig_/'bum phrag bcu/_'bum phrag brgya/_'bum phrag stong /_'bum phrag khri/_bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la 
[\[221b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de ni bskal pa khri phrag drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/_de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'tshal na/_/las ngan kun las rnam par grol/_/mtshams med lnga po'i sdig kyang 'byang /_/rnam dag sa la rtag tu gnas/_/shAkya'i chos la'ang bde gnas shing /_/mtha' ru ngan song gsum dang bral/_/sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mthong ba dang /_/sangs rgyas stong yang 
[\[222a.2\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste/_/rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye/_/dam pa'i chos kyang thos gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas rtag pa'ang mngon par rtogs/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe chu bo 
[\[222a.3\]]gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi sgor chud par gyur to/_/lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byams pa 
[\[222a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[222a.5\]]'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas khyab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[222a.6\]]sangs rgyas shes rab ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i 
[\[222a.7\]]rgyal po 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mthong dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyi mtshan mas rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mtshan 'thun pa kun tu 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dpal sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[222b.2\]]rgyas gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[222b.3\]]sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 
[\[222b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas lung bstan pa pad+ma'i 'od lnga brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[222b.5\]]sangs rgyas rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig_/sangs rgyas bcu/_sangs rgyas brgya/_sangs rgyas stong /_sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na/_bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig lci ba rnams 
[\[222b.6\]]'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig_/'bum phrag bcu/_'bum phrag brgya/_'bum phrag stong /_'bum phrag khri bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed dpag tu med/_grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gang zag gang la las thos par gyur na bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar 
[\[222b.7\]]du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/_de bas da ltar phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams/_/de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/_/log spyod rnams ni ma gtogs te/_/sgrib pa gsum dang mtshams med lnga/_/sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]chos la bde gnas shing /_/dpag med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos kyang rtag tu thos/_/de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na/_/kha na ma tho 'das pa dang /_/
[\[223a.2\]]ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/_/las ngan bcu po byas pa yang /_/da ltar mngon du byang bar 'gyur/_/phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas kyi/_/ngo bo nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bas de la mos par byos/_/kha ton 'dri klog phyag 'tshal na/_/tshe rabs gar byung gar skyes kyang /_/
[\[223a.3\]]lta ba log par mi skye'o/_/rnam par grol pa rgyun tu thob/_/mtha' 'khob sa ru yong mi skye/_/ngan pa'i yul du'ang mi skye zhing /_/rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur/_/bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi khri'i bar/_/sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/_/de bas gus par phyag 'tshal 
[\[223a.4\]]na/_/mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing /_/gzungs chen rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas ma byon pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga khris phyir mi ldog pa'i sar gnas so/_/dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni dgra bcom mar 
[\[223a.5\]]grub bo/_/lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/_/gzungs chen po dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[223a.6\]]dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gling gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[223a.7\]]shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/theg pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos na 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bstod pa byas sam/_phyag 'tshal lam/_brjod dam/_mos pa bskyed dam/_blangs sam/_'chang bar byed na gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/_tshe snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir gus pas phyag 'tshol cig_/
[\[223b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong gis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/nyan thos 'bum phrag bcus theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/
[\[223b.3\]]lha dang mi dpag tu med pa zhig gis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs 
[\[223b.4\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[223b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla gang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[223b.6\]]chub sems dpa' stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[223b.7\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dren mkhan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'chad mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan rin po che'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224a.2\]]spyod pa rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag par gus la phyag 'tshal 
[\[224a.3\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rgyal po'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yon tan gyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[224a.4\]]sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 
[\[224a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam legs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od 
[\[224a.6\]]gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[224a.7\]]sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gog spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]chub sems dpa' rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam rtog la phyag 'tshal 
[\[224b.2\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal 
[\[224b.3\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag 
[\[224b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun tu bteg la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun tu phab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba can la phyag 'tshal 
[\[224b.5\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224b.6\]]rin chen sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blta ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dra ba snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[224b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' skyon med rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud rnam 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[225a.2\]]seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' btang bzung ri bsgul ba'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dkar po la phyag 
[\[225a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dbyug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[225a.4\]]sgra thub med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug pud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[225a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang shar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dka' rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od la phyag 
[\[225a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tsan dan gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[225a.7\]]sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpung mchog la phyag 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsang shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' legs ldan sred 
[\[225b.2\]]med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge yid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[225b.3\]]mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[225b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la 
[\[225b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[225b.6\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po me 
[\[225b.7\]]tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dri mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lan ldon mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[226a.2\]]dpa' bdud skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyabs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab go 'phang 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[226a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba rnam bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mchog la 
[\[226a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[226a.5\]]dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 
[\[226a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgra mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[226a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyi bo skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba brtsegs la phyag 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtso mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lus kun tu mngon par ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[226b.2\]]chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sku mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri med 
[\[226b.3\]]mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal 
[\[226b.4\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od 
[\[226b.5\]]rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[226b.7\]]sems dpa' kun tu bzung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' log par 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ston pa'i mkhan po la phyag 'tshal

[\[227a.3\]]rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[227a.4\]]sems dpa' rtag tu snying rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[227a.5\]]chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri ngar can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang

[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[227b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen byed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[227b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 
[\[227b.4\]]thor tshugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo rig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[227b.5\]]zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin brtag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[227b.6\]]sems dpa' snang khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyen pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma'i 'od la phyag 
[\[227b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dpa' 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 
[\[228a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal btsun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[228a.3\]]sems dpa' shes rab gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang thar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal 
[\[228a.4\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lus sbed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig dang /_bcu dang /_brgya dang /_stong dang /_khri la 
[\[228a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya/_khri phrag nyis brgya/_khri phrag sum brgya/_khri phrag bzhi brgya/_khri phrag lnga brgya/_khri phrag drug brgya/_khri phrag bdun brgya/_khri phrag brgyad brgya/_khri phrag dgu brgya/_khri phrag stong rnams la phyag 
[\[228a.6\]]'tshal na bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig_/'bum phrag bcu/_'bum phrag brgya/_'bum phrag stong /_'bum phrag khri/_'bum phrag khri phrag khri la phyag 'tshal na 
[\[228a.7\]]bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi zad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA 
[\[228b.2\]]bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA khri'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gA bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa 
[\[228b.3\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa 
[\[228b.4\]]gsum gyi khams su mi gtogs te/_rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' 'khob tu mi skye/_yul ngan par mi skye/_lus ngan pa mi len/_log par mi lta/_/rigs ngan du mi skye/_mu stegs can du mi skye/_dbang po yan lag 
[\[228b.5\]]tshang bar 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/_sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te/_sangs 
[\[228b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/
[\[228b.7\]]lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/dge slong sems stor ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni gzungs chen po thob ste/_ma 'ongs 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa'i dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal 
[\[229a.2\]]gyis gzir ba can rnams kyis lan cig thos na 'chi 'phos pa'i tshe lhar skye'o zhes khyod nyid kyis bshad pa dang /_de yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod dang skye bo 
[\[229a.3\]]kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyis kyang /_don dam par na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshad pa gang la las de'i mtshan thos nas sems thag pa nas dran par byas te/_'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog 
[\[229a.4\]]gsum gyi mtshan lan gsum du/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+ha rmA ya/_namaHsaM g+hA ya zhes de skad du ched du brjod du bcug na mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[229a.5\]]cad la mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal dang kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen po'i chos thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur/_thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[229a.6\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang zag de yang bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[229a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi/_dngos po gcig gam/_dngos po gnyis sam/_dngos po gsum du bgyi/_ci ste dngos po gcig na ni skyabs gcig tu song bas/_dngos po gsum lags na ni skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]du gyur na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te/_dge 'dun yang de bzhin no/_/gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa gsum gyi bar du chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi 'jal bar mchi na/_bcom ldan 
[\[229b.2\]]'das sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol/_bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang 
[\[229b.3\]]'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/don chen po 'di lta bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni shin tu'ang legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po 
[\[229b.4\]]'dri ba yang sa dang po dang /_sa gnyis pa dang /_sa gsum pa dang /_sa bzhi pa dang /_sa lnga pa dang /_sa drug pa dang /_sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/_sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no/_/khyod legs par nyon cig_/ngas bye brag 
[\[229b.5\]]phyed par bshad [(]da/[,]do/[) ]/rigs kyi bu skye bo thams cad ni thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te/_khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gzir te/_lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs 
[\[229b.6\]]te skyabs tshol ba/_mu stegs rnams rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog btang ste/_skyabs tshol na yang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do/_/me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus med de/_de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[229b.7\]]byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun tu 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir/_bslab pa dang po pa nyan thos dang rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do/_/de'i 'og tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyod pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos po gcig par yang bshad de/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig gi nang na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par 
[\[230a.2\]]bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/_dper na 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun pos phongs pa rnams la 'tsho ba bstangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang /_ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/dkon 
[\[230a.3\]]mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad de/_byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/
[\[230a.4\]]sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad pa'o/_/dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i gnas so/_/ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te/_'thun pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'dus ma byas pa thob pa ni yang dag pa'i 
[\[230a.5\]]stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid grol ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad pa yang 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o/_/zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu 'thun te/_rtsod pa med pa ni 'thun pa ste/_
[\[230a.6\]]don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos ni dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas rnams so/_/sdig pa'i chos ni spang bar bya/_dge ba'i chos ni 'phel bar bya'o/_/de yang sems kyis dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon 
[\[230a.7\]]mchog ces bya'o/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun gnyis dngos po yang mi gcig la/_ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do/_/chos ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su dbyings 'thun te so sor dbye bar dka'o/_/ji ltar so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na/_/gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'dun gnyis kyi mtshan [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su btags te/_rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po thob pa dang /_dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go zhes bya bar don de lta bu yang ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi dbang gis mi 
[\[230b.2\]]lus thob pa yin no/_/chos dang bral na mi med la/_mi las gud na yang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ga la yod/_/deng 'dir gleng ba ni mi dang chos su gcig tu 'thun la tha dad pa yang yod de/_chos kyi dbang gis mir grub/_mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[230b.3\]]phung po dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/_ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do/_/nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun 
[\[230b.4\]]dkon mchog tu bshad do/_/yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /_gtan tshigs su dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/ye ni dbyings gcig ste/_don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 
[\[230b.5\]]'dun tha dad pa yang yod de/_de yang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o/_/de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas/_sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na/_khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang 
[\[230b.6\]]sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad de/_de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o/_/sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o/_/chos ni mi rtag go/_/dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/_sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na 
[\[230b.7\]]deng 'dir bshad pa ni rtag tu gnas pa ste/_rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing /_phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba/_skye 'gag med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni yang dag pa'i chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/spyod pa pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/_/yang phyin ci log brgyad gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo 
[\[231a.2\]]thams cad 'thun zhing nam du yang rtsod pa med pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/sngon dkon mchog gsum mi dang chos su tha dad par bshad/_deng 'dir ni sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang der byung bas don de'i phyir ngas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog 
[\[231a.3\]]gsum bshad de/_skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang la rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[231a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khams gsum mi rtag par bsams te theg pa chen por bsgrub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol pa/_ji ltar na mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te yang 
[\[231a.5\]]dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag la byams pa dang snying rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/_skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na yang lan mi re ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de ltar sems can yongs su mi gtong bar theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na grong khyer chen po 
[\[231a.6\]]gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la/_sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror ni lam na g.yang sa dang /_mun nag pa dang /_shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang /_grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes bu mi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa shin tu yang sdug mod 
[\[231a.7\]]kyi/_grong khyer de na bde skyid pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas/_grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyis lam 'jigs sa bsgral nas grong khyer de'i sgor phyin pa dang /_rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste/_rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsams so/_/bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma khrid/_da su zhig slad na gso zhig gu zhes bsams nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du chas so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje yang de dang 'dra ste/_
[\[231b.2\]]byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga sgom par byed do/_/bsgoms te zag pa zad na yang mi shes grub pa mi len te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag pa zad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa spong ste/_so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par byed do/_/rigs kyi 
[\[231b.3\]]bu dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o/_/dper sgo mang po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o/_/dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o/_/dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes bya ba ni mngon 
[\[231b.4\]]par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o/_/dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni ye shes la bya'o/_/dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o/_/dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la 
[\[231b.5\]]bya'o/_/dper bu la dran pa ni snying rje chen po la bya'o/_/dper bu'i thad du ldog pa ni sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o/_/dper lan dang 'grub pa mi len pa ni thabs mkhas pa la bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa 
[\[231b.6\]]chen po dang snying rje chen pos bsdus te/_mi gtong ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dpog par bya'o/_/bcu po gang 
[\[231b.7\]]zhe na/_srog mi gcod pa dang /_ma byin par mi len pa dang /_'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi smra ba dang /_phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang /_ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang /_don med pa'i gtam tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang /_brnab sems mi byed pa 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dang /_gnod sems mi byed pa dang /_log par mi lta ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang /_snying rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na byams pas ni dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/_snying rjes ni sdug bsngal las thar ba dang /_dmyal ba 
[\[232a.2\]]las sgrol bar byed do/_/skye bo rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar bsgrub 'dod pa'i sgo ma shes pa mthong na byang chub sems dpas skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/_/snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can thams cad la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon 
[\[232a.3\]]par ston te/_theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang /_bka' 
[\[232a.4\]]stsal pa/_mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos mi skye ba ni gang /_mi 'gag pa ni gang /_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sdig pa'i chos ni mi skye bar bya/_dge ba'i chos ni mi 'gag par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi 
[\[232a.5\]]dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khams gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste/_kun rdzob kyi tshig dang /_yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par bshad mod kyi/_bla na med pa'i byang chub ni dus gsum du mi gnas 
[\[232a.6\]]la mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos/_chos bcu po gang zhe na/_stod pa dang smad pa la sems skyed bri med pa dang /_snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_shes rab can dang /_gti mug can la 'dra bar snying rje 
[\[232a.7\]]bskyed pa dang /_sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste/_snyoms par lta ba dang /_mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyas mi 'dogs pa dang /_theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na yang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang /_ngan song gsum gyi 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]sgra thos na yang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa'i sems mi skyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang /_bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/_chos bcu po de dag dang 
[\[232b.2\]]ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa khams gsum na bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste/_de bas na bsam gyis khyab dka' zhes bya'o/_/
[\[232b.3\]]gang zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na/_/bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/_/tshul khrims dam du bsrung ba ni/_/skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam/_/byams pa spyad pas dam pa mchog_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'di ru ni/_/lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de/_/ngan song 
[\[232b.4\]]gsum du ltung nges dag_/byams sems de yis 'phral du 'byang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis/_/'jig rten ngan par skyes na yang /_/'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig_/ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang /_/mgo bo na ba tsam gyis 'byang /_/
[\[232b.5\]]gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam/_/nyon mongs sgrib pa spang 'dod pa/_/'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang /_/dam chos bsrung bas shes rab 'phel/_/rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum/_/tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas/_/deng nas sang gi bar dag tu/_/
[\[232b.6\]]'jig rten 'di na gnas kyang sla/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas ni mi 'khrugs 'jig rten dang /_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis/_/shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na/_/sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med/_/khams der bsod nams bya ba ni/_/dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad do/_/
[\[232b.7\]]gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dag tu/_/rang gis mi bzod bzod bya ste/_/pha rol po yang bzod bcug na/_/de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog_/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/'jig rten ngan 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe/_/nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par/_/sems can 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]thams cad 'dren bya ste/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na/_/bla med byang chub myur du thob/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis deng 'dir byang 
[\[233a.2\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/_de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[233a.3\]]rnams bskyed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i thabs spyad pa la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa 'dri ba legs kyis 'dod pa bzhin dris shig_/ngas khyod la bye phrag phyed par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye 
[\[233a.4\]]bar gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems la gdung ba ma mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma 
[\[233a.5\]]mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul mi g.yo bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/_byang chub sems 
[\[233a.6\]]dpas ci bgyis na sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/_thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems can gyi ston pa bgyid par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshe tshe rabs rabs su 
[\[233a.7\]]byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems spyod pa rnams gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na chos rin po ches legs par sgrub par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshul khrims 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 
[\[233b.2\]]'byed par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag mi lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na bsam gtan 
[\[233b.3\]]dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/_'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang /_khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/_sangs 
[\[233b.4\]]rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid bar mi 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu nus pa yang shin tu legs so legs so/_/khyod legs 
[\[233b.5\]]par nyon la dran pa mngon du zhog shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin du thos par smon te/_mnyan cing mnos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[233b.6\]]dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyis sems mi gdung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la snying rje cher bskyed pa dang /_brtson 'grus bskyed cing le lo mi byed pa dang /_skye shi'i 'khor ba rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang /_yang 
[\[233b.7\]]dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyis sems gdung ba med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nges pa'i tshig la bar ma dor 'gyod par mi 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag med par mngon par chud ces brjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cog la dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa mi rigs zhes brjod pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_nges 
[\[234a.2\]]pa'i tshig gis las dge sdig gi 'bras bu mi rlag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_sbyin pa byin pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang bzhi 
[\[234a.3\]]'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jigs pa med cing tshul las mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_khe stor ba dang mi snyan par grags pa dang /_smad cing sma dbab pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis non kyang mi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi 
[\[234a.4\]]dang ldan na chos dkar po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol po la las dge sdig yid ches par ston pa dang /_sbyin pa la lan mi re ba dang /_dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing skyong ba dang /_shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/_/rigs 
[\[234a.5\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par shes par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yun du bskyed pa dang /_nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang /_thabs la shin tu mkhas pa dang /_dge ba'i brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang 
[\[234a.6\]]chub tu bsngo ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can gyi yid dang 'thun par byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems skyed pa dang /_sdig yod na 
[\[234a.7\]]'gyod tshangs byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang bde ba sgrub 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]par byed pa dang /_rang gi dga' ba yongs su 'dor ba dang /_mnyen des byas te bzod pa bsgom pa dang le lo spong ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe tshe rabs rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi zos par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[234b.2\]]thams cad rtag tu dran par byed pa dang /_bsod nams byas so cog sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su sgrog par byed pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sems spyod pa 
[\[234b.3\]]rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su mi spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems spang ba dang /_chos sgrub pas skyo mi ngas pa dang /_chos ci thos pa gzhan la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi 
[\[234b.4\]]dang ldan na chos rin po che legs par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_theg pa chen po chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel ba'i phyir sman dang 'dra bar lta ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang mi rlag pa'i phyir 
[\[234b.5\]]nor gyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[234b.6\]]chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang /_chos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang /_chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar shes pa'i phyir chos la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang /_tha dad pa'i sems 
[\[234b.7\]]rgyud med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du gzhag pa dang /_dbang po rnams bsdam pa dang /_dge ba'i chos kyi 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]stobs bskyed nus pa dang /_dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'dzi spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag chos sgrub na yang khyad par thob par mi sgrub pa dang /_
[\[235a.2\]]le lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems skyed pa dang /_chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig tshol gyi bdag mi spyom pa dang /_gzhan la dge ba'i chos bstan kyang rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa mi tshol ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na 
[\[235a.3\]]chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung zhing skyong ba dang /_rang gi shes rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la ston par byed pa dang /_rtag tu ya rabs kyi chos spyod pa dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa 
[\[235a.4\]]dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi rlag par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang mi bza' ba dang /_zhe sdang can la rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang /_rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du 
[\[235a.5\]]bshad pa dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la sbyin pa dang /_
[\[235a.6\]]gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba mi brjod pa dang /_chos kyis bsdus te sems can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos zab mo chub par shes pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su mngon du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[235a.7\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_sems mnyen des su bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu rnyed par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang /_shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du sgom nus pa dang bzhi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs med par myong na yang skyo ba'i sems mi bskyed pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /_byams sems tshad med pa bsgom par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos 
[\[235b.2\]]pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyi phyir smon lam mi gtong ba dang /_sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun 
[\[235b.3\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos rgyun du spyod pa dang bzhi ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod cing spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po'i rnam grangs spyad de/_sems can la phan pa dang bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas 
[\[235b.4\]]kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khris ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni chos kyi 
[\[235b.5\]]khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di legs par 
[\[235b.6\]]zung shig_/chongs shig ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde 'di'i ming ni thar pa chen po phyogs su 
[\[235b.7\]]rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa/_mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas par gzhig pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/_log par lta ba dang /_'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba/_khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dral ba/_'khor ba las thar cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]sgrol ba/_sa bon dam pa'i rgyu skams pa rlan par byed pa/_rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa/_sems can theg pa gsum gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa/_byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes 
[\[236a.2\]]bya bar zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang /_'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang /_tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang 
[\[236a.3\]]du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_don rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang /_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang /_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang /_ngo mtshar rmad 
[\[236a.4\]]du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni thos ma myong ste/_deng thos pa 'di da bdag gis rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag la chos dang dge 'dun ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_khams gsum gyi sems can rang skye zhing rang 'gag par gyur 
[\[236a.5\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /_chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/_/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su snyegs te/_mya ngan las 'da'o 
[\[236a.6\]]zhes [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su brjod pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/_bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sku thob par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems 
[\[236a.7\]]can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o/_/gzung zhing 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgom ste/_dus gcig tu sangs rgyas su 'grub par bgyi'o/_/mi gtong bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam/_kha ton du bgyid dam/_glegs bam du yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan
