[\[236b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/_/gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag 
[\[236b.3\]]bcu nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/_/gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas theg pa chen po phyogs 
[\[236b.4\]]su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang na yi ge 'bru gcig gam/_tshigs bcad gcig gam/_shu log gcig 'dri'am/_'drir 'jug na de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/_/'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas kyang sems thag pa 
[\[236b.5\]]nas mdo sde 'di shu log gcig klog gam/_kha ton du byas na bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/_/stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi skyabs byin pa bas kyang /_gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te/_gzhan la 
[\[236b.6\]]tshig gcig gam/_shu log gcig gi don bstan na bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zang zing gi sbyin pa ni nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/_tshe dang longs spyod bskyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro/_/theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin pa ni sems can 
[\[236b.7\]]rnams kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni sngon sdig can ma rungs pa yin na yang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o/_/sngon sdug bsngal can yin na yang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o/_/sngon 'ching 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ba can yin na yang dgrol thar pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sngon ma rgal ba yin na yang da rgal ba can no/_/sngon blun pa zhig yin na yang da ni slob dpon du chud pa'o/_/sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na yang da ni zag pa med pa'o/_/sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na yang da ni 
[\[237a.2\]]'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o/_/sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na yang da ni 'phags pa'i lam la chud pa'o/_/lus skye bo'i lus can yin na yang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra ba'o/_/sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na yang da mdo sde 
[\[237a.3\]]'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/_sngon so so'i skye bo 
[\[237a.4\]]lags kyang da ni 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang /_sngon nyon mongs pa can lags na yang da ni mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /_'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/_/zhes byung na tshul khrims zhig pa dang /_mtshams ma mchis 
[\[237a.5\]]par spyad pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste/_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang 'thun pa zhig lags sam/_don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis 
[\[237a.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis legs par zhus pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[237a.7\]]nyams pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yong med do/_/de ji lta zhe na/_dper na dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phangs shing sdug 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]na pha yod pa'i tshe na ni nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so cog la 'gal ba med/_bu yang pha la sri zhu che ste/_pha'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo /_/re shig dus gcig na pha lam ring por 'dron du song ba las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i bar du bu de pha'i bstan ngag 
[\[237b.2\]]brjed nas nyes pa yang mang du byung ngo /_/pha ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i phyir pha shi ba skad du brjod de ngud mo dag byed cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do/_/mya ngan gyis non te sems stor nas phas bstan pa yang brjed de chos la skur pa dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do/_/pha de yun ring mo zhig 
[\[237b.3\]]lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu yang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pha'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzungs su bzung nas nyes pa yang ma byung ngo /_/pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal 
[\[237b.4\]]bar spyad pas skur pa can zhes kyang mi bya ste/_rigs kyi bu dra ma zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/bu gcig pu zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do/_/phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims so/_/lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 
[\[237b.5\]]'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o/_/pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni tshe 'das so zhes brjod pa'o/_/mya ngan gyis non pa ni sgrib pas bsgribs pa'o/_/gzungs su mi 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims zhig pa'o/_/shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o/_/don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur pa btab pa'o/_/
[\[237b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te/_sems can gyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o/_/mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid 
[\[237b.7\]]ches pa ni ltung ba med pa'o/_/bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni chos la mi skur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o/_/gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/_/gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa'o/_/gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o/_/gang mdo sde 'di'i don 
[\[238a.2\]]shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu bskal 
[\[238a.3\]]pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu brtsi ba/_zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do/_/yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang 
[\[238a.4\]]phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa shin tu dkon no/_/gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o/_/de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_yi ger 
[\[238a.5\]]'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_gzhan la yang bstan na log par lta ba dang /_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa yang 'ju bar 
[\[238a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar 'gyur ram/_zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[238a.7\]]yon mi 'ju mi srid de/_sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na yang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde kha cig las 'byung ba lta ba log pa dang /_tshul khrims zhig pa rnams dang /_khams gcig tu lhan cig gnas su yang mi rung ba dang /_chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du yang mi rung ngo zhes 'byung la 
[\[238b.2\]]gso sbyong gi tshe gang zag de 'phags pa'i lam stor ba lags te/_dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs/_gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad 
[\[238b.3\]]la/_'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra na/_bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/_bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o/_/rnam par dgrol bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[238b.4\]]dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang /_snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsams te/_don de zhu ba ni rab tu'ang legs te ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyis 
[\[238b.5\]]legs par soms la nyon cig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la/_bdud dang /_mu stegs dang /_so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/_de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par 
[\[238b.6\]]zad do/_/rigs kyi bu ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa/_sems can bzang ngan rnam par mi rtog par sbyin pa byas na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub po zhes bshad de/_byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[238b.7\]]log spyod la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyud du 'gro'o/_/drin gzo ba dang khrel med pa ni byol song gi brgyud du 'gro'o/_log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]pa yang bsod nams can gyi yon 'ju na mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /_'chang ba'i gang zag lta zhig ci smos/_de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo/_/tshul khrims 'jig pa dang /_mtshams med par 'gro ba 
[\[239a.2\]]dang /_dam pa'i chos la bkur ba dang /_log par blta ba dang /_nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na mchod yon yang 'ju bar nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bde bzhin 
[\[239a.3\]]gshegs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/_thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin yang bsam gyi mi khyab/_mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[239a.4\]]bu de de bzhin no/_/khyed kyi bshad pa bzhin te/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsol ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems pa nam mkha'i snying po la de skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam 
[\[239a.5\]]par dag pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/_bsnyen bkur byas na yang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyad pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la 
[\[239a.6\]]lung bstan par ma gyur to/_/bskal pa de 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te/_bsnyen bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/_/bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes 
[\[239a.7\]]bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/_bsnyen bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/_/bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te/_bsnyen 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/_/bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[239b.2\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/_nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te/_bsnyen bkur byas nas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming 
[\[239b.3\]]thos te/_nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'di da dung ma mthong ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bstsags te/_mchod pa phul na yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu nga sngon bskal 
[\[239b.4\]]pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang /_bsnyen bkur dang bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te/_nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang /_tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshangs par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang /_tshul khrims bslab pa dang nga rgyal dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[239b.5\]]mug spangs te/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang /_thos so cog thams cad mi brjed pa dang /_'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[239b.6\]]bsam gtan las byung nas chos nyan pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang /_nyams pa mang du byung ba'i phyir ro/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[239b.7\]]kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rgyas pa bsgom par byas na lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na yang rdzogs par mi nus te/_rigs kyi bu nga bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po 
[\[240a.2\]]dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa der mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang mthong bar gyur to/_/rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_don bsam pa la sogs pa byas nas 
[\[240a.3\]]de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/_khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[240a.4\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te/_'chang ba dang /_klog pa la sogs pa byas na sangs rgyas kyis yang myur du thob par 'gyur na/_'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ngas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin 
[\[240a.5\]]po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang /_dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu sbyin par byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/_/theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin/_/theg pa chung ngu ba rjes chu/_/theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhun/_/
[\[240a.6\]]theg pa chung ngu grog ma'i mkhar/_/theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin/_/theg pa chung ngu me stag tsam/_/theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin/_/bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o/_/dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_/sems can thams cad go 'byed do/_/theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang /_/theg pa 'di las 'da' ba 
[\[240a.7\]]med/_/theg pa chen po 'di nang nas/_/theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni/_/thams cad bsgral bar mi nus so/_/theg pa bla na med pa 'di/_/sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la/_/gang gis dpag med 'di spyad 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa/_/nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin/_/gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yong med do/_/theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te/_/thogs pa med cing dpag tu med/_/sems can thams cad de dag kun/_/theg pa chen po 'di zhon la/_/theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na/_/gtos rgya che 
[\[240b.2\]]zhing mang du shong /_/gal te theg chen yon tan dang /_/theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni/_/bskal pa dpag med rab bshad kyang /_/mtha' ru rdzogs par yang mi nus/_/theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang /_/theg pa chen po dam pa mchog_/sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na/_/byang chub 
[\[240b.3\]]shing drung mngon par 'gro/_/'ching ba med cing thogs med pa/_/bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di/_/theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas/_/byang chub dkyil du 'dug par 'ong /_/rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can 
[\[240b.4\]]thams cad la/_/theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya/_/gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni/_/'phel ba'am 'grib pa yong med de/_/nam mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas/_/theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab/_/de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/_/brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste/_/mngon par 
[\[240b.5\]]shes pa rnams dang ni/_/ye shes chen po thob par bya/_/lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud/_/mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na/_/theg pa chen po'i skyabs song la/_/mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos/_/rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum/_/des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms/_/log 
[\[240b.6\]]par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na/_/theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos/_/nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang /_/dge rtsa phun sum tshogs 'gyur bas/_/theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab/_/de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'/_/'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i 
[\[240b.7\]]chos thams cad/_/slob dang mi slob de dag kun/_/theg pa chen por kun 'dus so/_/sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni/_/log par lta ba dang ni sdig grogs bsten/_/gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa/_/des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus/_/de rnams 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba/_/grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob/_/skyes bu gang zhig don chen shes 'dod pa/_/theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye/_/de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon/_/zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan/_/de yang theg chen 
[\[241a.2\]]dbang gis rnam par brgyan/_/gang zhig theg pa chen por spyod nus pa/_/de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/_/gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni/_/de ni bsod nams dpag med thob pa'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su phyin pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 
[\[241a.3\]]dpag med mchod pa dang /_/de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo/_/mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med/_/dpal dang gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms/_/de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'/_/byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/_/phun sum tshogs 
[\[241a.4\]]ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub/_/gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni/_/bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin/_/lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na/_/de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang 
[\[241a.5\]]nus/_/de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so/_/rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa/_/des ni theg pa chen po thob pa'o/_/sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang /_/theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang /_/gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa/_/de ni 
[\[241a.6\]]tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin/_/yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed/_/dam chos yang dag don la brten pa yang /_/theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so/_/mi 'jigs dang ni stobs bcu ldan pa dang /_/mtshan bzang 
[\[241a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang /_/rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang /_/theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang gis so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/_'bru gcig gam/_tshig gcig gam/_tshigs bcad gcig 'chang ngam klog 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]na bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/sdug bsngal kun dang yong 'bral lo/_/nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste/_/bde ba'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa/_/phyi ma ma 'ongs 
[\[241b.2\]]dus ngan tshe/_/mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang /_/ngas ni lung du bstan par bya/_/gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol ba/_/rgyal ba'ang rtag tu de la gzhol/_/gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na/_/rgyal ba'ang de la bsrung bar 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang /_/
[\[241b.3\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus/_/'khor ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba dang /_/bdud kyi dpung bcas 'jil yang nus/_/rgyal ba 'od mi 'gyur de las/_/ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa/_/shAkya thub ces bya bar grub/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/_/
[\[241b.4\]]gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/_/ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya/_/gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/_/mdo sde 'di yi don shes te/_/blun po rnams la rab bshad pa/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 
[\[241b.5\]]mi bzhugs kyang /_/mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar/_/gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu/_/sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di mnos te 'chang ba dang /_bskal pa 'jig pa'i 
[\[241b.6\]]tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen 
[\[241b.7\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad/_deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/_las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/_gal te ngas rgya cher bshad du bskal pa'i bar du yang bshad pa mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do/_/de dag gang zhe na/_
[\[242a.2\]]'di lta ste sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang /_yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bla ma la bsu skyal dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_mchod rten bsgrub pa la phu dud du byas pas phyag dang 
[\[242a.3\]]zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad la ma brnyas pas rting pa yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms 
[\[242a.4\]]par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas sor mo bar 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pas/_phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba zhim po dang /_gtsang ma dang /_nyams su bde ba byin 
[\[242a.5\]]pas/_bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la thos par dga' bas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi g.yo dang mtshang sbed cing bcabs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 
[\[242a.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas phrag pa'i 
[\[242a.7\]]lhun mdzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam/_mchod rten bsgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang /_slong ba rnams la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por pus mo'i lha nga la sleb pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu dge 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang /_srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang /_rim gro dang /_nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas ro bro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing 
[\[242b.2\]]dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtsod pa rnams sdum pa la dga' bas tshems thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 
[\[242b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_lus dang ngag yid yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang 
[\[242b.4\]]sems can rnams la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_byams pa'i sems bsgoms te rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[242b.5\]]bsgrubs pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin 
[\[242b.6\]]du rim gro dang /_btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_stan dang /_gos dang /_khang pa dang /_gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha 
[\[242b.7\]]dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs te smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]par blangs pa dang /_bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 
[\[243a.2\]]rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes de skad 
[\[243a.3\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste ma mchis la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na yang de bzhin 
[\[243a.4\]]gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/_dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na yang 
[\[243a.5\]]phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/_mtshan ma ma mchis/_smon pa ma mchis/_skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma mthong /_'gag cing nub pa yang ma mthong /_sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/_sprul pa dang 'dra ba/_'bar ba dang 'dra ba/_brag ca dang 'dra ba/_chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/_rus sbal 
[\[243a.6\]]gyi spu dang 'dra ba/_ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/_nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/_mo gsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/_gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/_mchis pa yang 'dra ba/_ma mchis pa yang 'dra ba/_de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/_mchis pa yang ma 
[\[243a.7\]]lags/_ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_rtag pa ma lags/_chad pa ma lags/_skye ba ma lags/_'gag pa ma lags/_nang du ma lags/_slad rol ma lags/_mthong ba ma lags/_shes pa ma lags/_dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na bdag ma lags/_sems can ma lags/_srog ma lags/_gso ba ma lags/_skyes bu ma lags/_gang zag ma lags/_shed can ma lags/_shed bdag ma lags/_byed pa po la 
[\[243b.2\]]sogs pa ma lags/_mig ma lags/_gzugs ma lags/_mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/_rna ba ma lags/_sgra ma lags/_rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/_sna ma lags/_dri ma lags/_sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/_lce 
[\[243b.3\]]ma lags/_ro ma lags/_lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/_lus ma lags/_reg bya ma lags/_lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/_yid ma lags/_chos ma lags/_yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/_rnam par shes pa ma lags/_
[\[243b.4\]]gzugs ma lags/_rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/_gzugs ma lags/_sdug bsngal ma lags/_gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/_bdag ma lags/_bdag gi ma lags/_'gro ba ma lags/_gzugs can ma lags/_phung po ma 
[\[243b.5\]]lags/_bden pa ma lags/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma lags/_bsdus pa ma lags/_gtor ba ma lags/_'byung ba ma lags/_'jug pa ma lags te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/phar bzhud pa ma lags/_tshur byon pa ma 
[\[243b.6\]]lags/_bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/_gcig pa yang ma lags/_tha dad pa'ang ma lags/_'das pa yang ma lags/_ma byon pa yang ma lags/_da ltar byung ba yang ma 
[\[243b.7\]]lags/_dri ma can ma lags/_yongs su dag pa ma lags/_bdag ma lags/_sems can ma lags/_srog dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag la sogs pa yang ma lags/_rtag pa ma lags/_chad pa ma lags/_skye ba ma mchis/_'gag pa ma mchis/_sgom du ma mchis/_spyod du ma 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]mchis/_dor du ma mchis/_blang du ma mchis/_mtha' las 'das pa/_yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 
[\[244a.2\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par chud de/_chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par 
[\[244a.3\]]shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/_yun du gnas par yang shes pas rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya shin tu dang ba gsal ba/_'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang /_rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung 
[\[244a.4\]]na yang snga ma kho bzhin te/_khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la/_rang bzhin rnam par dag pas/_khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam 
[\[244a.5\]]rdzab kyis ma gos pas na don 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/_yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod ces bshad/_chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang du yang chos med do/_/
[\[244a.6\]]kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ge bstan to/_/yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med/_byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge yang med mod kyi/_don dam par ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do/_/
[\[244a.7\]]rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba'ang bden te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/_skye ba med/_mi bsgom mi spyod/_bsgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/_yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug_/de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/_skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma skyes/_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]de las babs te yum gyi lhums su yang ma gnas/_chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas nga ni skye rgan 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/_phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/_nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/_grong khyer mchog tu na cung bzang mo dang 
[\[244b.2\]]yang ma rtse na/_'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa yang ma bslabs/_stobs dang 'phong rtsol yang ma bsgrun/_sems can yangs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o/_/nad pa mngon sum du bstan pa ni tshe la chags 
[\[244b.3\]]pa rnams bkag pa'o/_/shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o/_/dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i chos brtson par bsgrub 
[\[244b.4\]]par bya ba'o/_/grong khyer mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni khams gsum gyi btson ra nas thar pa dang 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o/_/slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o/_/de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing sems can gyi 
[\[244b.5\]]bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o/_/dbu skra bregs pa dang /_rgyan rnams spangs pa dang /_rta tsan ta ka zhabs ring dad pa can la slar bskur ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang dbral bar bstan pa'o/_/kha spu bregs pa ni chos thams cad la mi chags par bstan pa'o/_/kasha ngur smrig gyon pa ni 
[\[244b.6\]]sems can 'dul bar bstan pa'o/_/drang srong u ta ka dang /_a ran ta la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o/_/lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o/_/zhal zas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/
[\[244b.7\]]rtswa swa sti ka blangs pa ni chog shes par bstan pa'o/_/rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o/_/lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o/_/bdud rnams btul ba 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o/_/phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o/_/sa chen po kun tu g.yo ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o/_/de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgoms pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no/_/'di ltar 
[\[245a.2\]]chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mkhyen nas/_chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thub pa med de/_chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/dus 
[\[245a.3\]]gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig de ltar bslab cing rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de la 
[\[245a.4\]]log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste/_sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang /_
[\[245a.5\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes brjod pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid du rtogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba'am nub 
[\[245a.6\]]pa mi mnga' bas rgyal po'i pho brang du yang ma bltam/_byang chub kyi shing drung du yang mya ngan las ma 'das/_mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas pa/_sems can yongs su bsgral par mdzad pa'i slad du dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang yang dag par na 
[\[245a.7\]]'gyur ba'am spros pa mi mnga' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul du gnas te/_khams gsum na sku 'byung ba yang chos kyi sku rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo /_/lnga po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sku yon tan can dang /_sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dang /_sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang /_sku nam mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/_de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o/_/sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can 
[\[245b.2\]]mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o/_/sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/_spyod yul de la yang dag par 
[\[245b.3\]]mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/_yang dag par rdzogs pas na sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o/_/sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te/_
[\[245b.4\]]sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o/_/sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so/_/nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas na chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/_
[\[245b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra ba sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du sku rnam pa lngar ston pas na de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/_'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no/_chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla 
[\[245b.6\]]ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba lags so zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas 
[\[245b.7\]]pas spyod yul thams cad la bar du chod pa'am thogs pa med de/_rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha dag theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/_nyan 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na ngan song lta zhig ci smos/_khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_'jig rten gzhan nas skyes 
[\[246a.2\]]bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang /_blangs pa dang /_bcangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na 'jig rten longs 
[\[246a.3\]]spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe 
[\[246a.4\]]de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[246a.5\]]dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs te/_seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o/_/nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/_mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o/_/yang sems can thams cad 
[\[246a.6\]]la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan pa dang /_lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa spa gong ste/_skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun khebs par 
[\[246a.7\]]g.yogs nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o/_/ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so/_/snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/_ma dag pa ni dag par byas/_sdug bsngal can ni 
[\[246b.2\]]bde bar byas/_ma rig pa ni rig par byas/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_yul sa dang /_chu bo'i klung dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_lcags kyi ri khor yug dang /_dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par 
[\[246b.3\]]gyur cing nyal nyil dang /_ljan ljin med de/_kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/_dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/_nam mkha' nas bab pa ni me tog gi char bab pa 
[\[246b.4\]]dang 'dra'o/_/sa 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang /_na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste nam mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do/_/sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/sems can 
[\[246b.5\]]thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes gsungs/_yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs so/_/spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas bcom 
[\[246b.6\]]ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/_de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/_shAkya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub 
[\[246b.7\]]sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/_/dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo/_/dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/_/dge 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/_/dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam thob bo/_/lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/_rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus 
[\[247a.2\]]byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[247a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gong du bstan pa bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang /_chos kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang /_dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung na/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/_chos kyi mthu lags 
[\[247a.4\]]sam/_dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/_chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol ba bgyi/_dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/_gsum char la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/_gong na 
[\[247a.5\]]gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo zhes byung na/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta ci zhig smos zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[247a.6\]]to/_/legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu legs te/_nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/_chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/_
[\[247a.7\]]dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/_kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma/_byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mang pos khams 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang chos so/_/chos kyang dge 'dun no/_/dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid de/_'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas kyi 
[\[247b.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_nang gi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi'i stong pa nyid dang /_chen po'i stong pa nyid dang /_chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/_de las gzhan med do/_/rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba lta na/_rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa gsum du bsgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni 
[\[247b.3\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na mi gcig cig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/_gar phyin dgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo/_/rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang /_ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang /_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[247b.4\]]dang /_theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/_legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[247b.5\]]bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo/_/thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni yum/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni shul chen po/_rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni mig ste/_lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang /_/
[\[247b.6\]]sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang /_ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang /_bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang /_nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste/_/theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/
[\[247b.7\]]sdom pa ma nyams pa dang /_mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la yang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/gal te gang zag gang la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing /_glags lta ba mchis na 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/_yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba yang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[248a.2\]]kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/_/ston pa la yang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so/_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsang 
[\[248a.3\]]g+hA ya/_a dan ti d+hA ra NI/_tad+ya thA A kA sha ni ba bI ni/_sarba d+harmA ni ba ni/_i sha ma da/_pi pa sha na/_pi ma la su pa ri/_d+harma ni kha na/_ba ra ru ni tsa ya ta ma le/_tsa le/_hu lu hu lu/_shi bi te/_man+t+ra man+t+ra/_man+t+raHswA hA/_sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
[\[248a.4\]]shing mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/_de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyi ste sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 
[\[248a.5\]]sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/_deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so/_/gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di la smod pa ni tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub 
[\[248a.6\]]tu bsgrub kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/_thos nas yi ger bris te/_sha dang chang mi 
[\[248a.7\]]'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtsen 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/_'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/_rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas blang ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_nyin re zhing klog pa dang /_kha ton du bgyid pa dang /_yi dam du mi bskyud par bgyid na gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[248b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang /_byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las 'don pa dang /_bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing log par lta ba rnams bzlog ste yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so/_/rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad gang dag khyod kyi ming dang sngags kyi sgra thos nas dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod 
[\[248b.4\]]na gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la yang bde la/_'chi 'phos na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing nga yang mthong la/_khyod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste the tsom med do/_/kun nas 
[\[248b.5\]]nyon mongs spangs pa dang /_/dge ba kun gyi lam bsgrubs te/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang /_/rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 
[\[248b.6\]]nyin gcig gam/_dus gcig gam/_mtshan gcig gam/_skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[248b.7\]]byed pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa la bsams na gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs su ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]gal te dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas rtsa ba bzhi dang /_sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur 
[\[249a.2\]]pa rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum 
[\[249a.3\]]stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi 
[\[249a.4\]]rdzogs te/_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol te/_'gyod tshangs su gsol 
[\[249a.5\]]zhing mchis na skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga mthol 
[\[249a.6\]]zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni longs spyod la sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas yid la dran pa bzhin du mthol zhing shogs shig_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i gsung thos nas 
[\[249a.7\]]gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/yang 'di lta ste/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug pa mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 
[\[249b.2\]]gsol lo/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'og ma phyogs 
[\[249b.3\]]kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/nub phyogs na 
[\[249b.4\]]kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/bla ma phyogs na nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la 
[\[249b.5\]]phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku 
[\[249b.6\]]la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/
[\[249b.7\]]'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srung la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/sde snod chen po gsung rab 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/da ltar na sku gzugs 
[\[250a.2\]]bzhugs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang /_bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_shing drung gi lha dang /_
[\[250a.3\]]drang srong dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang /_lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang /_lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig_/kun dbang du gsol te/_sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang sdig pa thams cad byang bar 
[\[250a.4\]]gyur cig_/yang 'di skad ces smras te/_bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar tu nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/_sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal 
[\[250a.5\]]rang gis ma tshor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/_tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing las ngan pas bar du chod nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing dge slong dang /_dge slong ma la mi rigs 
[\[250a.6\]]mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang /_pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang /_yang bdag rang nyams kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang /_dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon 
[\[250a.7\]]mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa'am/_byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa'am/_chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/_chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/_chos ma lags pa ni chos lags zhes brjod/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]ni mi rtag ces bgyis/_dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/_sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos/_log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/_khrel zhing ngo 
[\[250b.2\]]tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/_phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi 
[\[250b.3\]]sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/_/yang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad mtshams ma 
[\[250b.4\]]mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang /_sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang /_log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la skur pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing mthol ma myong ste/_sems la gnong ba'am/_
[\[250b.5\]]ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs 
[\[250b.6\]]nas mthol zhing bshags ma myong ste/_dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smos shing brnyas pa dang /_ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang /_ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang /_mi 
[\[250b.7\]]dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/_gnong zhing khrel pa dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste phyogs su 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/_gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/_slan 
[\[251a.2\]]chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/_/yang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu lta lta ste/_rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/_sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/_zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/_ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig par bshad/_lci ba 
[\[251a.3\]]rnams ni yang bar bshad/_yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/_dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/_ma dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang /_yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas chos dang mdo sde la ni ma gus te smre ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing 
[\[251a.4\]]brjod pa dang /_ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/_bdud kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang /_bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang /_mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par 
[\[251a.5\]]'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa yang dpag tu ma mchis/_gnong zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag 
[\[251a.6\]]tu ma mchis te/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/_phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma 
[\[251a.7\]]mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/_/slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/_/yang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]gi bar du dge 'dun spyi'i nor ram/_phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/_dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/_dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/_yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa 'am/_rang nyam du spyod pa dang /_yang rang smos 
[\[251b.2\]]te/_bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/_'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang pham pa bzhi dang /_sdom pa brgyad dang /_drug dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag 
[\[251b.3\]]ma bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang /_ltung ba dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags pa bzhi dang /_bslab pa mang po dang /_bdun shin tu lci ba'i chos rnams te/_tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas pham pa la thug gi bar 
[\[251b.4\]]du nyams pa dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang /_dam pa'i chos dang /_mdo sde zab mo la skur pa dang /_log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas nongs pa bcabs te 'gyod cing mthol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni dam pa'i 
[\[251b.5\]]chos la skur pa'am/_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am/_rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma mthol na sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs 
[\[251b.6\]]mdzad par mi 'gyur/_dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so zhes byung bas na de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/_gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/_de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang /_'das 
[\[251b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/_phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_pham pa bzhi dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i 
[\[252a.2\]]sdig lci ba rnams mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/_yang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis sems can rnams dang /_bdag cag rang rang gi slad du phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar da mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo/_/sems 
[\[252a.3\]]can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/_mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang /_rang gi rigs snyems te/_dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[252a.4\]]las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bas skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang /_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing nyon mongs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang /_'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/_mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang /_'gro ba bzang mos bslus te 'dod 
[\[252a.5\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems 'khrugs te/_spros pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid gsum gyi sgo nas bstsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang /_gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi 
[\[252a.6\]]rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor shags so mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs 
[\[252a.7\]]rgyas la yang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab bo/_/ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]kyang deng so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_mi 'chab bo/_blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/_nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_mi 'chab bo/_slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[252b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu 
[\[252b.3\]]dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang skrag pa skyes nas nyes pa rnams mngon par mthol ba'i steng du sems can gyi sdig mang po yang khyod kyis mthol 
[\[252b.4\]]zhing bshags pa'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i steng du sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ring du dbral bar byas pas de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin te/_rang gi don du smon pa ma yin gyi/_thog mar 
[\[252b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 
[\[252b.6\]]'das la tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do/_bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo mchog_/khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen/_/thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/_/bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir/_/nor rdzas byin cing lan 
[\[252b.7\]]yang re/_/byams chen rgyal ba de min te/_/dgra gnyen byams dang phan snyoms mdzad/_/rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun/_/shes rab spyan gyis mkhyen gzigs la/_/brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi/_/lha gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bzhugs/_/rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol pa'ang /_/dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/_gang zhig 
[\[253a.2\]]sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/_/mang du thos la 'brang bar byos/_/slob dpon dge la bkur byas na/_/sangs rgyas 'grub la yun mi ring /_/gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyod/_/de ni dge slong yang dag yin/_/gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa/_/de ni ting 'dzin thob ces 
[\[253a.3\]]bya/_/gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa/_/de ni byang chub spyod pa'o/_/gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba/_/de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang /_/rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma/_/zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos/_/chos gos 
[\[253a.4\]]rnam pa lus gyon te/_/lhung bzed gseg gshang thogs nas su/_/rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/_/lha rnams kun kyang dga' 'gyur bas/_/thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal/_/ngas kyang lha dang mi rnams kun/_/de yi bya ba byed du gzhug_/dper na lha bran 
[\[253a.5\]]thams cad kyis/_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/_/rim gro gus par byed pa bzhin/_/da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste/_/phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med/_/rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/_/rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/nga dang sems 
[\[253a.6\]]dpa' ma gtogs par/_/'jig rten pa yi mi kun kyang /_/rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/_/mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/_/chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/_/de ltar mngon par shes pa ni/_/sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/_/
[\[253a.7\]]rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun/_/rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing /_/theg pa gcig la ma mngon par shes/_/'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa/_/phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams/_/sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu la/_/gnyis sam gsum 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]zhes bya med par/_/de ltar yid la bskyed nas su/_/sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na/_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/_/rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na/_/rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de/_/
[\[253b.2\]]sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi/_/bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni/_/de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/_/gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing /_/lha yi 'bras bu mi re ste/_/cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/_/
[\[253b.3\]]rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na/_/gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/_/yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing /_/mkhan la srid zhu mchod byas na/_/de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes 
[\[253b.4\]]bya/_/gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am/_/kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams/_/kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/_/rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na/_/gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas/_/yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/_/
[\[253b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/_/mchod pa phul bas de lhag go/_/theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/_/snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na/_/rgyal 
[\[253b.6\]]ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/_/rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ba'i drin lan blan 'dod pas/_/skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pas/_/stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi/_/srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas/_/bsam gtan 
[\[253b.7\]]bsgom pa yon tan che/_/gang zhig bsgom la skur pa dang /_/dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni/_/stong khams gsum po gang ba yi/_/mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang /_/srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/_/de sdig yang ni de bzhin no/_/gang zhig dge spyod mthong ba 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]la/_/skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas/_/des ni rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon/_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/_
[\[254a.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/_/gang mang lags shing gang mi mang /_/mang dang mi mang gnyi ga yang /_/dngos po dmigs su yong ma mchis/_/yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/_/chos rnams kun dang mi 'gal lo/_/sems 
[\[254a.3\]]can kun la byams slad du/_/thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon/_/yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no/_/'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar/_/de bzhin 
[\[254a.4\]]gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/_/bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems/_/sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che/_/rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs/_/le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing /_/
[\[254a.5\]]'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi/_/mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags/_/rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen/_/sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen/_/sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la/_/zhi ba'i tshul yang rab 
[\[254a.6\]]tu mkhyen/_/'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na/_/'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges/_/de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang /_/mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi/_/rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas/_/spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan/_/de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[254a.7\]]mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi/_/chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing /_/dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas/_/thams cad kun la byams slad du/_/dus skabs sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad/_/skye rga na 'chi rab bsal cing /_/bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad/_/de yi slad du rgyal 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]ba'i mtshan/_/bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/_/'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang /_/'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags/_/thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral/_/mnyen des dge ba 
[\[254b.2\]]bstan cing btul/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyan/_/thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/bla na med ces bgyi ba lags/_/nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan/_/rnam grol dam 
[\[254b.3\]]pa mchog bshad pas/_/de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/lha dang mi yi ston zhes bgyi/_/dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo ba/_/bas sam ma bas chos kun yang /_/byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas/_/de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[254b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sku nam mkha' la 'phags te zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_bar na yang mi gnas 
[\[254b.5\]]so/_/sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu yang brtan no/_/sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo/_/shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/_/dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o/_/de bzhin du mthol 
[\[254b.6\]]bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /_sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas rgyun du nga yang mthong la/_deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin 
[\[254b.7\]]du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang /_'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/_theg pa chen 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]po'i mdo/_/sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zhabs ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/_sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/_rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub 
[\[255a.2\]]sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la/_re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba'am/_mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/_sangs rgyas gcig gam/_sangs rgyas gnyis sam/_sangs rgyas bcu'am/_sangs rgyas brgya'am/_sangs rgyas stong ngam/_sangs 
[\[255a.3\]]rgyas khri'am/_sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes su bskyed de/_mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/_de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang thob par 'gyur la/_'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/_/bskal 
[\[255a.4\]]pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te the tsom med do/_/de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthol zhing bshags par byas la sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed na gdon mi za bar sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[255a.5\]]bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis cig car du skad bskyed de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje che/_/shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje/_/tshogs kyi nang na seng ge'i sgras/_/khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/_/
[\[255a.6\]]pha la gzigs pa bu gcig bzhin/_/rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis/_/de lta bu yi bla med pa/_/mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod 
[\[255a.7\]]tshangs byas te/_mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/_nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa nas phyogs bcu'i 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ba ste/_de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byang bar 
[\[255b.2\]]gyur nas rgyun tu zhugs par 'os pa ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/_/lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/_/phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/_/dgra bcom par 'os pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/_/rang 
[\[255b.3\]]sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no/_/byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/_/da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa yang phyogs bcu dus gsum 
[\[255b.4\]]gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub 
[\[255b.5\]]sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub 
[\[255b.6\]]sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang /_chos bzhin 
[\[255b.7\]]gyi dbyings ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' la las gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang /_rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]sems dpa' la las seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[256a.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis 
[\[256a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pa sems 'khrugs te/_mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
