[\[256a.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_gong du bstan pa yin te/_gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba bskyed la 
[\[256a.5\]]dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_'don tam/_yi ger bris sam/_kun chub par byas te/_dben pa'i gnas khang gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri chus chag chag btab ste/_'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos 
[\[256a.6\]]zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung /_nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la/_gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan cig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na khrus lan gcig byas te seng ge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[256a.7\]]yun ring du bsgoms la/_chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang /_gang zag dang /_sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/_dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la 'khrug sems bsal 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]cing dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu bsam mo/_/de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'dum pa ni mchog ste/_de la mi 'thun zhing rtsod pa ni mthol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro/_/khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal 
[\[256b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo /_/nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ton nam/_klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas mthol tshangs su 
[\[256b.3\]]byas te/_mdo sde 'di nyan na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang /_sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang /_sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang /_sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang /_
[\[256b.4\]]sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang /_sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang /_sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang /_sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang /_sems thag pa nas rgyun mi bcad pa dang /_sems thag pa nas gzab pa dang /_sems 
[\[256b.5\]]thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang /_sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsams pa dang /_sems thag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang /_sems thag pa nas chos dran pa dang /_sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang /_sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang /_sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa 
[\[256b.6\]]dang /_sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/_de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang /_de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri chus yang chag chag btab ste/_lus kyang 
[\[256b.7\]]spos chus bkru bar bya'o/_/pog spos bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod pa byas pa de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul par gyur te/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /_byang 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bang bya'o/_/de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes she na/_so 
[\[257a.2\]]so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la brtag tu byas te/_rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byang ngo /_/rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/_des nub mo'i rmi lam na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i 
[\[257a.3\]]steng du 'gro bar rmis na de ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no/_/gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang /_lus la char bab par rmis na de ni nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no/_/gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/_gral du 
[\[257a.4\]]'dug par rmis na de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to/_/gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nam/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to/_/gal te 
[\[257a.5\]]rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_dge sbyong ma 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' dad pa 
[\[257a.6\]]can gang la las dran pa nyams te/_nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/_nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig mi 'byang mi srid de/_sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[257a.7\]]'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo /_/cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo/_/de ltar mthol 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na de ni mthol tshangs zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dran par gyis shig_/bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas da ni bdag tshul khrims bsrung ngo /_/da ni bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do/_/da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 
[\[257b.2\]]klog pa dang /_kha ton bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig_/bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to/_/des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa yang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 
[\[257b.3\]]'greng ste dbang du byed do/_/'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do/_/'phags pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di ni sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[257b.4\]]'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang /_sdom pa brgyad dang /_sdom pa phyed can dang /_khrims bcu dang /_gsum la 
[\[257b.5\]]skyabs su song ba dang /_khrims lnga dang /_dge ba bcu dang /_tshul khrims dang 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa'am/_nyams pa'am/_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma mthol 
[\[257b.6\]]na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu 
[\[257b.7\]]ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang /_dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhas so/_/
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]shin tu 'ang mkhas so/_/don 'di lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu mkhas te/_legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig_/ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do/_/ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/_skad cig kyang 
[\[258a.2\]]mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/_/gcig tu na dgag pa'am/_'or bar bya ba yang med/_'gyur ba'ang med de/_tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/_sdug bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang mi dal/_skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir mnar med 
[\[258a.3\]]pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_me chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu tsha ba/_kun tu 'bar/_rab tu 'bar zhing /_mched pa khong du zhugs pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[258a.4\]]rigs kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni gru bzhi lham pa dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/_lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing steng du yang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/_'og tu bar chad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal 
[\[258a.5\]]rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/_/lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri lo ma can yod do/_/lcags kyi khang pa bar chad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po brtseg mar 'dug ste/_rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi 
[\[258a.6\]]bong tshad ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/_mig ni klog gi 'od bzhin/_mche ba ni ral gri'i sdong po dang 'dra/_so ni spu gri gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/_lce ni lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/_sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs/_mjug ma ni lcags kyi sbrul 
[\[258a.7\]]dang 'dra/_spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/_de'i dud pa mnam pa ni 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bsgrun du med do/_/dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srung ma [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dug go/_/mgo ni 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]srin po'i mgo_/kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/_mgo la rwa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod pa/_lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so/_/ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/_rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni chu mig dang 'dra 
[\[258b.2\]]bar 'byung ngo /_/lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/_dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na zangs po che [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing sgo bzhir bab pa/_dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo/_/khang pa bar chad re re'i nang 
[\[258b.3\]]na yang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas khar gdug pa'i me skyug cing ra ba kun tu gang bar gtong ngo /_/sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no/_/lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab pa yang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo /_/der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad 
[\[258b.4\]]khri ste sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe zla med do/_/mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o/_/'bar ba yang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra 
[\[258b.5\]]khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang /_phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/_rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/_sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin no/_/rtsa ba bzhi dang /_sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa 
[\[258b.6\]]dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin mthol tshangs ma byas la/_gnong bskur ba'am/_khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu stobs tshan po che'i dpung pa brkyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis 
[\[258b.7\]]mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/_tsha ba'i gzir bas phongs nas kha gdangs mig btsums mig gdangs kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so/_/de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha' 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]nas char bzhin 'bab ste/_klad par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o/_/gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar 
[\[259a.2\]]du'o/_/sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mang ngo /_/mtshams med pa lnga yang gyur cig gis mang ngo /_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs pa yang gyur cig gis mang ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum la dmod pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang /_
[\[259a.3\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma tshangs par spyad pa la dri ma can du spyod pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon la dbang za ba dang /_ma la g.yem pa rnams gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do/_/log spyod kyi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas na mas kyang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba 
[\[259a.4\]]nas mi thar ba ni der ma gtogs so/_/de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o/_/de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srungs mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/_sos sos zhes bos pa dang /_
[\[259a.5\]]bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni 'chi/_lan khri ni 'tsho ste/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no/_/nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na yang tshul khrims bshig pa dang /_yon 
[\[259a.6\]]bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/_de la dmyal ba grang sbrebs pa dang /_dmyal ba mun nag pa dang /_dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang /_dmyal ba spu gri so gtams pa dang /_dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang /_dmyal ba 
[\[259a.7\]]me'i shing rta can dang /_dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang /_dmyal ba chu tshan dang /_dmyal ba me mur klung dang /_dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri lo ma can dang /_dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang /_dmyal ba lcags kyi shal ma ri ka ba can dang /_dmyal ba lcags 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]kyi khri can dang /_dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang /_dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang /_dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang /_dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang /_dmyal ba zangs khu lud dang /_'di rnams so so re re'i nang du yang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du 
[\[259b.2\]]nyon mongs nas gzod thar te/_'on kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/_tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so/_/brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni slar yang dmyal bar ltung 
[\[259b.3\]]ngo /_/nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma bshags na dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba yang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis gyur du bskyed do/_/dge 'dun gyi lhag 
[\[259b.4\]]ma yang de las nyis gyur du bskyed do/_/sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe tshig gzhan mi phyin te/_AM pa pa/_AM ta ta/_AM la la/_AM ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go/_/de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor mthol zhing bshags la/_
[\[259b.5\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig_/'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/_sdig pa myur du bsal cing /_'byang bar 'dod na mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs byos shig_/cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za 
[\[259b.6\]]gcig tu byas la/_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i tshe mi chen po'i mtshan dang /_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang /_mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang /_rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang /_'od zer can gyi 
[\[259b.7\]]mtshan dang /_ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o/_/yang gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o/_/yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te shes rab sgron 
[\[260a.2\]]ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/shes rab sgron ma las langs te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te seng ge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/
[\[260a.3\]]seng ge nga ro las langs te seng ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/seng ge sprug pa las langs te rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/rgya mtsho yid las langs te kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/kun tu ye shes las langs te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/
[\[260a.4\]]gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/
[\[260a.5\]]seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/chos kyi rgyal po las langs te bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/stong pa 
[\[260a.6\]]nyid kyi shes rab las langs te stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus 
[\[260a.7\]]gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdo rje'i gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/rgya mtsho thams cad 
[\[260b.2\]]las langs te gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[260b.3\]]rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te gdod thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya 
[\[260b.4\]]mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/_/mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug_/yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/_/'jam dpal nga 
[\[260b.5\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/_mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/_klog pa'am/_kha ton du skad cig mar dran te/_bsam pa'i 'du shes dang /_dran pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[260b.6\]]rtogs pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'tsho skyong 
[\[260b.7\]]zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu chen thams cad dang /_/dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang /_/bud med g.yem dang ma rungs klu/_/dpag tu med pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]ma rungs rnams/_/ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra/_/lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i phreng /_/lus dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas/_/dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang /_/phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/_/dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir/_/thub pa mya 
[\[261a.2\]]ngan 'da' ba'i khar/_/bskal pa grangs med phyir bshol lo/_/ma ga d+hA yi skye bo dag_/kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa'ang /_/phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/_/gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/_/kau di n+ya la sogs dang /_/nyan thos lnga brgya rnam dag 
[\[261a.3\]]gis/_/ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba'ang /_/phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/_/gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/_/mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang /_/sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu/_/da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang /_/'das pa'i phyogs bcu 
[\[261a.4\]]dus gsum gyi/_/rgyal ba rnams la phyag bya'i yon/_/dam pa'i don la chud pa dang /_/phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad/_/tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang /_/phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/_/gus par 
[\[261a.5\]]phyag bya'i dbang gis so/_/rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/_/sngon nga rgyal por byed pa'i tshe/_/drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya/_/de tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste/_/bram ze lnga brgya rnams zhig la/_/kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang /_/khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar/_/lo 
[\[261a.6\]]grangs nyi shu tshang bar du/_/rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul/_/ngas ni de tshe bsgo ba la/_/khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cig_/bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis/_/mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang /_/dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas/_/mod bzhin nga la slar 
[\[261a.7\]]smras pa/_/'jig rten nang na byang chub dang /_/rnam par grol ba med do zhes/_/de skad smras par ngas thos nas/_/mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir/_/bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do/_/bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas/_/dmyal ba mnar med ltung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su/_/dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang /_/dus gsum rgyal la phyag byas so/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang /_/byang chub dge 'dun dad bskyed de/_/dran pa rnam gsum byas pas na/_/mod la dmyal nas byung ste dong /_/'jig rten 
[\[261b.2\]]zil mngar rnga ru skyes/_/tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub/_/de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon/_/bram ze de dag thams cad kyis/_/thog mar skur pas dmyal ltung yang /_/phyis ni dad pas mod la thar/_/byang chub sems 
[\[261b.3\]]dpa' khyed rnams ni/_/khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos/_/sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas/_/med pas sems can rnams kyi phyir/_/rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang /_/mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams dang /_/log spyod bar du mthol bshags so/_/so so'i skye bo 
[\[261b.4\]]la la zhig_/de lta bu yi sdig byas pa/_/de bzhin mthol tshangs byed nus na/_/rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/_/log spyod bar du sdig 'byang ste/_/sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za/_/ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs/_/gang zhig dad pa'i sems skyes 
[\[261b.5\]]te/_/rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na/_/chos lam mi 'grub mi srid do/_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang /_/sum stong po yi mi rnams kyis/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par/_/'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams/_/sangs rgyas grub nas skye shi las/_/
[\[261b.6\]]'khor ba'i rnam dag bsgral bar smon/_/lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pas/_/bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol/_/de la gzungs su bzung ba dang /_/yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba/_/de yi bsod nams ji tsam mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[261b.7\]]bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyis/_/rgyal bu dge mthong legs par nyon/_/gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis/_/stong khams gang ba'i sems can la/_/sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas/_/de yi steng du chos bshad cing /_/dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan/_/thos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/_/skad cig dus su phyag byas na/_/de yi bsod nams de bas 'da'/_/yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba/_/dad pas phyag 'tshal smos ci dgos/_/de yi bsod nams dpag tu med/_/
[\[262a.2\]]gang gis yi ger bri ba dang /_/klog pa dang ni 'don pa dang /_/dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na/_/mchod rten stong khams chub pa ru/_/brtsigs pa'i bsod nams pas ni che/_/de nas 'od srung chen po dang /_/shA ri'i bu dang kun dga' bo/_/'jig rten bsrung 
[\[262a.3\]]ba mthu bo che/_/tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po/_/'khor los sgyur dang rgyal chen bzhis/_/bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas/_/tshig 'thun par ni 'di skad gsol/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das slad na/_/bdag cag rnams kyis sems can la/_khyab par 
[\[262a.4\]]spel zhing bstan par bgyi/_/lus sems rtag tu bde ba'i phyir/_/phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi/_/gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang /_/mtshams med lnga yi sdig pa dang /_/mnyam pa nyid la skur pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos 
[\[262a.5\]]pas/_/rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas/_/dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin/_/da dung ma 'ongs phyi dus la/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshogs chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed rnams legs 
[\[262a.6\]]par nyon cig_/khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o/_/nga sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba las phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs 
[\[262a.7\]]rgyas kyi mtshan thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_thal mo sbyar cing spyi bos blangs so/_/blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing bstan te sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]byas so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong nyi tshe zhig nga'i chos kyi don dang 'thun te dad pa'i sems dpag tu med pa skyes nas nga'i thad du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas/_da ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no/_/rigs 
[\[262b.2\]]kyi bu dag rtsa ba bzhi dang /_mtshams med pa'i sdig lci ba dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang /_log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dod na dad pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/_gang la las ma dad cing ma gus pas mdo sde bcu gnyis la 
[\[262b.3\]]skur cing dbang bzas pa dang /_rdo rje'i sku dang /_skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang /_phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la skur cing dbang bza' ba rnams gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ma dad pa'i phyir ro/_/dam pa'i chos la skur 
[\[262b.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/bla ma rnams la brnyas pa'i phyir ro/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la smad pa'i phyir te/_nges par dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag la dad cing sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal na mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[262b.5\]]dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig lta zhig mi 'byang mi srid de ma dad pa dang /_ma gus pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa dang /_log spyod rnams ni der ma gtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag shAkya thub pa'i sku 'bum phrag brgyar sprul pa yang 'jig rten re re na ston 
[\[262b.6\]]pa mdzad cing bzhugs te tha ma'i sku ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe nga dang 'grogs pa'i mi sum stong po kun da ltar sangs rgyas su grub ste/_stong dang po'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'od ces bya/_stong bar ma'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya/_stong tha ma'i gtso bo ni 
[\[262b.7\]]sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas na khyed rnams kyang de bzhin du phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs so/_/khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshogs mang po rnams la ston pa rgya cher byed cing mtha' med pa'i sems can 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rnams la phan gdags te/_khams gsum nas bzlas shing zhi ba dang dben pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gyis la nga dang 'dra bar byos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo 
[\[263a.2\]]g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_
[\[263a.3\]]ji ltar bsgom zhing spyad par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni sdom pa lci ba rnams la phan gdags pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig_/rdo rje rin po che'i snying po 
[\[263a.4\]]zhes bya bar zung shig_/sde snod kyi sgo dpag tu med pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig_/thams cad kun tu bsdus pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig_/rgyan chen po dpe zla med pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig_/mi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa 
[\[263a.5\]]zhes bya bar zung shig_/'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs de bsod nams thob pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig_/thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[263a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ltar na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la sman pa dang /_bde ba chen po mdzad pa'i slad du sdig sbyangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas su 'grub par mdzad pa'i mdo 
[\[263a.7\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yum mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam mo/_/nyan thos rnams kyi ni mig go/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi ni khang khyim lags te/_de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa bdag gis gzungs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]lha dang mi gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya cher spel bar bgyi'o/_/rgyun mi 'chad cing yun du gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/_sde snod chen po dpag tu med pa thams 
[\[263b.2\]]cad gzungs su 'dzin pa lags te/_khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga 'gro ba'i gnas su khyod 'gro shig_/nga 'dug pa'i gnas su khyod 'dug shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa zhig phyir mi ldog pa dang mi 
[\[263b.3\]]'gyur ba'i sar gnas so/_/nyan thos brgyad khri zhig theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/_/dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/lha dang mi brgyad khri bzhi stong zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/_/sems can stong phrag brgya zhig ni bla na med 
[\[263b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad zin nas/_shing sA la ga la ba de logs su gshegs so/_/gshegs nas gser gyi me tog rin po che'i rdzing bu dang bcas pa yang mi snang bar 
[\[263b.5\]]gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus nas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtho dman dang /_gtsang sme yang sngon bzhin no/_/mi rnams nyes byas pa'i phyir dmyal ba yang sngon bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[263b.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[263b.7\]]par bstod do//_//'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyi sdig sbyang ba ste/_sangs rgyas yongs su grub pa bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya nag gi 'gyur sh+lo ka bdun brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te bam po 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gnyis dang sh+lo ka brgya bcu gnyis/[ {D265}]@#/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las/_phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang /_
[\[264a.2\]]mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang /_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bshags pa'i le'u rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba/_de nas 
[\[264a.3\]]phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bdag cag rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong la/_theg pa 
[\[264a.4\]]chen po'i chos thos nas bdag cag dang /_lha dang mis mdo sde gsung rab 'di len cing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang bar gsol te/_gnang bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yul khams 'di dang /_phyogs gzhan du ri dang /_tshal dang /_shing drung gi rig 
[\[264a.5\]]sngags 'chang ba'i gnas dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang gnas dang /_khyim dang /_dgon pa'i gnas dang /_dur khrod dang /_shing drung dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /_mi mang po 'du ba chos bshad pa'i gnas dang /_mi phal gyi 
[\[264a.6\]]gnas dang /_mir gyur pa thams cad la rgya cher khyab par bstan te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro rnams kyang gtan du bkag pa'i slad du'o/_/de ji lta zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bkum zhes thos te/_chos 
[\[264a.7\]]kyi gzhung 'di las tshig 'bru gcig tsam kha ton du bton na lha rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ste/_rtag tu bsnyen zhing mchis nas rang yang dge ba spyod par bgyid lags so/_/mi la la dag kyang rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la mos shing gus 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]te yi ger 'dri la 'don cing klog pa dang /_'dzin cing 'chang la phyag 'tshal te chos kyi gzhung 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga'i mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'ga'i ming nas brjod na yang mi des da ltar gyi tshe 'di la bde zhing skyid pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba mi 'byung la/_
[\[264b.2\]]nam 'gum pa'i tshe na yang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha rnams kyis de'i sngon du shul 'dren cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag mthong la/_dad nas gnas gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing yongs su bzung ba'i 
[\[264b.3\]]slad du'o/_/mdo sde 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su 'dzin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' lags te/_de bas na bdag cag dang slob pa gcig ste/_rgyu de'i slad du chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su 
[\[264b.4\]]bzung bas gnas gcig tu skye zhing gcig gis gcig mi spong zhing mi 'bral bas smon lam gcig pa lags so/_/de nas yang lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po dang tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[264b.5\]]phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje dag dang /_sde dpon chen po la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po dang /_bu dgu ma'i lha dang /_ri'i lha dang /_shing gi lha dang /_'bab chu'i lha dang /_
[\[264b.6\]]mtsho'i lha dang /_sa'i lha dang /_me'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag dang /_lha chen po rnams dang 'khod pa las langs te/_gdong dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te rjes dang gus par bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[264b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas slan chad rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung ste/_mdo sde 'di gang na gnas par bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams rtag tu de'i mdun du mchis te/_gtsang 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]zhing dag par bgyis la/_mchod rten gyi nang ngam/_mi phal gyi gnas sam/_dben pa'i phyogs gang na gnas sam/_yang na mdo sde 'di gtsang sbra ma phyed pa'i yan lag gis 'dzin kyang rung /_bdag cag gis mi de la mi rigs pa'i gnod pas mi tshugs par 
[\[265a.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de mchis pa'i gnas khyim gyi rim gro yang bgyi'o/_/bdag cag lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kyis de phan tshun mchi na yang de'i mdun du 'dren cing shul sel ba dang /_ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de phyogs bzhi dag tu mchis na yang sgrib cing chags pa ma mchis 
[\[265a.3\]]la/_rtag tu dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe rjes na lha'i nang du skye ba dang /_de'i bsod nams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mjal zhing theg pa chen po las mi nyams par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha ma srin 
[\[265a.4\]]rnams kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin te/_chos kyi gzhung 'di lta bu 'di thos par yang dka' na rtogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos/_chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing 'dzin la 'don cing klog par byed na/_
[\[265a.5\]]gtsang sbra dang khrus kyis dag cing dad par byas la/_gos gtsang ma bgos te gnas gtsang mar byas la/_dar gyi bla re dang ba dan la sogs pas gnas kyi nang bzang por byas te brgyan la/_spos mchog tu dri zhim pa tsan dan dang /_phye ma dag gis byug pa dang /_spos rnam pa mang 
[\[265a.6\]]po bsregs nas phyag 'tshal te/_nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du de lta bur/_nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du chos kyi gzhung 'di klog cing 'don te sems dang yid mi g.yeng ba dang /_dran pa mi g.yel zhing gcig tu brtan pa dang /_bsam pa drang ba dang /_dran 
[\[265a.7\]]pa nye bar gzhag cing 'gro ba dang len cing 'dzin pa ma 'khrul pa dang /_spyod lam brtan pa dang /_'don cing zlos pa phyin ci ma log pa de lta bu'i tshul du mdo sde 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]mtshan nas brjod cing klags la/_mos shing gus pas de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing 'chang ba ni mdo sde 'di las bshad pa bzhin du sdig lci ba thams cad yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni phyogs 
[\[265b.2\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang spyad cing sbyangs la/_byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su bzung ba ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni yum mo/_/mdo sde rnams kyi ni rgyal po'o/_/mchog gi gzhung gi ni mdzod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam mo/_/rtogs pa chen 
[\[265b.3\]]pos yongs su rgyas pa 'di mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi gzhung gi snying po'o/_/gcig tu dper na 'jig rten na chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug dang mtshungs shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_drug gang zhe na/_sa chen po dang /_chu chen po dang /_me chen po dang /_rlung chen po ste chen po 
[\[265b.4\]]bzhi dang /_nyi ma dang stong pa ste drug go_/de la mdo sde 'di ni dper nas chen po dang 'dra bar gtsang sme dang /_bzang ngan che chung thams cad theg pa yin no/_/yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na chu chen po dang 'dra bar mi gtsang ba'i ljan ljin dang /_dri ma thams cad dag par 'khru ba yin no/_/
[\[265b.5\]]yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na me chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i sbar sbur thams cad sreg pa yin no/_/yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na rlung chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i phyag dar thams cad 'thor zhing 'bud pa yin no/_/yang mdo sde 
[\[265b.6\]]'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra bar ma rig pa'i mun nag thams cad kun tu snang bar byed pa yin no/_/yang mdo sde 'di ni dper na nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar dngos po ma lus pa thams cad go 'byed cing shong bar byed do/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i 
[\[265b.7\]]mdo sde 'di rgya che ba ni zla med pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' man chad nyan thos dang /_'dod pa dang gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa la thug pa thams cad shong bar byed do/_/de bas na khyed kyis mdo sde 'di long la yongs su bzung ba dang /_rgya cher spel zhing khyab par 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gyis shig_/mdo sde 'di la mos shing gus par gyis te/_khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtag par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong bar gyis shig_/khyed lha'i rgyal po 
[\[266a.2\]]dag mdo sde 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtag tu nga dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba mthong bar gyis shig_/de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba stan 
[\[266a.3\]]las langs te/_gos legs par bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas skye bo mang po la sma na pa dang bde ba'i slad du gsol zhing zhu na gnang ba'i skabs dbye 
[\[266a.4\]]bar gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/_mos pa'i mtshan khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ci dang ci zhus pa nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[266a.5\]]khyod kyis zhus pa yang dpag tu med pa'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can 
[\[266a.6\]]zhes bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang lhar skye ba thob bo/_/slad kyis yun mi ring ba zhig na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba'i yul khams dgon pa'i nang zhig la lu ma chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab skams te de'i nang na chab nya stong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyis 
[\[266a.7\]]gdungs nas 'gum du nye ba zhig mchis pa la/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bgyi ba zhig gis chab nya de dag mthong ba dang /_snying rje ba'i sems skyes te/_chab dang zas kyi sbyin pa stsal nas dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]chu 'bebs kyis bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nya de rnams kyis thos pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so/_/de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du/_bcom 
[\[266b.2\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bsgrags par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan kyang thos na dpag tu ma mchis shing /_brjod du ma mchis pa'i skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_bde ba thob cing rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_dpag tu ma mchis 
[\[266b.3\]]pa'i bsod nams kyi gter rnyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du gsol pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams shing nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bstan par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[266b.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med do/_/chu thams cad kyi thigs pa'i grangs ni 
[\[266b.5\]]bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni bgrong zhing shes par mi nus so/_/ri rab lhun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar rung gi_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi rdul 
[\[266b.6\]]thams cad ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mtha' ni shes par rung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so/_/de lta bas na ngas khyod la 
[\[266b.7\]]dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan te/_de gang zag la la'i rna bar lan cig tsam thos na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skye'o/_/thos nas mos pa dang /_gus pa byas la yi ger bris sam/_mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na/_
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sdig lci ba 'byang ste/_bsod nams tshad med pa thob pas gang zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste/_nga yang mthong la ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[267a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed la sogs pa rnams chos thos par 'dod na/_tshul bzhin du gos legs par bgos pa/_lus bsrang ste sems mi g.yeng zhing /_dran pa mi g.yel bar shin tu yid la byos te/_sems rtse gcig tu 
[\[267a.3\]]bsdus la phyag tshol cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mar me'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang 
[\[267a.4\]]ba mtha' yas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams 
[\[267a.5\]]cad bsdus shing 'dzin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/zla dang dpe med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos mu med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam dpag dka' ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[267a.6\]]stobs kyi stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum na btsun pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad kyi lam ston pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba 
[\[267a.7\]]thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten rnams las thar cing grol ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'chi 'pho ba'i lam dang yongs su bral ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gyi rnam par grol ba mngon du brnyes pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha' ltar ci la yang mi gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bu gcig 
[\[267b.2\]]pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshe rabs gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nyid du phyin par smon to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus can thams cad gang la 
[\[267b.3\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir ro/_/'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/_sems rtse gcig tu gus par mchod cing /_legs par nyon la yid la zung shig_/ngas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan brjod pas/_mtshams 
[\[267b.4\]]med lnga po'i sdig las kyang /_/rnam par grol bar sems bskyed cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa yi/_/mi de'i phyir yang ngas bshad de/_/de yis rtogs par ma nus kyang /_/sa bon tshig par rang 'byung ngo /_/yang dag bden pa 'ba' zhig yod/_/theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan bsal na/_/
[\[267b.5\]]theg pa chen po de nyid yod/_/theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na/_/theg pa gcig pu kho na yod/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis/_/tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas grangs med sngon mchod pas/_/da ltar bcom ldan mtshan thos so/_/len cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni/_/
[\[267b.6\]]phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te/_rnam dag sa la'ang bde bar gnas/_/da ltar nga yi chos 'di la/_/len 'dzin klog cing 'don pa dang /_/bcom ldan mtshan la phyag byas shing /_/sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis/_/bdud tshogs las dang bral bar 'gyur/_/phas pham 
[\[267b.7\]]bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/_/'dod chen po yang byang gyur nas/_/ma 'ongs dus na mi de dag_/byang chub 'tshang rgya gdon mi za/_/gang zhig mos par mi byed na/_/ngan song gsum du nges par ltung /_/phyag 'tshal brtson zhing mos bskyed na/_/sangs rgyas grangs med mthong 'gyur 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]bas/_/rtse gcig sems kyis phyag 'tshal rigs/_/sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te/_/de bas gus shing mos par gyis/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/_lus dang sems nan tan du bsdus shing bzung nas mi g.yo zhing mi 'gyur bar lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la 
[\[268a.2\]]gtugs nas sems rtse gcig gis shin tu legs par nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa/_snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[268a.3\]]pa nyi zla mar me snang stong phrag nyi shu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad stong phrag sum cu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu bcu drug la 
[\[268a.4\]]gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 
[\[268a.5\]]dbang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od grangs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[268a.6\]]pa yon tan nyi zla ltar dang zhing snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo rnam dag yongs su mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[268a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra sprin dbyangs sngon gyi rgyal po ye shes pad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la'i rgyal po la phyag 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mchog rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyang ring la 
[\[268b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lha'i dbu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[268b.3\]]snang mdzad ri rab lhun mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 
[\[268b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya pad ma'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[268b.5\]]pa gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[268b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol pad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya 
[\[268b.7\]]mtsho mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyo yid spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od zil 
[\[269a.2\]]gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bai dUr+ya'i 'od bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal 
[\[269a.3\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i mdog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom rmugs pa sel la 
[\[269a.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal spyod 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[269a.5\]]pa byin gyis rlob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping ka'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[269a.6\]]gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med 'od la phyag 
[\[269a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[269b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ring du snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[269b.3\]]bdud rtsi bro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[269b.4\]]gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dam pa'i ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla med dam pa pad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po 
[\[269b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[269b.6\]]gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdog tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan bsung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan la phyag 
[\[269b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs rab dga'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od kun tu 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal 
[\[270a.2\]]ba'i brtson 'grus che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i snying po rgyal po la 
[\[270a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpung rgyan rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[270a.4\]]gshegs pa gser ri rin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad mo'i 'od 'bar mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang sgron chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mkhas snang mnga' mdzad stobs kyi rgyal po 
[\[270a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad mo'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' rin chen pad ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog kun tu ston 
[\[270a.6\]]pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi rgyal po rnams btul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa shes 
[\[270a.7\]]rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi zla 'od la 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog btsan ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla re mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i gdung bla ma'i ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od 
[\[270b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ba dan bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[270b.3\]]gshegs pa gser gyi 'od 'phro snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra dbyangs dbang phyug sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i gsung mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[270b.4\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtag rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs rgyal thabs brnyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal thabs brnyes pa'i na bza' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[270b.5\]]kyis dgongs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sum ban da'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ud pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson pas rgyal 
[\[270b.6\]]ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab dga' 'khrugs med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[270b.7\]]pa mkhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri dbang rgya mtsho thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa chos thams cad thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rtag tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rmongs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sprul 
[\[271a.2\]]pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[271a.3\]]gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 
[\[271a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khrag khrig bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu 
[\[271a.5\]]med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gang zag la las snga ma 'das pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[271a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan thos na/_mi de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo /_/de bas na gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la/_/gang zhig gus par phyag 'tshal na/_/sdig 'byang sems 
[\[271a.7\]]kyi rang bzhin thob/_/mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/_/phyin chad 'di dag mi spyod de/_/yang dag chos thos rgyun mi 'chad/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims rdzogs/_/de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/gang zag gnyis ni ma gtogs te/_/gcig ni phyogs snyoms chos la skur/_/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gnyis po de ni 'dod chen po/_/gal te la la sems dag na/_/de ni 'dod chen ma yin te/_/sangs rgyas grangs med rtag tu mthong /_/la las rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing /_/mtshams med lnga por bcas pa dag_/mos pa rnam dag bya nus na/_/des kyang chos bzhin gnas par rung /_/kun 
[\[271b.2\]]gyis gus par phyag byas pas/_/mi dge bcu yi las rnams bsal/_/kun gyis theg chen khrims thob ste/_/de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[271b.3\]]so sor thob bo/_/nyan thos brgyad brgyas kyang theg pa chen po'i sems cung zad skyad do/_/dge slong lnga stong gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/lha dang mi 'bum ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa thams 
[\[271b.4\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po snang 'bum phrag bcu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gser phye mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'od snang 
[\[271b.5\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge mthong ka'i mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od yon tan ri'i rgyal 
[\[271b.6\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge gnas yon tan rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[271b.7\]]ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gnon pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[272a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla re la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 
[\[272a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[272a.4\]]log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snying po nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[272a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul stobs chos chen mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i rgyal po 
[\[272a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las lhag med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[272a.7\]]gshegs pa bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gsal bsod nams kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgras bdud bzhi bcom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[272b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyis rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jug pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi rgyal po la 
[\[272b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gzigs pa'i bsam gtan dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mnga' mdzad 
[\[272b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma'i spros pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[272b.5\]]lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa reg bya'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jug pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin shes rab dbang po la phyag 
[\[272b.6\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan nyid mnga' mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[272b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mnan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'i sgra brnyan snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra 
[\[273a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[273a.3\]]pa snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i 'jig rten thams cad sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zangs mdog tsan dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[273a.4\]]gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jigs pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar 
[\[273a.5\]]bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na 
[\[273a.6\]]bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i dus na 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba byas pa yang bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[273a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gal te 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gang zag la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan thos na gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo /_/de bas na dgus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis da ltar phyogs bcu yi/_/bcom 
[\[273b.2\]]ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal na/_/mi dge'i lam las rnam grol zhing /_/mtshams med lnga la sogs pa 'byang /_/rnam dag sa la rtag gnas shing /_/shAkya'i chos la bde bar gnas/_/ngan song gsum ni yongs su spangs/_/sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/sangs 
[\[273b.3\]]rgyas stong yang mthong gyur te/_/de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun mthong ste/_/rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye/_/dam pa'i chos kyang thos pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par rtogs/_/phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[273b.4\]]de rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe/_/gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa thob bo/_/lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag 
[\[273b.5\]]tu med pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[273b.6\]]gshegs pa 'od kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam gling gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang ba 
[\[273b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ri'i rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med mnga' dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po ches brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya mnga' 
[\[274a.2\]]mdzad pa'i rgyal thabs brnyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtshan khri phrag gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khri 
[\[274a.3\]]phrag gsum mtshan mthun kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi khri brgyad stong 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[274a.4\]]pa mdog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang dam pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[274a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag bcu'i 'od snang bas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgyad cus brgyan pa'i 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad mas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[274a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa lnga brgya pad ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[274a.7\]]gshegs pa pad ma bzang pos brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mnga' dbang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da dung ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'chi 'pho'i sdig lci ba kun bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[274b.2\]]'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[274b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zag la la zhig gis da dung ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan 'di thos na mi de bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal 
[\[274b.4\]]ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo /_/de bas na dgus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi sangs rgyas la/_/la las gus par phyag 'tshal na/_/sgrib pa gsum dang mtshams med lnga/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dag ni ma gtogs par/_/kun kyang bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[274b.5\]]la'ang bde bar gnas/_/sangs rgyas tshad med kun kyang mthong /_/yang dag chos kyang rtag tu thos/_/de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/la las phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal na/_/'das pa'i kha na ma tho bsal/_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/_/mi dge 
[\[274b.6\]]bcu yi las byas pa'ang /_/da ltar sngon du bsal cing 'byang /_/ma 'ongs pa na chos nyid mthong /_/de bas yang dag mos par bya/_/'dri klog kha ton phyag 'tshal na/_/de dag tshe rabs gar skyes kyang /_/mi dge log pa mthong mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu yang dag rnam grol 'thob/_/mtha' khob yul 
[\[274b.7\]]du yong mi skye/_/rgyal po ngan pa yong mi mthong /_/bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi khrir yang /_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi mthong ngo /_/de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/_/mi dge bcu yi las byas bsal/_/gzungs su 'dzin pa chen po 'thob/_/da dung ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mtshan de bsgrags pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag lnga bcus phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/_/dge slong ma bdun brgyas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do/_/lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/mdo sde gzungs su 'dzin pa chen po 
[\[275a.2\]]gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtogs pa 
[\[275a.3\]]brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar dang 'das pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mdzod chen po 
[\[275a.4\]]bzhugs so 'tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi gang la las mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos nas klog pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kha ton tu 'don cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /_dad cing mos pa dang /_len cing 'dzin 
[\[275a.5\]]par byed na/_mi de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung la/_tshe snga ma dran pa'i shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na dgus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/mdo ste bcu gnyis kyi mtshan de bsgrags pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong gis rdo rje 
[\[275a.6\]]lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/nyan thos 'bum phrag brgyad cus theg pa chen po'i sems cung zad skyes so/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/tshad med pa'i lha dang mis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[275a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[275b.2\]]dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[275b.3\]]dpa' khams gsum 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lam ston la phyag 'tshal 
[\[275b.4\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bshad par mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo//_//bam po gnyis pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen tsan dan pad ma la phyag 
[\[275b.5\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mu med spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa rnam par dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[275b.6\]]dpa' gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi smod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag par mi smod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rgyal po ye shes pad 
[\[275b.7\]]ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yon tan stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bshad par mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yon 
[\[276a.2\]]tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul pad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276a.3\]]'od rlabs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[276a.4\]]chub sems dpa' spos kyi mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog rlabs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbu mar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bkag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol la 
[\[276a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sde snod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi mnyam gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
