[\[276a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[276a.7\]]sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]rin po che'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag par phyag bteg la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag par phyag phab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba 
[\[276b.2\]]can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[276b.3\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i sgron ma 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[276b.4\]]sems dpa' snang ba'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rgyal po la 
[\[276b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud bcom la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' klog gi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[276b.6\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri btang bzung bskyod pa'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spos 
[\[276b.7\]]kyi glang po dkar po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag dkar la phyag 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal 
[\[277a.2\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyan gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dkar rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277a.3\]]snang shar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen tsan dan pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos gtsang dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[277a.4\]]dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan mi 'dzums pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsug gi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dge ba la phyag 
[\[277a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge bar spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge la 
[\[277a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen pa rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yid dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum 
[\[277a.7\]]gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bsrung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yid 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge 
[\[277b.2\]]ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[277b.3\]]dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phyag rgya'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gzigs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[277b.4\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' legs par 'dri la 
[\[277b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' legs par lan ldon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du chud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal 
[\[277b.6\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtsegs par nges la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bde gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[277b.7\]]rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyabs grol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes ston pa la phyag 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhis sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ston pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[278a.2\]]dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos lam khyad par can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[278a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la phyag 
[\[278a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdog dam pa'i dbyibs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[278a.5\]]gtsug nas byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[278a.6\]]dpa' pad ma 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi sku kun tu bstan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul phyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[278a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sku mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri med snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gzungs la 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[278b.2\]]sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[278b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i 
[\[278b.4\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rten la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[278b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[278b.6\]]dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' lam ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[278b.7\]]dpa' bzod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shag gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' thugs 
[\[279a.2\]]rje rgyun mi 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bla med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[279a.3\]]dpa' snang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i zom la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal thabs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[279a.4\]]sems dpa' rgyal mtshan ri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' char pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang 
[\[279a.5\]]chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mgo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po la 
[\[279a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ting nge 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[279a.7\]]dpa' rin chen bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dpa' rin chen mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gtsug gi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 
[\[279b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo dbyibs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od stong dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[279b.3\]]zla ba rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngos gzar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[279b.4\]]rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[279b.5\]]sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[279b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 
[\[279b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]rgya mtsho'i rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon du rtogs 
[\[280a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a.3\]]gsang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri la phyag 'tshal 
[\[280a.4\]]lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyis brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum brgya 
[\[280a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bzhi brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag lnga brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag drug brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bdun brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub 
[\[280a.6\]]sems dpa' khri phrag brgyad brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag dgu brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag stong gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal 
[\[280a.7\]]pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal 
[\[280b.2\]]pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgya la phyag 
[\[280b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/_
[\[280b.4\]]bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems 
[\[280b.5\]]dpa' gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[280b.6\]]gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[280b.7\]]gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA khri'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gA 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi lang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zag la las 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan thos na/_mi 
[\[281a.2\]]de bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing /_khams gsum gyi 'khor ba la mi gtogs te/_rtag tu rnam par thar pa'i rgyal po'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' 'khob yul du yongs mi skye/_/dge med yul du 'ang de bzhin 
[\[281a.3\]]te/_/lus ngan len par mi 'gyur zhing /_/log par lta bar mi skye'o/_/ma rabs rigs su mi skye ste/_/mu stegs can du'ang mi skye zhing /_/lus kyi yan lag kun dang ldan/_/dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/_/dka' thub sdom pa ma blangs kyang /_/'di dag rtag tu ldan 'gyur 
[\[281a.4\]]te/_/theg pa chen po'i spyod lam mdzes/_/rtag par sangs rgyas bdag nyid mthong /_/de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal te/_/bcom ldan chos la bde bar gnas/_/ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas 'grub/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa 
[\[281a.5\]]na rigs kyi bu pho dang /_rigs kyi bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa dgus phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/sems stor ba'i dge slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis sems kyi 
[\[281a.6\]]bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag bcus gzungs chen po rnyed nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[281a.7\]]dpa' chen po seng ge sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na theg pa yang gcig tu bas te gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis so/_/rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]'das thams cad kyi yum/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni lam chen po'o/_/rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi ni mig_/lta ba log pa thams cad kyi ni sdud pa/_sems nyams pa rnams kyi ni skyong ba/_ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo ni gcod pa/_bla na med pa byang chub 
[\[281b.2\]]pa'i sgo ni 'byed pa/_nyan thos rnams ni rim gyis theg pa chen po la gzhol bar 'gyur ba lags te/_da bdag gis kyang gzungs sngags chen po 'di gzung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/gang zag la las tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang /_mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing klog par byed na de la yang de 
[\[281b.3\]]bzhin du bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang /_zhag bdun gyi bar du spyod cing sgom par byed pa la/_bdud sdig to can dkrug pa'i skabs tshol ba zhig mchis na yang /_bdud des kyang 'khrug pa'i skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/_/
[\[281b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'di yun du gnas pa dang /_byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid mthar thug pa'i bar du yang bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di srung ba ni dkon mchog gsum srung ba yin no/_/yang nga'i bstan pa yang srung 
[\[281b.5\]]ba yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags smras pa/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsang g+hA ya/_a dan te/_d+ha ra Ne/_tad ya thA/_A kA sha ni/_swa b+hA ba/_sarba d+harmA Ni swa b+hA ba/_i sham 
[\[281b.6\]]da/_pi ba sha na/_bi ma la su pa ri/_d+harma a ti kan/_pA la ni sh+tsa/_ya tha ma le/_tsA le tsA le/_hu lu hu lu/_bi sha de/_bi sha de/_man tra man traHswA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mchod rten la lan bdun bdun bskor ba 
[\[281b.7\]]dang /_de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bya'i gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bya'o/_/gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs te/_bdag 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]gis kyang bshad do/_/gal te la las gzungs sngags 'di la skur cing smad pa bgyid na sangs rgyas de snyed la skur cing smad pa lags so/_/gzungs sngags 'di la skur ba'i gang zag ni tshe rabs su yang bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub par 'gyur te/_khams 
[\[282a.2\]]gsum las kyang mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzungs sngags 'di ni sems stor ba las slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs sngags 'di lan cig tsam thos pa'am/_thos nas yi ger 'dri zhing sha dang /_chang bcad de/_za gcig par bgyid cing /_khrims bsrung ba dang /_
[\[282a.3\]]bag ma mchis pa'i rtsed mo g.yeng ba mi bgyid pa dang /_'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu byams pa la sgom zhing /_bsam gtan la dam par lta ba'i gang zag de ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas sogs sogs pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang /_sdig lci ba la sogs pa yang gzungs 
[\[282a.4\]]sngags 'di thos te/_sems thag pa nas zlos shing 'dzin pa dang /_nyin gcig bzhin du klog cing kha ton bgyid pa dang /_yi dam du mi brjed par bgyid na gang zag de mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ngan song du mi ltung ngo /_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 
[\[282a.5\]]sgra la bka' stsal pa/_khyod dkon mchog gsum skyong ba dang /_skye bo mang po la yang phan par sems shing /_srid pa gsum las bsgral zhing gdon pa dang /_slob pa grangs med pa la phan pa chen po byed pa dang /_log par lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gzungs sngags phye zhing bstan pa 
[\[282a.6\]]legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ming dang /_gzungs sngags kyi sgra 'di sems can la las thos nas mos pa dang gus pa bskyed de ma skur pa'i mi de ni tshe 'di la yang bde ba nas shi 'phos nas kyang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong zhing nga yang mthong la/_khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[282a.7\]]gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po so so rang gis rig pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba the tsom mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing /_dge ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam grub pa ni kun kyang mos 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pa dang /_dang ba'i dbang gis so/_/nga 'das pa'i phyi na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig gam/_dus gcig gam/_skad cig la phyogs bcu na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_
[\[282b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal nus shing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa ji bzhin par yid la byed pa'i gang zag de ni thang cig yud tsam cig gis mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang /_kun nas 
[\[282b.3\]]nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad kun ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_dge tshul pha'am/_dge tshul mas ngo bo nyid kyi sems stor bas rang gi rtsa ba bzhi gzhig pa dang /_sdom pa brgyad nyams 
[\[282b.4\]]pa dang /_lci ba drug dang /_mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid la skur ba yang phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan la mos pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na de lta bu'i las mi dge ba kun ma lus par 
[\[282b.5\]]'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas 'od nges pa zhes bya ba de'i drung nas de'i tshe rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po rnams blo bur du skad cig gcig gis dus der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/_phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[282b.6\]]mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa ni brjod kyis kyang mi rdzogs te/_la las ni mi dge ba bcu bgyis/_la las ni 
[\[282b.7\]]mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis/_la las ni mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la skur pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa'i sdig pa bgyis pa de dag dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mdo sde la brten nas/_
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mdun du mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na de gnang bar gsol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jigs pa'i sems bskyed dka' ba dang /_dge ba'i sems bskyed dka' ba las bskyed pa ni legs so legs so/_/
[\[283a.2\]]khyod kyis mi dge ba bcu bshags pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga bshags pa dang /_'dod chen la sogs pa bshags nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de mthong bar 'dod pa de legs kyis yid la sems pa bzhin mthol cig_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis bcom 
[\[283a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi byams pa'i gsung thos nas chos gos tshul bzhin du bgos nas thal mo sbyar te spyi bos btud nas phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin du phyung /_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag la sogs pa phyogs 
[\[283a.4\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/phyogs bcu'i chos la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrugs mi mnga' la 
[\[283a.5\]]phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang byang phyogs kyi de bzhin 
[\[283a.6\]]gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/yang 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/
[\[283a.7\]]shar phyogs na 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/lho phyogs na 'phags pa 'jig rten gzungs la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/nub phyogs na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]gsol lo/_/byang phyogs na 'phags pa zla rgyas la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/steng gi phyogs na 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'og gi phyogs na 'phags pa yon tan brtan pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs 
[\[283b.2\]]su gsol lo/_/thog ma'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sprul pa'i 
[\[283b.3\]]sku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dri ma med par grags pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[283b.4\]]nur gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/kun dga' bo dang 'od srung la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/'phags pa'i lam bzhis mngon du byung ba rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/sems bskyed pa dang po pa rnams la yang 
[\[283b.5\]]phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/mdzod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /_yang dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/chos kyi mdo sde gzhan ji snyed bzhugs pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/
[\[283b.6\]]sku gdung brgyad du bgos pa'i gzugs rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/_/phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gnam 
[\[283b.7\]]gyi lha dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_bar snang gi lha dang /_gnam gyi steng dang /_sa'i steng dang /_sa'i 'og gi lha dang /_ri'i lha dang /_tshal gyi lha dang /_shing drung gi lha dang /_rig sngags 'chang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rnams dang /_lha'i mig dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis gzigs shing gson te kun gyis dbang mdzad par gsol lo/_/bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang sdig pa thams 
[\[284a.2\]]cad byang bar gyur cig_/bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i khams tshun chad nas/_da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du rmongs shing bslad pa'i sems kyis log par mthong ba dpag tu ma mchis pas las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i las 
[\[284a.3\]]bgyis pa ni brjod kyis mi rdzogs te sdig pa mang po ci bgyis pa rnams bdag nyid kyis ma tshor ma rig pas mi dge ba'i sems rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pha rol ma mthong zhing /_tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong ba la gnas te/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos pas dge ba'i 
[\[284a.4\]]rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing mi dge ba'i las kyis bar chad du gyur cing bsgribs pa'am/_sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pas dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/_pha dang ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa_
[\[284a.5\]]'am/_yang rang nyam gyi dbang gis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang /_yo byad la sogs pa spyod pa dang dge 'dun sde lnga la yang mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/_'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa snyed bshad pa dang /_
[\[284a.6\]]byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems can la'ang ngan du smad pa dang /_chos kyi mkhan po la skur ba'am/_dam pa'i chos ni chos ma lags par bshad pa'am/_chos ma lags pa ni dam pa'i chos lags par bshad pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag ces bgyis pa'am/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[284a.7\]]kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis pa'am/_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis pa'am/_phan pa'i sbyin pa la ma dad pa'am/_chos log pa la dad cing 'dzin pa de lta bu'i slad du/_da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni dpag tu ma mchis 'dzem zhing gnong ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje dang byams pa'i sems mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/_bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu 
[\[284b.2\]]ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/_sdig lci ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad 'gyod cing bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/_slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mtshams ma mchis 
[\[284b.3\]]pa lnga bgyis pa'am/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sdom pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa'am/_'dod chen pa'i las spyad pa'am/_mi dge ba'i tshig rtsub po smras nas dge ba'i chos la skur ba'i sdig lci ba'i las bgyis pa yang 
[\[284b.4\]]slar 'gyod cing bshags ma myong ba dang /_yid la 'dzem pa dang /_ngo tsha ba ma mchis pas mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i dngos po sdig lci ba la sogs pa bgyis pa'am/_thog ma nas yid la 'jigs shing 'dzem pa ma mchis pas de lta bu'i sdig lci ba bgyis par bdag nyid 
[\[284b.5\]]kyis nges par 'tshal kyang /_nongs pa bcabs shing dad pas byin pa blangs pa mthol shing bshags ma myong ba'am/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi zhing /_rim gror mchod pa'i bsam pa ma mchis te/_de la mi snyan par smad cing yang log par bltas pa'am/_ngag gi sgo nas kun nas 
[\[284b.6\]]nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mang po bgyis pa'am/_yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun gsum ma mchis zhes bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig lci ba de lta bu bgyis pa'i slad du/_da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni dpag tu ma 
[\[284b.7\]]mchis/_'dzem zhing gnong ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pas na/_bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/_bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba bgyis pa rnams bsal cing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas 
[\[285a.2\]]bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas log par mthong bas lci ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/_sbom po ni lci ba bzhir bshad pa'am/_zhig pa ni ma zhig par bshad/_ma zhig pa ni zhig par bshad pa'am/_lci ba ni yang bar bshad/_yang ba ni lci bar bshad pa'am/_gtsang ba ni mi gtsang bar mthong /_mi gtsang 
[\[285a.3\]]ba ni gtsang bar mthong ba la sogs pa log par mthong ba'am/_'jig rten gyi gtsug lag ni bshad cing bstod/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ni gus par ma bgyis shing mi dge ba'i don rnams la gzhung bzung zhing bsams pa dang /_ma brtags pa rnam pa brgyad 'chang 
[\[285a.4\]]ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni bdud kyi tshig ces bgyis/_bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa'am/_bar 'ga' ni mu stegs kyi ston pa drug gis rnam par bshad pa la mos shing bzung ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[285a.5\]]pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhugs te/_dkon mchog gsum la rtag pa ma mchis snyam sems la 'khrul pa byung ba la sogs pa lta ba log pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de lta bas na da 'jigs shing dogs pa dang 'dzem zhing gnong ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[285a.6\]]la skyabs su gsol lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/_bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing 'thol bshags pas tshangs par gnang bar gsol te slan 
[\[285a.7\]]chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las gal te rtsa ba bzhi'am/_mtshams med pa lnga'am/_yang dag pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa ma mthol ma bshags na nges par sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang de la skyabs mdzad par mi spyod do/_/dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_lha rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi mis kyang de la skyabs byed mi nus so zhes thos pas na de'i phyir 'jigs 
[\[285b.2\]]shing dogs pa dang /_'dzem zhing gnong ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang /_ma gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas sprul pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[285b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni thugs rje dang /_byams pa'i mnga' bdag lags te/_kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/_bskal 
[\[285b.4\]]pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'am/_las kyi sgrib pa'am/_rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am/_lci ba bzhi dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar gyur cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa 
[\[285b.5\]]dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba rnams bsal nas slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig_/yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas da ltar gyi tshe 'di'i bar du dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor dang /_phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi spyi nor 
[\[285b.6\]]la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/_da ltar gyi dge 'dun gyi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/_dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor dang /_dge slong ngo cog gi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/_yon bdag thams cad kyi rdzas la thugs thub tu spyad pa dang /_bdag gis yang dag pa'i chos dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[285b.7\]]dang /_'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo zhes smras pa de lta bu'i las ngan pa'i rgyu des kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyur gyur te/_khyim nas rab tu byung nas rtsa ba bzhi'i sdom pa zhig pa dang /_lci ba'i chos brgyad dang /_sdom pa drug dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang /_ltung byed dgu bcu rtsa gcig dang /_so sor bshags pa'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams dang /_shin tu lci ba'i chos bdun rnams dang /_nongs pa bgyis nas phas pham pa bzhi dang /_mtshams med pa lnga la thug 
[\[286a.2\]]gi bar du re re nas bgyis pa'am/_yang dag pa'i chos nyid dang /_mdo sde zab mo la skur pa'am/_'dod chen pa'i las bgyis pa yang bcabs shing gsangs nas nyin zhag re re zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de dag la sogs pa de ring skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du/_bdag cag nyid kyis phyogs 
[\[286a.3\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gyod cing bshags par 'tshal lo/_/so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/_sangs rgyas dang /_pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud cing rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal bas mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs bgyis pa'am/_bdag gi rigs snyems 
[\[286a.4\]]pas dar cing rgyags pa'i tshe mi dge ba'i las rnams bsams pa bzhin du bgyis kyang /_nongs par ma mthong bas byis pa lta bur blun pa'i sug las bgyis pa'am/_mi dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du nye bar mchis shing nyon mongs pas sems dkrugs pas/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 
[\[286a.5\]]chog ma 'tshal te/_mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang /_'gro ba bzang mos bslus pa'am/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi mdud pas sems dkrugs shing bskyod pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid la sogs pas rnam par bsdus pa'i sdig mang po de rnams 'gyod de 
[\[286a.6\]]da ma lus par bshags so/_/yang sangs rgyas dang /_dam pa'i chos dang /_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[286a.7\]]rgyas rnams la gus pa'i tshul gyis rim gro ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/_/gti mug pas rmongs shing bsgribs te dregs shing le lo dang rang nyam gyis mi dge ba rnams bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]so/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad da bdag gis mchod nas sems can ma lus pa thams cad sa bcu la gnas par bgyis te/_kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa nyid thugs su chud pa dang ldan par bgyis par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la 
[\[286b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rgyal rigs dra ma chen po rab tu legs so/_/rgyal rigs dra ma chen po bdag nyid kyis dge sdig gi las la rtog pa mkhas te/_'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos 'gyod nas sdig pa'i las rnams mngon par bshags kyi steng du/_sems 
[\[286b.3\]]can thams cad kyi phyir yang mthol zhing so sor bshags pa de bas na khyod ni rgyal rigs dra ma chen po nyid yin te/_bdag sdig pa mi dge ba dang bral gyi steng du/_sems can thams cad kyang sdig pa dang bral bar byas pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi phyir smon lam ma btab pas sngar sems can thams cad kyi don 
[\[286b.4\]]du smon lam btab ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa nyid thugs su chud pa dang ldan par bsngos pas na khyod ni rgyal rigs dra ma chen po yang dag pa nyid yin no/_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang /_mi sum stong gis mthol zhing bshags zin nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[286b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/_bcom ldan nyag gcig rab kyi mchog_/khams gsum rgyan lags yab yum dang /_/thams cad snyoms pa'i ye shes lags/_/kun la snyoms pa'i dpe ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas dkon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byis pas shes rab bdag phyir spyad/_/nor 
[\[286b.6\]]rdzas byin la lan 'dod phyir/_/byams chen sangs rgyas de min te/_/dgra sdang nye byams snyoms mdzad pa'i/_/brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi/_/rkang gnyis kun la sangs rgyas gtso/_/shes rab spyan ldan mkhyen gzigs khyab/_/lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas 
[\[286b.7\]]thams cad la/_/bdag cag kun gyis gus phyag 'tshal/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas bdag skyabs mchi/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod byas 'dra/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang /_mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas chos ni tshogs 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'dod na/_/thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brangs/_/dge bas mkhan po bzhin du bkur/_/sangs rgyas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims rnam dag srung byed na/_/ming ni dge slong des pa yin/_/stong nyid gang gis brtags nus na/_/de ming rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin/_/brtson 
[\[287a.2\]]'grus la las bsgrub nus na/_/de ming 'phags lam spyod pa yin/_/la las mya ngan 'das bsgrubs na/_/de ming yang dag bde ba yin/_/tshul khrims sdom pa'i dge tshul dang /_/rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong dag_/zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong bya/_/chos gos brtags pa rnams 
[\[287a.3\]]bgos te/_lhung bzed 'khar gsil sogs bkur zhing /_/dag pas bsod snyoms gtsang blang bya/_/lha rnams thams cad dga' mgu ste/_/gus pas phyag 'tshal thal sbyar nas/_/lha rnams nged kyis mi 'di dag_/de yi mngag gzhug bsgrub par bya/_/dper na lha dbang brgya byin la/_/
[\[287a.4\]]sum cu rtsa gsum lha gzhan rnams/_/rim gro gus pa byed bzhin bya/_/tshe 'dir legs pa nyid 'thob ste/_/tshe rabs gzhan gyi'ang dpag mi khyab/_/rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims sa sdom/_/sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/_/rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/_/nga dang byang chub ma 
[\[287a.5\]]gtogs par/_/'jig rten mi rnams thams cad kyis/_/mos pa rnam dag sems bskyed de/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs par/_/mya ngan 'das par mngon par shes/_/chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/bcom ldan drin la lan bsgrubs yin/_/
[\[287a.6\]]de yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/_/'jig rten mi rnams thams cad la/_/bye brag dbye ba'i sems med par/_/theg pa gcig chos mngon shes te/_/phyogs bcur snga ma 'das pa dang /_/da ltar ma 'ongs dus rnams la/_/sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu las/_/gnyis dang gsum zhes bya med 
[\[287a.7\]]par/_/bye brag dbye ba'i sems med de/_/de ltar mos sems bskyed nus na/_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin/_/rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/_/da ni 'das te gshegs phyi na/_/mi yi nang na la la zhig_/sems can rnam pa thams cad la'ang /_/sangs rgyas snying po nyid yod 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]ces/_/rtag tu mos pa'i sems bskyed na/_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/_/la las thang cig dge spyad de/_/'bras bu srid pa mi bsgrub la/_/bla med 'bras bur sngo byed na/_/sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin/_/da yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 
[\[287b.2\]]'og na/_/mi yi nang na la la dag_/dkon mchog gsum la rim gro gus/_/skad cig mdo sde 'di bklags te/_/mkhan la sri zhu yon phul na/_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/bde gshegs drin la lan bsgrubs yin/_/la las nor rdzas sna 'ga' dang /_/gos dang kha zas bdog rnams kyis/_/
[\[287b.3\]]kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/_/bcom ldan bka' drin 'tshob pa yin/_/rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/_/nga yi chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/_/la las mi 'ga' gros btab cing /_/thang cig mdo sde 'di nyan na/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/_/yon phul bas ni 'di don che/_/theg 
[\[287b.4\]]mchog mdo sde 'di lta bu/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yum yin pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dad bsams shing /_/'di la rim gro gus bskyed la/_/gnyis med phan tshun sems snyoms na/_/sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/_/rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/_/la 
[\[287b.5\]]las chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas bka' drin bsgrubs bsams te/_/thang cig sangs rgyas thun zhugs na/_/khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/srog byin pas ni 'di don che/_/dge 'dun bsam gtan dkrugs skur na/_/khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams dang /_/sems can thams cad 
[\[287b.6\]]bsad dang mtshungs/_/bsam gtan dge 'dun dkrugs skur na/_/de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no/_/la las dge ba spyod mthong nas/_/dpyas shing skur te ma mos na/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyang gcod/_/bcom ldan bka' drin bsgrub pa min/_/de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang /_mi sum stong la bcom 
[\[287b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_chos bstan zin nas dga' mgu yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs spyi bos blangs so/_/'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang /_'gyod tshangs kyi le'u nyi tshe rdzogs so//
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]{D266}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ku su ma sany+tsa ya nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[288a.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[288a.3\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yang bcom ldan 'das da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te chos kyang ston pa ji snyed cig bzhugs/_de skad 
[\[288a.4\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/_/bcom 
[\[288a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su bye ba brgya phrag stong gi yang tha ma na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mar me can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 
[\[288a.6\]]bzhugs te/_shA ri'i bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyi mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_dad pa yang skyed par byed pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun rnams yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[288a.7\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams mar me can gyi mi'i nyi ma sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de'i mtshan thos par dga' ba ni bskal pa drug cur 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/_shA ri'i bu de la sogs pa 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mtshan rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i yang tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya bya ba na/_de bzhin 
[\[288b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba dang dad pa yang skyed cing thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ni yang shA ri'i bu gang gis stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[288b.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin pa phul ba de bzhin du bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i 
[\[288b.4\]]char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs su'am/_cha'am/_dper ram/_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa gtso bo bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos pas 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba yin no/_/'di nas 
[\[288b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag drug cu na 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i mtshan gang dag gis 
[\[288b.6\]]thos pa de dag ni bskal pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi yang tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snang ba zhes bya 
[\[288b.7\]]ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gang dag thos pa dang dad pa bskyed pa de dag ni ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong lnga brgya bas ches ring ba 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mtshan gang dag thos pa dang /_dad pa bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa de la rjes su dran par byed pa de dag thams cad 
[\[289a.2\]]dkon mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gnyis kyi ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rab snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_
[\[289a.3\]]yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab snang gi mtshan gang dag thos pa dang /_thos nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed cing yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bskal pa nyi shur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[289a.4\]]stong bas ches ring ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan gang dag thos pa dang dad pa bskyed par 
[\[289a.5\]]'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan dang yon tan brjod pa bshad pa na/_bdud sdig can gyis thos nas dpung gi 
[\[289a.6\]]tshogs thams cad dang bcas te nga'i drung du 'ongs nas tshig 'di skad du smras so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan yongs su brjod pa ni mi dngo'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni bdag gi yul du 'gyur ba ma lags 
[\[289a.7\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan/_gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de la yang bdag gis bar chad bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can khyod kyis gang zag gang dag la bar chad bya ba de dag gang 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la zhugs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba de dag lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan dang yon tan yongs su brjod pa bag tsha zhing yongs su gdungs 
[\[289b.2\]]so/_/'on kyang bdag gis mtshan nyan pa de rnams la bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du go bgo bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gang gang zag gang dag gis thos pa bdag gi dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba de na mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[289b.3\]]kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig can khyod go bgo bar ma byed cig_/khyod kyis ni skyes bu dam pa de dag la bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la gtad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag 
[\[289b.4\]]la yang gtad pas/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas dgongs shing byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na sngar mchis nas/_
[\[289b.5\]]'di skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan thos la bdud sdig can 'di'i dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba gang dag la bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du bdud sdig can gyis go bgos pa'i gang zag de dag gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[289b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de dang de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa sems can gang dag gis thos nas da ltar spong bar byed pa rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ba'i chos dam du 'dzin 
[\[289b.7\]]par 'gyur ba ngas mthong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su spong bar bgyid pa'i sems can du zhig mchis pa legs par bshad du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba dang /_de ltar 'jig rten 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gyi khams gzhan na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag las brtsams te chos ston na sems can de dag ni shes rab che zhing shes rab rgya che bas de'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa bshad kyang ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong 
[\[290a.2\]]bar gyur pa de dag gis de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa la spong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin skabs med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i dus su 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na da ltar snyigs ma lnga'i dus su nga byung na mi mjed kyi 
[\[290a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams shes rab rab tu zhan pa de 'dra bdag gis kyang ngas bshad pa'i yon tan khong du chud na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pas shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_shA ri'i bu de lta mod kyis yon tan 'di 
[\[290a.4\]]yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthar gyis byang phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de na skyes bu dam pa gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de na shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan to/_/thos nas kyang spong bar 'gyur te 
[\[290a.5\]]skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag ci 'dra ba nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das lags so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang phyogs na yul khams gan d+ha ra zhes bya ba de na lo 'bum du mnar med 
[\[290a.6\]]pa'i las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yod do/_/byang phyogs kyi rgyud de nyid nas kha che yul gyi ljongs kyi phyogs gang na dam pa'i chos 'di ches shin tu stobs dang ldan par 'bar bar 'gyur ba de na spong bar byed pa khri phrag lnga 'byung ngo /_/spangs nas kyang rigs kyi bu de dag gang du gnod par 
[\[290a.7\]]'gyur ba'i mtshams med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du phal cher tshogs nas mdo 'di la mngon du smod par byed pa de dag thams cad mtshams med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs su mdo 'di la bye ba phrag brgyad dang lnga 'bum spong bar 'gyur te/_spangs nas mnar med par rab tu 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs na ni dad par 'gyur ba nyung zad cig yod de/_mnar med pa'i las phal cher 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de na brgya stong phrag mang po mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs su sems can nyis 'bum gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong 
[\[290b.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_spangs nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/nub phyogs nas sems can 'bum rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs nas mnar med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma yin na nyan thos 
[\[290b.3\]]rnams kyi lta ci smos/_so so'i skye bo 'khor ba 'phel bar byed pa lta yang ci smos/_shA ri'i bu 'di dang 'tsham pa ni 'di yin te/_sangs rgyas ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyis rab tu 
[\[290b.4\]]mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so/_/mi shes par ni spang bar mi bya ste/_mdo sde'i tshul 'di lta bu'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam la yang spang ba byas na de snga ma ji tsam du gyur pa de bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[290b.5\]]rigs kyi bu mos spang bar mi bya'o/_/dga' bar bya'o/_/mdo sde 'di lta bu la gang bdag gis ma spangs pas bdag bskal par gnas pa'i las las grol bar gyur te/_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gi drung du ni bdag gnas par mi bya'o snyam du sems te/_gang 
[\[290b.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams dpag med ldan zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po 
[\[290b.7\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu 'od chen po'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_dad pa yang skyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag drug na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs dpag med ces bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi mtshan gang dag nyan pa 
[\[291a.2\]]dang /_thos nas kyang dad pa skyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa de dag 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs dpag tu med pa'i dbyangs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas 
[\[291a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rtsi dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs kyi mtshan gang dag thos par gyur la 
[\[291a.4\]]thos nas kyang mos par byed pa de dag ni/_bskal pa bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag nyi shu'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams gdul dka' zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[291a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba dang yongs su sgrogs shing 'dzin pa ni bdud sdig can gyis rab tu gdul dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas 
[\[291a.6\]]kyi zhing stong phrag bcu gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas de'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /_thal 
[\[291a.7\]]mo sbyor zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smra ba de dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i phung po ri rab dang mnyam pa lo brgyar sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]kyi phung po 'dis snga ma de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag gsum na 'jig rten gyi khams man shel can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_
[\[291b.2\]]yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang 'di'i mtshan gang dag 'dzin pa de dag ni bskal pa bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang dag dad par mi byed pa de dag ni bskal par 
[\[291b.3\]]mtshams med par gnas pa'i las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gsal zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba chen po thob pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu 
[\[291b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba chen po thob pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad bde bar sgrol bar byed do/_/bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bdun na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[291b.5\]]nor bu snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma mar me snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma mar me snang ba de'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /_dad par gyur pa de dag gang 'di de bzhin gshegs 
[\[291b.6\]]pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i stobs de dag rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas zhing stong phrag brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin 
[\[291b.7\]]gshegs pa bden pa'i dbyangs de'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri med mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan 
[\[292a.2\]]nyan cing dad pa yang skyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bas ches bsod nams 'di mang du 'phel lo/_/bsod nams chung ngus ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan thos par mi nus so/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan thos pa de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig 
[\[292a.3\]]la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin/_gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga nas bcu'i bar du ma yin gyi sems can de dag gis ni sangs rgyas brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/_/de dag ni bskal pa lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[292a.4\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag dgu na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ltar dkar ba'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa 
[\[292a.5\]]de dag thams cad kyi chos dkar po yang zla ba lta bur 'gyur zhing thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[292a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas zla 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od kyi mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod pa dang /_yang gang 
[\[292a.7\]]dag gis ched du brjod par bya ba rjod par byed na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mtshan lha'am klu'am mi gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de dag log par ltung ba'i 
[\[292b.2\]]'jigs pa'ang dogs par mi bya'o/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis stong lnga brgya na 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i snang ba can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag 
[\[292b.3\]]pa'i mtshan lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mir 'gyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug kyang yongs su spyod par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[292b.4\]]gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag pa de'i mtshan thos pa dad ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la de dag dad par mi byed cing yid ma ches pa las byung ba mi dge ba'i las kyis de lta bur ga la 'gyur zhes tshig tu'ang smras na/_lo stong phrag drug cur dmyal ba chen po 'o dod 'bod pa zhes bya bar 
[\[292b.5\]]btso bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya srid na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par thob pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od 
[\[292b.6\]]la rjes su dran par byed na de dag thams cad kyi chos dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi sde thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/mu stegs gzhan yang pham par byed do/_/bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/'di 
[\[292b.7\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag drug cu bas ches ring ba 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]chen mtha' yas kyi mtshan gang dag nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi yan lag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can yang dkon mchog dam pa la 'god par byed do/_/de dag nyin mtshan du yang bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga 
[\[293a.2\]]brgya snyed na 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i bla ma'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /_dad pa yang skyed ni 'jig rten na de dag 
[\[293a.3\]]thams cad pad mo dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i chos kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/pad mo chu'i nang nas skyes kyang chu mi chags pa bzhin du bskal pa lnga bcu rtsa lngar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong bas ches ring ba 
[\[293a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad las 'das pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bla ma'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[293a.5\]]sred pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho chen po las 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad las sgrol ba zhes bya bar sgrol bar byed do/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su yang 'gyur ro/_/gang dag thos nas dad pa skyed pa de dag thams cad me tog dang 'dra bar gyur te/_'jig rten thams cad kyi 
[\[293a.6\]]slob dpon du 'gyur ro/_/mthu bo che'i lus ltar mkhregs par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bud med gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bla ma'i mtshan nyan cing thos nas kyang dad pa skyed pa ni des bud med las bsgyur 
[\[293a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos phan yon 'di dag 'dod pa dang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya na/_de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag gi bla ma'i mtshan mnyan par bya'o/_/
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od dam pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan 
[\[293b.2\]]cing thos nas kyang dad pa skyed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'od 'thob par 'gyur te/_gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi phan yon rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la 
[\[293b.3\]]dad par bya ba dang /_bsod nams rgya chen po yang bya'o/_/bsod nams chung dus ni 'di la re bar mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra bas rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed nas byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa ni mtshan 'di thos par mi dka'o/_/bskal 
[\[293b.4\]]pa bcu gnyis su 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gi dra ba yongs su dag pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[293b.5\]]bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang dad pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_thal mo sbyar bar byed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing de nas 'khor los 
[\[293b.6\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[293b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gser ltar snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa gser ltar snang ba'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad tha na rmi lam na yang chos kyi rang bzhin mig yor dang 'dra bar rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro/_/log par ltung 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]bar yang mi 'gyur te/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang bde ba dang yid bde bar byed par 'gyur/_'jig rten 'dzin par byed/_theg pa chen pos kyang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tha ma na 
[\[294a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams me sgron zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'byung gnas kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_bdag bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[294a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[294a.4\]]de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de snyam du bsams so/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams sbrang rtsi can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes 
[\[294a.5\]]bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba ni klu rnams kyis gang gi tshe na/_grong ngam phyogs su lce 'bab pa de'i tshe na/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad du smra bar bya'o/_/bden pa gang 
[\[294a.6\]]dang bden pa'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal pos sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na klur gyur pas/_gang klu rnams kyi nyam nga ba las byung ba de dang de las thar par byas/_klu mang po dang /_klu mang po brgya dang /_klu mang po stong dang /_klu 
[\[294a.7\]]mang po brgya stong rnams nyam nga ba las thar par byas pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gnas pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang klu gang 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dang gang dag gis lce 'bebs pa'am/_gnod pa'i ser ba 'bebs par 'gyur ba'am/_'jigs pa'am/_nad dam/_gnod pa'am/_nad 'go ba gtong ba der bdag gi ming brjod na gnod pa de dag thams cad med par gyur cig_/bden pa'i tshig des bde bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab 
[\[294b.2\]]ste/_shA ri'i bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des sems can de rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang bde ba la gzhag go/_/klu rnams lce gtong ba yang mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur te/_klu'i skye gnas de las shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[294b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag yang mos pa dang mngon par dad par byed pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnyed dka' ba ma yin no/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 
[\[294b.4\]]gi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog thams cad kyi dri'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa me tog thams cad kyi dri'i dbang phyug rgyal 
[\[294b.5\]]po de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi spos kyi ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam/_mya ngan las 'das kyang rung /_de'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de dag 
[\[294b.6\]]thams cad de dag gi chos 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yin no/_/de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas dad par bya'o/_/
[\[294b.7\]]'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dad par byed pa ni don chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sems dad pa gcig gis gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur te/_gang 'di 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag btams pa 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams la gang dag sems dad pa gcig gis 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]thal mo sbyar te/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smras nas byams pa la gnas par byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dad na chos 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas 
[\[295a.2\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgyun mi chad par brjod par bya'o/_/theg pa des 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yon tan rjes su dran par byas na bskal pa bcu bzhir 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag nyis stong 
[\[295a.3\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma'i rgyal po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos nas dad par mi byed cing 'phya 
[\[295a.4\]]ba dang /_sting pa de dag ni lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du btso bar 'gyur/_ma dad do zhes tshig tu smras pas lo stong phrag bdun du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]me mdag za ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga bcu rtsa lnga na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[295a.5\]]khams stobs ldan zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel ba'i mtshan gang 
[\[295a.6\]]dag thos par 'gyur ba ni tha na rmi lam gyi tshe na yang rdo rje lta bur 'gyur/_bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor gyis gdul dka' bar 'gyur/_g.yul chen po las kyang sgrol bar byed pa dang gang 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo/_/yang shA ri'i bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[295a.7\]]de'i mtshan dran pa tsam gyis dad pa skyed pa dang /_dga' bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_mthar phyin par shes par bya'o/_/yang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'di ltar bskyed 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]par bya ste/_bdag cag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya/_rgya cher sems yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya'o/_/gang dag las bdag cag gis mtshan 'di rna lam du grag cing thos pa dang /_dga' ba yang dag par bskyed nas sems can mang po'i don byed par 
[\[295b.2\]]'gyur te/_de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang mos par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches rab tu gang 
[\[295b.3\]]bar byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul ba de ltar gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i bskal par phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des/_mtshan thos pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i cha 'ga' tsam du yang brjod par mi bya'o/_/
[\[295b.4\]]gal te la la zhig gis mtshan 'di mnyan par bya'o snyam nas/_'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/_de yang bsod nams ma byas pas de thos par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ste bsod nams ma byas par thos par 'gyur na ni sems 
[\[295b.5\]]can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang /_lha tshe rings po rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang /_yon tan brjod pa 'di shes par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu pa'i 
[\[295b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams dpal ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_shA ri'i bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis mos pa de dag thams 
[\[295b.7\]]cad bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/_smon lam ci 'dra bar smon lam 'debs pa de 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang 
[\[296a\]]
