[\[315a.3\]]khams tshangs par spyod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gti mug med pa'i spos dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma snang ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[315a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chos mchog ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[315a.5\]]steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chos spyod ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sogs pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[315a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gter legs par gnas pa 
[\[315a.7\]]zhi ba rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams brtson 'grus skyes pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams smon 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]lam gyi stobs zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyis sbed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mdangs dga' ba'i phyogs zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[315b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtam shin tu yongs su dag par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi dri'i phug ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya 
[\[315b.3\]]ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu yon tan rin po ches rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[315b.4\]]yon tan tshad med dpal zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan shin tu yongs su dag pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nyan thos ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[315b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snang bas rnam par gnon pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams gnyid med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad 
[\[315b.6\]]med pa'i khrel yod pa gser dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas dpal gyi zla ba can/_/rgyal chen mi yi khyu mchog ste/_/sangs rgyas khyu mchog de dag ni/_/chos kun 
[\[315b.7\]]rnam par spyod pa mdzad/_/sangs rgyas de dag ming rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam par spyod/_/mi gang de yi mtshan rnams ni/_/bskal pa 'dir ni nyan 'gyur zhing /_/gang dag dad par 'gyur ba dang /_/de la ri mor bcas pa dag_/de dag dpa' bo shes rab che/_/de dag 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]sangs rgyas dam par 'gyur/_/de dag ye shes mtha' yas te/_/de la nem nur ma byed cig_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 
[\[316a.2\]]dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na ngan song gsum yang bcad par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me tog kyang legs par rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad 
[\[316a.3\]]pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten khams ni legs brgyan pa/_/pad mo shin tu mdzes zhes bya/_/lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du/_/rtag par shin tu brgyan pa ste/_/de na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/_/pad ma bla dpal mkhas pa ste/_/sangs rgyas zhing der rnam par 'phrul/_/
[\[316a.4\]]srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/_/skyes pa dang ni bud med kyis/_/de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/_/ngan song gsum ni rnam spong zhing /_/sangs rgyas dag kyang mang po mthong /_/bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug 'dor/_/'dus byas rnams kyang rnam par bzlog_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub 
[\[316a.5\]]las/_/phyir yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/long ba zha bor mi 'gyur te/_/blun por rtag tu de mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun na rnam dag cing /_/shes rab bsod nams shin tu 'phel/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag byas na/_/sdig pa'i grogs po mi 'phel zhing /_/gsod dang phyir rgol de bzhin 
[\[316a.6\]]te/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas de dang 'jig rten gyi/_/mchod rten gzhan la phyag byas na/_/chos kun rtogs par rig pa yis/_/byang chub la ni nem nur med/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sgrol ma zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[316a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dag pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na byang chub kyi yan lag rin chen bdun thob par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/rin chen sgrol ma 'jig rten khams mchog na/_/rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas te/_/de yi mtshan mchog dam pa thos nas ni/_/srog chags rnams kyis byang chub yan lag thob/_/bskal pa sum cu dag ni 'dor bar 
[\[316b.2\]]byed/_byang chub la yang shin tu legs par gnas/_/smra ba dpa' bo rab tu mi bskyod pa/_/skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mang du mthong /_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog 
[\[316b.3\]]gi sgron ma tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na mi khom pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag bskal pa nyi shur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/glog snang 
[\[316b.4\]]zhes bya'i zhing de na/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/_/glog 'od tog gi rgyal zhes bya/_/pad mo dam pa legs par byung /_/de yi mtshan yang thos nas ni/_/mi khom thams cad rnam par spong /_/bskal pa nyi shur 'dor bar byed/_/myur du byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/steng gi phyogs na 
[\[316b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi shing ta la rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta la'i rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na sems can thams cad las mngon par 'phags 
[\[316b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams ta la nam mkha' la nye ba zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs 
[\[316b.7\]]pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par 'gro ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go/_/tshe 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/tha na rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]la lhag pa'i bsam pas ri mo byed par 'gyur ro/_/blta bar bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yang rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni yon tan 
[\[317a.2\]]dang phan yon tshad med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/nam mkha' yongs su brgyan pa'i zhing /_/de na grags chen sangs rgyas ni/_/chos kyi nam mkha' sgron ma'i mtshan/_/skyes bu dag ni khyu mchog ste/_/de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/_/
[\[317a.3\]]bskal pa drug cu phyir bzlog cing /_/bla med sangs rgyas chos rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba'ang thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo chen po dag_/tshe 'di nyid la mthong bar 'gyur/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas byams pa'i sems/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis phyag byas te/_/rmi lam na 
[\[317a.4\]]yang rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/yid kyi rtog pa gzhan gyi sems/_/chos kyi rgyal po dran nas su/_/shes la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams/_/bsnyen bkur bya ba rnyed par 'gyur/_/de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan te/_/ston pa yon tan tshad med cing /_/
[\[317a.5\]]chos kun gyi yang pha rol phyin/_/phun sum tshogs pa kun gnyer bas/_/byams pa'i sems kyis phyag gyis shig_/steng gi phyogs na shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad 'byung ba 
[\[317a.6\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams de gzhi gser la bai dUr+yas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris thams cad nas me tog gi shing dang /_rin po che'i shing dang /_tsan dan la sogs pa spos kyi shing dag gis shin tu 
[\[317a.7\]]rnam par phye zhing de dag las dri byung bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gdugs gcig tu khyab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba de chos kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'i mtshan thos nas dbang po thams cad rab tu rnam par phye ba yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]chos rab tu rnam par phye ba yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/bskal pa brgyad cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par yang byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten khams ni bla med pa/_/shin tu rnam par phye zhes bya/_/shing gis mig 
[\[317b.2\]{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su byas/_/spos kyi shing gis shin tu mdzes/_/de dag las ni dri byung bas/_/sa kun tu yang rgyas par 'gyur/_/gdugs gcig tu ni byas nas su/_/bar snang la yang de gnas so/_/de la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/_/yon tan yan lag thams cad 'byung /_/ming mtshan shin tu 
[\[317b.3\]]phun sum tshogs/_/chos kyi rgyal po 'jigs med de/_/de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/_/yan lag thams cad mdzes par 'gyur/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug_/gzugs mdzes mthong na dga' ba dang /_/shin tu phye ba'i lus su 'gyur/_/chu zheng gab pa n+ya gro bzhin/_/dpal gyis 
[\[317b.4\]]shin tu 'bar gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas dag gi zhing du 'gro/_/bskal pa brgyad cur 'dor bar byed/_/'dus byas rnams kyang rnam par zlog_/sangs rgyas chos rnams phye ba yang /_/rnam pa thams cad myur du 'thob/_/yon tan yan lag kun 'byung ba/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/_/
[\[317b.5\]]yon tan phan yon dag pa ni/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi go 'phang gnas/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po'i mchog ces bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de'i mtshan thos na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog 
[\[317b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bskal pa lnga bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten khams ni bzang mchog ste/_/bzang po dga' ba zhes kyang bya/_/de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[317b.7\]]ni/_/bzang tog rgyal mtshan drang srong ste/_/rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po yin/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/_/de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams mi 'bri zhing /_/bskal pa dag ni lnga bcur yang /_/'khor ba dag ni rnam par spong /_/'jig rten du yang myur 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]bar ni/_/grags chen lha yi lhar 'gyur ro/_/steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rigs zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che'i rigs zhes bya 
[\[318a.2\]]zhe na/_'od srung sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu zhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung 
[\[318a.3\]]gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing phyir yang 'jig rten gyi khams der 'ong ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[318a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming ji skad bgyi ba dag mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_seng ge rnam par rol dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings dang /_seng ge'i tog dang /_seng ge rnam par sprul pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i mthu rtul dang /_
[\[318a.5\]]rdo rje'i blo gros mtshon cha dang /_'od srung de lta bu la sogs pa rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi ming gang su dag gis thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[318a.6\]]brgyad rnams thob par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i rigs kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgya tshang bar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[318a.7\]]dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten khams ni rin chen rigs/_/rigs chen kun gyis brgyan pa ste/_/de na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/_/dpa' bo dag gis yongs su bskor/_/'jig rten sgron ma de mtshan ni/_/rin chen kun gyis 'phags pa ste/_/rab tu brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]pa/_/chos tog rgyal mtshan drang srong ste/_/byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor cing /_/'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad/_/'jig rten du ni ma bskor ba/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor/_/de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'khor zhing /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[318b.2\]]yang /_/bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/_/gang dag gis ni mtshan brjod pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po de dag dang /_/rang byung dag na bzhugs pa dang /_/'jig rten dag gi khams kyang rung /_/ming dang rigs ni rnam par dag_/spyod pa dag kyang rnam dag pa/_/chos kyi spyan ni rnam par dag_/chos rnams kun 
[\[318b.3\]]kyang rnam spyangs pa/_/shes rab ldan pa'i spyod yul gyis/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes la/_/skye bo mang po gang dag ni/_/shin tu 'dod pa'i shA ri'i bu/_/gang dag phyi ma'i dus byung ba/_/shin tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i tshe/_/chos 'di rab tu nyan 'gyur zhing /_/thos nas dad par byed pa ni/_/the tsom med par de 
[\[318b.4\]]dag gis/_/shA ris nga la bsnyen bkur byas/_/ji ltar rin chen rin thang med/_/dbul pos mthong na zhum gyur te/_/gang gis rin chen rnyed 'gyur ba/_/de lta'i nor ni ga las 'ong /_/de bzhin bla med sangs rgyas kyang /_/bsod nams chung ngus thos nas ni/_/mig la gnod byed blo can rnams/_/de dag 
[\[318b.5\]]dad par ga la 'gyur/_/nor dang mdzod rnams mang po dag_/nor bu rin chen thos nas ni/_/shin tu brgyan par bya'o zhes/_/de dag yang dag yang tshol lo/_/de bzhin shes rab chen po yang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/_/ji ltar byang chub reg 'gyur zhes/_/de dag yongs su tshol bar 
[\[318b.6\]]byed/_/dman pa'i las dang ldan pa dang /_/sdig pa 'dod dang g.yo can dang /_/shes rab bsod nams med pa la/_/'di lta bu yi thos pa med/_/'dod chags kyis ni chags gyur dang /_/gti mug gis ni rmongs pa'am/_/chags pas zil gyis non pa la/_/'di lta bu yi thos pa med/_/nga rgyal can dang 
[\[318b.7\]]khengs pa dang /_/le lo can dang blo chung dang /_/mu stegs gzhan la brtson pa la/_/'di lta bu yi thos pa med/_/bye ba stong gi lha rnams ni/_/kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos/_/kye ma dge 'dun bla na med/_/de zhes de tshe sgra yang sgrog_/me tog gi yang char 'bebs shing /_/stong gsum 'dir ni rab tu 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]gtor/_/sil snyan bye ba dkrol bar byed/_/spos kyis sa la chag chag btab/_/zhing 'di snang bar byed nas ni/_/rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas/_/me tog bsags pa dam pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad pa/_/de na 'khor su gang dag ni/_/sangs rgyas mtshams gnas ma gtogs par/_
[\[319a.2\]]gang gzhan thos pa thams cad ni/_/sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu dag ni thams cad du/_/gang gA'i bye snyed zhing nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhags nas su/_/mnyan nas phyir yang so sor dong /_/mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/_/dge slong bye ba mang chad pa/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[319a.3\]]dgra bcom gyur/_/de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong /_/dge slong dag ni brgya stong dang /_/dge slong ma yang de bzhin te/_/stong phrag drug cur tshang ba yis/_/de tshe chos la bzod pa thob/_/mi skye ba yi chos rnams la/_/bzod pa bla na med thob nas/_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams blta zhing /_/srog chags 
[\[319a.4\]]rnams la chos kyang 'chad/_/dge slong ma ni lnga brgya dang /_/dge bsnyen ma ni bzhi bcu dag_/rang rang gi ni gos rnams kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi sku la gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yi rangs so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[319a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba 
[\[319a.6\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI la sogs pas zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//_//
